properties.name: A.M.Chumaceiro Bulevar 11, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached 18th century two-storey mansion with ridge parallel to
 street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front 
and rear galleries. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular 
top end. Two dormers with ditto fronton on both sides of roof. Front 
fa�ade with moulded arches on ground floor between door and windows. 
Stone wall fence.

properties.name: A.M.Chumaceiro Bulevar 13, Scharloo / 'Pachi di Sola'
properties.description:
Detached 18th century two-storey mansion with deep setback from
 street. Four gable roofs forming a cruciform roof plan. Roof ends 
closed by18th century and 19th century gables respectively. Front 
balcony flanked with stairs. Fa�ades with sash windows. Side addition 
with two parallel gable roofs. Former cistern and coach house. Stone 
wall fence.

properties.name: Abraham de Veerstraat 12, Punda
properties.description:
Former convent with chapel and court-yard. Large complex 
consisting of two-storey and one-storey wings. Composite floor and roof 
plan with hipped roofs enclosing a rectangular court-yard.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 10, Punda
properties.description:
Large two storey block-shaped structure. Hipped roof parallel 
to street and topped with finials. Cornice over fa�ades, pilasters on 
corners. Horizontal band around fa�ades. Short front terrace and walled 
fence.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 11-13, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-story cube-shaped urban dwelling. Concrete- built 
structure with flat roof. Building structure is similar to adjacent 
building Ansinghstraat 15-17. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade 
with horizontal course pattern. Doors and windows placed in three 
vertical axes. Front balcony.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 14, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-story structure. Slant roof with high end to 
street. Symmetrically laid out front fa�ade with panelled shutter door 
and flanking shutter windows.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 15-17, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-story cube-shaped urban dwelling. Concrete- built 
structure with flat roof. Building structure is similar to adjacent 
building Ansinghstraat 11-13. Cornice over all fa�ades, pilasters on 
corners. Front fa�ade with doors and windows placed in three vertical 
axes. Front balcony.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 20-22, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey cube-shaped urban dwelling. Gable roof, 
slant roof over adjoining additional section. Front fa�ade: lay-out with
 openings in three vertical axes, three- banded cornice with profiled 
moulding and two full frontage horizontal bands.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 22C, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey urban dwelling. Concrete-built structure 
designed according to a traditional historical concept. Rectangular 
floor plan with hipped roof. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: 
central door with sidelights and flanking three-blade shutter windows. 
Short front terrace with balustrade.

properties.name: Arraratweg 2, Parera / 'Casa Cuna'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, 
lean-to roof over front gallery and adjoining slant roof over rear 
gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 
19th century top end, oculus and window. Front fa�ade with central 
panelled shutter door and four flanking shutter windows placed between 
plain columns.

properties.name: Bajonetstaat 16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey block-shaped corner structure with rectangular floor
 plan. Hipped roof with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade 
with four windows on first floor and alternating doors and windows on 
ground floor. Weather mouldings above openings.

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Prominent building with out- 
buildings and walled-in yard. Hipped roof with finials over main 
structure and lean-to roof over one-storey rear gallery. Heavy cornice 
and horizontal moulded band over fa�ades. Front fa�ade: door and windows
 with weather mouldings laid out in five vertical axes, quoins on 
corners.

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with workers' dwellings. One
  continuous lean-to roof. Front fa�ade ranging with the street. Three 
doors and small windows. Two kitchen sites with chimney at rear side.

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey urban structure. Gable roof with triangular
 dormers on both sides of roof. Plain gables with tall window and oculus
 in moulded star. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: three
 doors flanked by tall windows. Front balcony. Walled fence with front 
entrance.

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 3-7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Low hipped roof. Profiled cornice 
over all fa�ades. Full frontage horizontal profiled moulding and band 
between openings of ground and first floor. Typical corner details: 
curved corner on ground floor changing into rectangular corner on first 
floor.

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 9-15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached block of four one-storey structures. One 
continuous hipped roof. Cornice and full frontage horizontal band above 
openings. Front fa�ade ranging with the street. Regular lay-out of 
alternating doors and windows.

properties.name: Balisteeg 1-3, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small block containing two modest one-storey row-houses, part 
of a larger housing complex. Gable roof with hipped end on one side. 
Dwellings are equipped with traditional fogons, ovens, on rear side.

properties.name: Balisteeg 13-15-17, Berg Altena
properties.description: Small block containing three modest one-storey row-houses, part of a larger housing complex. One continuous gable roof.

properties.name: Balisteeg 5-7-11, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small block containing three modest one-storey row-houses, part
 of a larger housing complex. One continuous gable roof. Dwellings are 
equipped with traditional 'fogons', ovens, at rear side.

properties.name: Barber / Landhuis Barber
properties.description:
Large oblong structure with rectangular floor plan. Two- storey
 core area flanked with two one-storey galleries. Gable roof over core 
area enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Lean-to roofs over galleries. 
Front  fa�ade: central door with three tall windows on both sides, four 
sash windows on first floor of core. Interior: arched openings between 
core area and galleries.

properties.name: Barber / Landhuis Dokterstuin
properties.description:
Large complex laid out along a longitudinal axis. Dominating 
two-storey core area covered with hipped roof. Two adjoining one-storey 
side wings with gable roofs positioned in longitudinal axis. One-storey 
front and rear galleries with lean-to roofs. Front side: small central 
terrace and corner terraces with stairs. Additional structures: cistern,
 garage and rectangular structure built later on in front of main 
structure.

properties.name: Bargestraat 15 A -17, Scharloo
properties.description:
Block containing two modest one-storey row-houses. Gable roof 
with plain funnel-shaped gables. Front fa�ade with plain cornice and two
 doors and windows.

properties.name: Bargestraat 21-27, Scharloo
properties.description:
Elongated block accommodating four modest one-storey row- 
houses. One continuous gable roof over main rooms and slant roof over 
back rooms. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Plain 
cornice over front and side fa�ades. Shutter door and ditto flanking 
windows for each unit.

properties.name: Bargestraat 24-26, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Main block covered with 
three parallel hipped roofs over sala and front and rear gallery. Rear 
patio enclosed by two one-storey wings covered by gable roofs. Cornice 
with dentils and dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade with doors and 
windows laid out in five axes. Front balcony. Tall pillars flanking the 
entrance gate.

properties.name: Bargestraat 28, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with rear patio 
enclosed by two one-storey wings. Hipped roof over main building with 
cement hips, ridges and finials. Gable roofs over wings. Cornice over 
facades, dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade with doors and windows 
laid out in three axes. Front balcony.

properties.name: Bargestraat 29-49, Scharloo
properties.description:
Elongated block of eleven modest one-storey row-houses. One 
continuous gable roof over main front rooms and occasional gable roof 
over back rooms. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Plain 
cornice over front fa�ade. Shutter door and ditto flanking windows for 
each unit.

properties.name: Bargestraat 3-3A, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey corner building complex. Gable 
roof over main building Three dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and 
outward curved gables with semicircular top end and window. Windows on 
first floor positioned between two full frontage horizontal bands. 
Consolidated after collapse in 1999.

properties.name: Bargestraat 34-36, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof 
with hipped end at rear side and adjoining slant roof. Front fa�ade laid
 out in two axes with balcony and first floor terrace supported by 
fluted double Ionic columns. Side staircase to first floor.

properties.name: Bargestraat 38-40, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof 
with hipped end at rear side. Front fa�ade split up in two vertical 
sections: left section with balcony and terrace supported by fluted 
double Ionic columns, right section with two-tiered bay windows with 
three sides.

properties.name: Bargestraat 48-50, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Typical 
barrel-shaped roof over east side and adjoining slant roof over west 
side of structure. Front fa�ade split up in two vertical sections: left 
section laid out with windows in two axes, ornamented infill on 
barrel-shaped gable; right section with slant roof over balcony on first
 floor. Modelled stonework on ground floor fa�ades. Structural design 
basically similar to Bargestraat 52-54.

properties.name: Bargestraat 52-54, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof 
over east side and adjoining slant roof over west side of structure. 
Front fa�ade split up in two vertical sections: left section laid out 
with four-blade windows and ornamented infill on gable; right section 
with slant roof over balcony on first floor. Modelled stonework on 
ground floor fa�ades. Detached cistern at front. Structural design 
similar to Bargestraat 48-50.

properties.name: Bargestraat 53, Scharloo
properties.description:
Characteristic Scharloo-type mansion with ridges parallel to 
street. Three parallel hipped roofs over sala, front and rear galleries 
respectively. Rear addition and side wings enclosing a patio. Entrance 
with front stairs provided with curved stone openwork balustrades and 
portico supported by double pillars. Fence with tall pillars.

properties.name: Bargestraat 57, Scharloo / Mansion 'Obra di Man'
properties.description:
Characteristic Scharloo-type mansion. Hipped roof perpendicular
 to the street over sala, front and rear gallery. Rear addition and side
 wings enclosing a patio. Rectangular front fa�ade topped with low 
triangular fronton. Stairs with slightly curved stone openwork 
balustrades. Fence with tall pillars.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area
 and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over 
all fa�ades, pilasters on front corners. Front fa�ade with central door 
and flanking windows provided with weather mouldings. Short front 
terrace, fence with pillars.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 34-36, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey U-shaped structure containing two 
dwellings. Main building and two rear wings covered with hipped roofs. 
Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over fa�ades, plastered 
dentate quoins on front corners. Front fa�ade with doors and flanking 
windows for each unit.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling in side alley. Gable 
roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front 
fa�ade with central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 45, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure, main building of a corral. Gable roof over 
core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Three
 dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century 
top end, oculus and text 'A 1885'.  Front fa�ade with cornice and 
central door with flanking windows. Front addition and short front 
terrace. Kitchen and cistern next to rear gallery.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 46, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof. Plain19th 
century funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Front fa�ade with (probably 
former) central door and flanking windows. Kitchen section with oven 
chimney at rear side.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 48, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small one-storey corner dwelling with a rectangular and L- 
shaped block. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Front fa�ade with central door and windows, profiled cornice and 
pilasters on corners.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped 
roofs, small hipped roof over kitchen. Cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. Kitchen 
with chimney. Detached covered cistern in backyard. Fence with square 
stone pillars.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Building is part of corral
 Frederikstraat 102. Front fa�ade with cornice and corner pilasters. 
Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 51, Otrobanda / 'Mi Rancho'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped roofs, the 
two front roofs smaller than the rear one. Roofs with cement hips and 
ridges with finials. Front fa�ade with ornate cornice and weather 
mouldings, quoins on corners. Central door and flanking windows, all 
provided with fanlights. Fence with square stone pillars.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large cube-shaped two-storey corner structure with almost 
square floor plan. Two parallel hipped roofs of different width. Roofs 
with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front and rear fa�ades laid 
out with openings in one and three vertical axes for the small and large
 hipped roof sections respectively. Walled-in backyard with pedestrian 
gate.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-and-a-half storey dwelling covered with a 
gable roof, gallery covered with a slant roof. Front fa�ade with central
 panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.

properties.name: Belv�d�restraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area
 and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over 
all facades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central panelled 
shutter door and flanking shutter windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena / Landhuis Hel
properties.description:
Plantation complex laid out on an elevated platform. One- 
storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Core area surrounded by 
galleries. Steep hipped roof over core area with slightly lifted eaves 
over surrounding  galleries. Two dormers on both long sides of roof, one
 dormer on short hipped ends. Full-frontage front and rear terrace with 
stairs. Vaulted cistern under rear  terrace. Two additional buildings on
 premises.

properties.name: Berg Altena  61, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Large Scharloo-type urban dwelling with fully enclosed rear 
patio and adjoining structures. Composite roof which consists of a 
system of hipped roofs. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows, pilasters on corners. Full frontage 
front terrace with low stone walls and stone benches on short ends.

properties.name: Berg Altena 10, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small one-storey dwelling covered with a gable roof. Part of a 
set of row-houses along sloping Berg Altena. Front fa�ade with cornice 
and central door with flanking windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena 12-28, Berg Altena.
properties.description:
Set of small one-storey row-houses along sloping Berg Altena. 
Gables of dwellings in a stepped configuration. Front fa�ades with 
cornice and central door with flanking windows for each unit. Doorsteps 
to street level.

properties.name: Berg Altena 30-34, Berg Altena
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure accommodating three small row- 
houses. Gable roofs enclosed by plain gables. Cornice over facades. 
Front facades: nr.30, central door with flanking windows, nrs. 32 and 
34, two tall windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena 36, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small one-storey dwelling covered with a gable roof and 
enclosed by a plain funnel-shaped gable. Part of a set of row-houses. 
Front fa�ade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena 38-40, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Two adjoining small one-storey dwellings covered with one 
continuous gable roof. Part of a set of row-houses. Front fa�ades with 
cornice and central door with flanking windows. Small pilaster between 
units.

properties.name: Berg Altena 4-6, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Core area and rear 
gallery, and adjoining one-storey structure both covered with gable 
roofs enclosed by plain gables.

properties.name: Berg Altena 42, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small one-storey corner dwelling covered with a gable roof. 
Part of a set of row-houses. Front fa�ade with cornice and central door 
with flanking windows. Small pilaster on separation with adjoining 
units.

properties.name: Berg Altena 44,  Berg Altena
properties.description:
Semi-detached small one-storey dwelling as part of a small 
block of three dwellings under one gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped 
gables. Front fa�ade with cornice and central door with flanking 
windows. Steps at door front.

properties.name: Berg Altena 46, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small one-storey dwelling. Middle of a small block of three 
dwellings. One continuous gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. 
Front fa�ade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena 48, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey dwelling as part of a small block of 
three dwellings. One continuous gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped 
gables. Front fa�ade with cornice and central door with flanking 
windows. Four steps at door front.

properties.name: Berg Altena 50-52, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Two small adjoining one-storey structures. Gable roofs enclosed
 by funnel-shaped gables in a stepped configuration. Floor plan with 
core area and rear  gallery. Front fa�ades with two doors and window for
 each unit. No cornices.

properties.name: Berg Altena 54, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Detached 19th century dwelling. Typical Scharloo-type floor 
plan with core area, galleries and side wings enclosing a patio. Front 
fa�ade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Full 
frontage front terrace with stone benches.

properties.name: Berg Altena 58, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey dwelling. Part of a block of three 
dwellings under one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front fa�ade with 
cornice and central door with flanking windows. Full  frontage 
horizontal band over fa�ade.

properties.name: Berg Altena 59, Berg Altena / Mansion 'Puerto Rico'
properties.description:
Large one-storey Scharloo-type urban dwelling with fully 
enclosed rear patio.   Composite roof which consists of a system of 
hipped roofs with dormers. Main section with sala and front gallery. 
Rear gallery and wings covered with U- shaped hipped roof. Fa�ades with 
openings in vertical axes and topped with triangular frontons. Front 
fa�ade with triangular fronton and medallion, central door with flanking
 windows. Front and side stairs to front section.

properties.name: Berg Altena 60, Berg Altena
properties.description:
One-storey middle dwelling of a block of three dwellings under 
one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs
 over front and rear gallery. Front fa�ade with cornice and central door
 with flanking windows.

properties.name: Berg Altena 62, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey dwelling as part of a block of three 
dwellings under one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front fa�ade 
completely altered.

properties.name: Berg Altena 8, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small one-storey corner dwelling. Two gable roofs positioned in
 line and enclosed by plain funnel-shaped gables. Front fa�ade with 
cornice and central door with flanking windows for each section.

properties.name: Bergstraat   8-14,  Berg Altena
properties.description:
Detached structure accommodating four small one-storey row- 
houses. Two continuous gable roofs in a stepped configuration along 
sloping Berg Altena. Plain funnel- shaped gables. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows. Short walled front terrace with 
entrance opposite front door.

properties.name: Bitterstraat 30,  Punda
properties.description:
Three oblong blocks on narrow deep lot positioned almost in 
line. Hipped roofs connected at short ends. Front block with 
two-storeys, other blocks one storey. Front and rear roof with cement 
hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade with shutter window on first 
floor and door on ground floor.

properties.name: Bloksteeg 1, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey corner structure covered with a 
hipped roof. Cornice over fa�ades. Two fa�ades with tall windows laid 
out in four and five vertical axes respectively. Full-frontage 
horizontal bands over fa�ades.

properties.name: Bloksteeg 6, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey 17th/18th-century corner building. Gable roof and 
two dormers. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end
 formed by a small triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Two 
fa�ades with tall windows laid out in two and five vertical axes 
respectively.

properties.name: Boca Sami / Fort on Sint Michielsbaai
properties.description:
Fortifications facing the entrance of Sint Michielsbaai. 
Arrow-shaped design with a platform with shooting gallery closed at rear
 side. Square tower in the middle with a powder room and food storage 
space and staircase to upper platform. Only lower battery and part of 
tower completed. Opposite the main battery is a small battery composed 
of a plain shooting gallery behind arrow-shaped curtain walls.

properties.name: Boldinghstraat 10, Scharloo
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling built against a block 
of row-houses  Boldinghstraat  12-16. Gable roof with plain gable. Front
 fa�ade with plain cornice, central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Boldinghstraat 12-16,  Scharloo
properties.description:
Semi-detached block of three small one-storey row-houses under 
one  continuous gable roof. Front fa�ade with plain cornice and central 
door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling with ridge of gable roof 
parallel to the street  Front fa�ade with flat cornice, central door and
 flanking windows. Short  front terrace with concrete fence.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Ridge of hipped roof 
parallel to the street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over
 facades. Front fa�ade ranging with street, central shutter door and  
flanking shutter windows for each unit.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof with ridge 
parallel to the street. Gables with shoulders and finials as top 
decoration. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice, central door and 
flanking windows. Short  front terrace with concrete fence.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 15, Otrobanda / 'Villa Colombia'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey dwelling. Two parallel hipped roofs with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Slant roof over front gallery. 
Marble tablet above front door with inscription 'Villa Colombia 74-79'. 
Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade ranging with street, central 
shutter door and flanking shutter windows, pilasters on corners.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 17, Otrobanda / 'Quinta  Antonio'
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling covered with a hipped roof 
perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials.Cornice 
over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade ranging with street, central door and 
flanking windows with tunnel- shaped weather mouldings, pilasters on 
corners. Text in plasterwork above front door reading 'Quinta Antonio'.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey dwelling with elevated ground floor. Three 
parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice 
over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with door and flanking windows, pilasters
 on corners. Covered front verandah with double stairs in a symmetrical 
setting.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 24-26, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each 
dwelling covered  by a hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement 
hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade 
with door and window for each unit. Fence with pillars.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 27-33, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached block of four small row-houses positioned 
perpendicular to the street. One continuous gable roof. Street fa�ade: 
plain funnel-shaped gable ranging with the street, clamped central door 
and ditto flanking windows. East fa�ade with three small doors and three
 windows. Two roof chimneys.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roof parallel to the
 street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice on front fa�ade 
only. Front fa�ade with central shutter door and flanking shutter 
windows.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey dwelling. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Plain, flat cornice over 
all fa�ades. Front fa�ade ranging with street. Central door and flanking
 windows.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 36, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner building covered with two parallel 
hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Slant roof over rear 
gallery. Cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade ranging with street. Central
 door and flanking windows. Roof chimney at rear gallery.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey dwelling covered with a hipped roof 
perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front 
fa�ade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 6-8,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each 
dwelling covered  with a plain gable roof with ridges perpendicular to 
the street. Front fa�ade ranging  with the street. Door with steps to 
street for each unit.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached block of two small one-storey twin dwellings. Each 
dwelling covered with a separate hipped roof with cement hips and 
ridges. Slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice on front fa�ade only. 
Front fa�ade ranging with the street, central door and flanking windows 
for each unit.

properties.name: Breedestraat  34-38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to
 street. Gable roof and dormers over main section and adjoining slant 
roofs over front and rear galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top end. Front fa�ade with heavy cornice and windows placed in 
five axes.

properties.name: Breedestraat  37, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Hipped
 roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade: typical fronton 
at top with inward and outward curved, moulded rim and medallion with 
mark '1900'. Three windows flanked with pilasters and set between two 
horizontal full-frontage bands.

properties.name: Breedestraat  42,  Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gable topped with triangular 
fronton above rectangular moulding. Year mark on gable: '1742'. Front 
fa�ade: added front gallery. Top of gallery features moulding and 
horizontal bands over full frontage of fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat  44, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to
 street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Dormer with slant roof and square window.

properties.name: Breedestraat 104, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular 
to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and finials  over  rectangular 
floor plan. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front and side fa�ade laid out in 
three axes. Windows and doors provided with arched fanlights and 
mouldings. Full-frontage balcony and horizontal band over front fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof 
and adjoining slant roof with high end directed to the street. Front 
fa�ade with central medallion placed between cornice and horizontal 
band. Central door and flanking windows topped  with  horizontal band 
and blind arches. Balcony over full frontage of fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 111A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to
 street. Gable roof over two-storey core and lean-to roof over 
one-storey front gallery. Plain funnel- shaped gables. Front fa�ade: 
cornice on core and gallery fa�ade, two shutter windows on core fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 115-117, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel 
to street. Two parallel gable roofs and transverse ditto roofs. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus in decorated 
star. Front fa�ade: cornice, three doors flanked with two windows. 
Full-frontage balcony over fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 120, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small  one-storey structure built against adjoining properties.
 Ridge parallel to street. Gable roofs over T- shaped floor plan. Main 
gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. 
Two front dormers with windows topped by a triangular fronton and 
moulded rims.

properties.name: Breedestraat 125-127, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large two-storey detached structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Heavy 
cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with centrally positioned 
triangular dormer with oculus in star decoration. Central door flanked 
with two pairs of two sash windows with glass bars. Full-frontage 
balcony over fa�ade. .

properties.name: Breedestraat 137-141, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front 
and rear galleries. Two  dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped 
gables with plain top end. Front fa�ade: cornice, three central doors 
flanked by two windows. Full- frontage balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 143-145, Otrobanda / none
properties.description:
Small two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant 
roof over rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped 
gables with plain top end. Front fa�ade: cornice, three windows above 
full- frontage horizontal band.

properties.name: Breedestraat 15-17A, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Gable roof parallel to  street. Front fa�ade with open two- storey 
arcades topped with a richly ornamented central attic structure with 
gable roof. Decorated frieze parapets for arcades. Ditto for attic 
structure flanked with stone openwork parapet.

properties.name: Breedestraat 151-153, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street . Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Heavy cornice 
continuing round the fa�ades. Pointed gables. Front fa�ade: central door
 flanked by two windows. Full frontage balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 155-157, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure made up of a main 
section and flanking one-and two-storey sections. Main section with 
gable roof with gable and hipped end perpendicular to street. Gable with
 full-frontage moulding topped with a semicircular fronton. Balcony and 
arched leaded fanlights above balcony doors and windows.

properties.name: Breedestraat 163-165, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached block of two adjoining one-storey buildings with 
two identical street fa�ades. Gable roofs perpendicular to street. 
Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular gable tops.

properties.name: Breedestraat 167-169, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Two parallel hipped roofs. Heavy cornice over front and side fa�ades. 
Pilasters on corners of first floor. Front fa�ade with central panelled 
shutter door flanked with two tall shutter windows. Central front 
balcony and wooden side terrace.

properties.name: Breedestraat 17, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and 
rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17A. Front fa�ade 
with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather
 mouldings. Front balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 170-172, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Three parallel gable roofs over core area and galleries. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable ends. Heavy cornice over 
front and side fa�ade. Typical 19th century architectural details.

properties.name: Breedestraat 171-173, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular 
to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Heavy 
cornice across front and side fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in three 
axes: shutter windows on second floor and shutter doors on first floor. 
Full frontage wooden balcony and profiled pilasters on corners.

properties.name: Breedestraat 174
properties.description:
Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of 
two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core
 area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with 
triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over 
front fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 176, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of 
two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core
 area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with 
triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over 
front fa�ade. Side entrance gate with pointed gable.

properties.name: Breedestraat 179-181, Otrobanda / 'Hotel Estoril'
properties.description:
Two adjoined two-storey structures covered with gable and 
hipped roofs respectively. Heavy cornice. Front fa�ade with two doors 
and balcony in asymmetrical position. One and three windows on sides of 
balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 17A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and 
rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17. Front fa�ade 
with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather
 mouldings. Front balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 180-182, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey building as the eastern part of a large detached 
structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward 
curved gable with arched top. Front fa�ade with five tall shutter 
windows and wooden front balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 183-185, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof parallel to Breedestraat. Front fa�ade with heavy cornice and
 three doors with weather mouldings.

properties.name: Breedestraat 184-186, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey building as the western part of a large detached 
structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward 
curved gable with arched top. Front balcony.

properties.name: Breedestraat 187, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel 
to street. Gable roofs at  the front side and hipped roofs at the rear 
side. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable tops and half oculus.
 Front fa�ade: cornice and three tall windows on first floor.

properties.name: Breedestraat 188,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Typical small semi-detached one-storey structure built on 
narrow and deep lot. Oblong gable roof. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped 
gable with 19th century top end. Wide opening with weather moulding on 
ground floor closed with panelled doors with side lights. Side gate with
 access to backyard.

properties.name: Breedestraat 192 A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey structure situated on off-street 
premises. Major building of a corral. Core area with galleries on three 
sides. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Elevated front terrace. 
Access from  Breedestraat through typical arched alleyway.

properties.name: Breedestraat 2, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey corner structure alongside Bloksteeg
 dating from the18th century. Front gallery added in 19th century. Gable
 roof with dormers. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century 
top end. Fa�ade lay- out with windows in two vertical axes, 
full-frontage horizontal bands.

properties.name: Breedestraat 22, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached 18th century three-storey structure. Gable roof 
parallel to street. Front fa�ade with two-storey arcades topped with a 
richly ornamented central attic structure with gable roof. Six-bay 
arcades supported by belly-shaped columns and closed with shutter 
windows equipped with fanlights. Decorated frieze parapets for arcades 
and attic structure.

properties.name: Breedestraat 25, Punda
properties.description:
Small two-storey structure built against larger adjoining 
properties. Gable roof  perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade: 
funnel-shaped gable with semicircular top end . Added front gallery 
covered with lean-to roof. Two shutter windows in gallery fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 27, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Forms one structure with Breedestraat 29. Gable roof perpendicular  to 
street. Front fa�ade topped with plain gable, windows laid out in two 
axes. Full-frontage profiled horizontal bands.

properties.name: Breedestraat 29, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey double structure built against adjoining 
properties. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 27. Two parallel gable
 roofs perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade topped with two plain 
gables, windows laid out in four axes. Profiled horizontal bands over 
full frontage of fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 3, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties and 
forming one structure with Breedestraat 5-7. Gable roof parallel to 
street. Four dormers on front side of roof. Front fa�ade with two-storey
 open arcades topped by two frontons with moulded rim and ornamented 
infill with medallion. Eight-bay arcades supported by belly-shaped 
columns.

properties.name: Breedestraat 31, Otrobanda / Santa Ana Church
properties.description:
Detached church building in densely built-up main street of 
Otrobanda. Church tower facing Consci�ntiesteeg and chapels facing 
Breedestraat. Floor plan with nave and flanking aisles. Fa�ades: grey 
plasterwork finishing with traced joints suggesting large stone blocks. 
Arched windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped gables covered 
with gabled cover plates.

properties.name: Breedestraat 31, Otrobanda / Santa Ana Parish Hall
properties.description:
Two-storey semi-detached structure with ridges perpendicular to
 street. Two structurally similar blocks covered with gable roofs. 
Similar architecture as church building. Fa�ades: grey plasterwork 
finishing with traced joints suggesting large stone blocks. Arched 
windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped gables covered with 
gabled cover plates.

properties.name: Breedestraat 33, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey semi-detached structure. Gable roof perpendicular 
to street. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top
 end. Fa�ade with windows laid out in two axes. Windows with moulded 
frame. Full- frontage horizontal bands over fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 33-37, 41, Otrobanda / 'La Bonanza'
properties.description:
Complex made up of three two-storey structures. Nr.33: ridge 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof with hipped end over rectangular 
floor plan. Front fa�ade: triangular fronton with profiled moulding and 
dentils, fluted corner pilasters. Nr. 35-37: ridge  parallel to street. 
Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over front and 
rear galleries. Inward and outward curved 18th century gable. Wooden 
balcony over front and side fa�ade. Nr.41: situated in backyard. Gable 
roof with dormers over core area, slant roof over front gallery.

properties.name: Breedestraat 42, Otrobanda / 'Casa Cesar'
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over main section and 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Front fa�ade: plain
 cornice and two windows set between two full- frontage horizontal 
bands.

properties.name: Breedestraat 43-45, Otrobanda / 'Casa Nena'
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular  to
 street. Hipped roof and adjoining slant roof on east side. Front 
fa�ade: profiled cornice and three doors with balcony flanked with two 
tall windows.

properties.name: Breedestraat 44, Punda
properties.description:
Large two-storey cube-shaped structure with ridge perpendicular
 to street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Profiled projecting
 cornice with dentils over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with triangular 
fronton. Three windows laid out between fluted Corinthian pilasters. 
Fa�ade richly ornamented  with elements referring to the classicist 
period.

properties.name: Breedestraat 46, Otrobanda / 'El Diamante'
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end and oculus. 
Full-frontage horizontal band over front fa�ade. Forms one large 
structure with Breedestraat 48.

properties.name: Breedestraat 48, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Full frontage 
horizontal band over front fa�ade. Forms one large structure with 
Breedestraat 46.

properties.name: Breedestraat 5-7, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure forming one structure with
 Breedestraat 3.  Gable roof parallel to street. Two dormers on front 
side of roof. Front fa�ade with two-storey arcades topped by a fronton 
with moulded rims and ornamented infill with medallion. Four-bay arcades
 supported by belly-shaped columns and closed with shutter windows with 
fanlights.

properties.name: Breedestraat 56-58, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure with patio enclosed by
 side wings.   Main roof with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roofs 
over main building and wings. Cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Cornice and pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with a central pair of 
doors with balcony and two flanking pairs of windows. Doors and windows 
with arched fanlights and ditto mouldings.

properties.name: Breedestraat 72, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Gable roof with  ridge parallel to street. Front fa�ade with cornice and
 two windows.

properties.name: Breedestraat 74, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Two in line positioned hipped roofs. Cornice over all fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade with two square windows.

properties.name: Breedestraat 75,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof 
with two dormers on both sides of roof, slant roof over rear gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front fa�ade with a 
typical central addition flanked with balconies above one-storey front 
gallery. Addition topped with triangular fronton, dentate quoins on 
corners.

properties.name: Breedestraat 77-79,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Roof with hipped and gable end over rectangular floor plan. One 
central and three side dormers. Front fa�ade: profiled cornice, central 
doors with balcony flanked with tall windows. Side fa�ade with four 
windows on first floor.

properties.name: Breedestraat 8, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade: funnel- shaped gable 
with 19th century top end. Fa�ade lay-out with windows in three vertical
 axes, full-frontage horizontal bands.

properties.name: Breedestraat 80-82, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. T-shaped gable roof with dormers over rectangular floor plan. 
Adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Truncated gables. Heavy 
profiled cornice, dentate coins on corners. Front fa�ade: first floor 
with sash windows with glass bars laid out in five axes, two dormers 
with truncated triangular field.

properties.name: Breedestraat 81, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey corner structure with ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front 
gallery. Two front dormers with triangular fronton. Inward and outward 
curved gables with arched top.

properties.name: Breedestraat 83-85, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over core area and adjoining 
slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Front fa�ade: cornice with 
drapery ornamentation, three shutter windows with fanlights on first 
floor, full-frontage horizontal bands over fa�ade.

properties.name: Breedestraat 87, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. 
Ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof over elongated floor plan. Front 
fa�ade: cornice and horizontal bands across full frontage of fa�ade. 
Fa�ade laid out in three axes with shutter windows on first and second 
floor.

properties.name: Breedestraat 9-11, Punda
properties.description:
Three storey semi-detached structure with gable roof 
perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade with triangular fronton above 
heavy cornice. Fa�ade with sash windows with glass bars laid-out in two 
axes. Full-frontage horizontal bands, corner pilasters.

properties.name: Breedestraat 95-97, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular 
to street. Richly ornamented structure. Hipped roof over rectangular 
floor plan. Front  fa�ade  with profiled cornice and triangular fronton 
with dentils. Oculus in fronton. Fa�ade laid out in three axes: second 
floor with tall shutter windows, first floor with doors with 
semicircular fanlights and weather mouldings opening to full-frontage

properties.name: Brievengat / Landhuis Brievengat
properties.description:
Large one-storey structure laid out on an elevated platform. 
Rectangular core area with front and rear gallery. Gable roof over core 
area enclosed by gables with ogee-shaped rims and semicircular top end, 
adjoining slant roof over galleries. Four dormers on both sides of roof.
 Open sixteen-arched front gallery. Adjoining cistern. Large 
full-frontage front terrace with two towers on corners and central 
stairs to estate grounds. Kitchen at rear side connected with covered  
corridor. Interior: arched openings between core area and side 
galleries. Additional structures: corrals, magasina, cisterns and lime 
kiln.

properties.name: Brionplein 1, Otrobanda / Sint Martinus College
properties.description:
Two structures, part of St. Martinus College: A detached 
three-storey structure covered with a hipped roof. Fa�ades with cornice 
and tall windows with arched fanlights. An oblong two-storey structure 
covered with two hipped roofs. Front fa�ade with tall paired windows 
with arched fanlights. South fa�ade with two-storey gallery.

properties.name: Brionweg 129, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with L-shaped floor plan 
and ditto hipped roof with narrow rear gallery under a slant roof. 
Cement hips and ridges with finials. Fa�ades with cornice and weather 
mouldings above door and windows. Front fa�ade with central panelled 
shutter door and shutter windows.

properties.name: Brionweg 20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
alley. Hipped roof and adjoining slant roof at rear side. Front fa�ade 
with cornice and central door flanked by two windows. Short front 
terrace and stone wall fence.

properties.name: Brionweg 21-23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling with ridge parallel to 
street. Originally covered with two parallel hipped roofs. Fa�ade with 
cornice and corner pilasters on a base, and weather mouldings above door
 and windows.  Small detached addition with hipped roof at rear side 
(nr. 21).

properties.name: Brionweg 50-58, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey assembly of building blocks with a 
composite floor and roof plan: two- and three-storey structures covered 
with hipped roofs.  Detached one-storey addition and a patio. Front 
fa�ade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and door with 
flanking windows on ground floor. Cistern and external chimney on 
premises.

properties.name: Brionweg 89-103, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached block containing eight small one-storey row- houses 
situated off Brionweg. One continuous gable roof. Block accommodates 
four pairs of  dwellings enclosed by staggered gables due to sloping 
terrain.

properties.name: Caracasbaai / Fort Beekenburg Compound
properties.description:
Fort compound laid out on the Caracasbaai peninsula with 
components: Fort Beekenburg (early 18th century): tower, shaped as a 
truncated cone, as the main battery and an adjoining lower battery 
facing Caracasbaai. A quarantine station (1883): oblong two-storey 
structure covered with a hipped roof. Arched openings on first floor and
 arched windows on second floor of long fa�ades, additions on side 
fa�ades. A warehouse with cistern (late 19th century): rectangular 
structure covered with a hipped roof, used to smoke the contaminated 
goods of ships.

properties.name: Carhagenastraat  2-12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached block accommodating six small one-storey row- 
houses. One continuous roof with hipped ends. Tiny flat cornice, 
regularly spaced roof tiles as rain gutters. Central door and flanking 
windows for each unit.

properties.name: Charlottestraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over 
adjoining two-storey east gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables marked with year of construction. External oven and
 chimney. Front fa�ade ranging with the street, six tall windows on 
first floor and three alternating doors and windows on ground floor.

properties.name: Charlottestraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridge perpendicular 
to street. Main section covered with hipped roof, central front addition
 under gable roof. Plain cornice over fa�ades. Front fence with stone 
footing and wooden bars.

properties.name: Charlottestraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging  with the street. 
Original roof replaced by flat roof. Fa�ades with plain profiled 
cornice. Moulded rectangle with diamond shape above doors in front 
fa�ade.

properties.name: Columbusstraat 15,  Punda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridges 
perpendicular to street. Two gable roofs and dormers with truncated 
funnel-shaped gable. Heavy profiled cornice along three fa�ades. Corner 
pilasters of piled blocks. Regularly spaced windows with weather 
mouldings on first floor.

properties.name: Concordiastraat 5, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey dwelling. Composite floor plan. 
Cantilevered hipped roofs of different height. Concrete flat roof over 
front terrace. Shutter windows with top and bottom mouldings.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 24-26, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel 
to street. Gable roofs over core area and rear gallery, adjoining slant 
roof over front gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with triangular fronton 
and plain 19th century top ends. Front fa�ade with doors and windows 
placed in three vertical axes.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 28-32, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Dormers on both sides of  roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th
 century top end. Front fa�ade with cornice, four shutter windows on 
firs floor and full- frontage horizontal band.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 33-35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof over main building. Gable roof over additional 
building made up of a loggia above a former cistern. Stone staircase 
connects loggia with garden. Fa�ades with regularly spaced tall windows.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 35A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Hipped roof with dormers over rectangular floor plan. Heavy 
profiled cornice with rounded corners. Dormers and windows equipped with
 a triangular fronton supported by two pilasters. Windows on first floor
 with moulded frames and triangular moulded frontons. Horizontal band 
over fa�ades.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 36, Otrobanda / Santa Ana Parish Hall
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure covered with gable roof. 
Fa�ade facing the alley features a stepped gable and arched windows. 
Fa�ades: grey plasterwork finishing with traced joints suggesting large 
stone blocks. Arched windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped 
gables covered with gabled cover plates.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge 
parallel to alley.  One-and-a-half storey core area covered with a gable
 roof and front gallery with slant roof. Front dormer. Front fa�ade with
 central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 40-42A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof over 
core area and slant roofs over two-storey front and rear gallery.  Two 
dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and outward curved gables with 
classical moulding and arched top end. Front fa�ade has six tall shutter
 windows and full-frontage mouldings.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 44, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey cube-shaped structure with flat roof 
set back from building line. Around fa�ades continuing cornice above 
short pilasters which rest on moulding. Above cornice slightly set back 
parapet.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 44A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure  with  ridge perpendicular 
to alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over 
gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Gables enclosed by 
funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus within 
star-shaped plasterwork.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 46, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century 
top end at east side. Front fa�ade with heavy profiled cornice.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 61, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi detached corner structure  with ridge parallel to 
alley. Two adjoining main buildings. Front  building: two parallel gable
 roofs and adjoining slant roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 
triangular frontons as top ends. Rear building: three hipped roofs. 
Continuing cornice around fa�ades and tablet on front fa�ade carrying 
year 1849.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 63, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to
 alley. Hipped roof. Front fa�ade with plain cornice, panelled shutter 
door and shutter window.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 65-67, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Three gable roofs parallel 
to the alleyway. Gables with a truncated top end and knob ornament. 
Front fa�ade with full frontage cornice and horizontal bands. Side 
entrance gate with similar gable as main building.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 68, Otrobanda / 'La Moda de Paris'
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front 
fa�ade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de 
Paris' in plasterwork. Interior with staircase to wooden gallery 
following the interior walls on the first floor.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 69, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with 
dormers and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Gable roofs on side
 of alleyway enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top 
ends. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking shutter windows with 
tunnel-shaped weather mouldings.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 70, Otrobanda / 'La Moda de Paris'
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front 
fa�ade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de 
Paris' in plasterwork. Doors and windows on ground floor shut off with 
folding panelled doors, panels with diagonal lathwork.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 71-73, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers on both sides of 
roof. Funnel-shaped gables with plain 19th century top end. Front fa�ade
 laid out in three axes: three tall windows on first floor and a central
 door with flanking windows on ground floor.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 72, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Ridge 
perpendicular to  alley. Cornice and full frontage horizontal  bands on 
front  and side fa�ade. Front fa�ade laid out in two axes: two tall 
windows on first floor and a door and window on ground floor.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 74, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. 
Gable roof enclosed by plain gables with truncated top end. Entrance 
door and windows provided with plain weather mouldings. Tablet in front 
fa�ade with year 1854.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 76-78, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Two 
parallel gable roofs enclosed by plain funnel-shaped gables. Heavy 
cornice. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes: three tall windows on 
first floor and a central door with flanking windows on ground floor.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 77-81, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Corner structure with composite fa�ade lay-out. Two-storey main
 building covered with gable roof with four dormers and double inward 
and outward curved gable with year of construction Ao 1788. Two-storey 
addition with slightly set back wooden structure on first floor.

properties.name: Consci�ntiesteeg 80-82, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey  corner structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof and dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over 
front gallery. Front fa�ade laid out in four axes: four shutter windows 
on first floor and two pairs of an entrance door and window on the 
ground floor suggesting a double dwelling.

properties.name: Cornelis Dirksweg 2, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two adjoining small 
buildings. Front structure: hipped roof, cornice and  pilasters on 
corners . Rear structure: gable roof over core area and slant roof over 
rear gallery enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end 
and oculus.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat  22, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof with ridge 
perpendicular to the street. Structurally similar to Curacaostraat 20, 
and apparently built simultaneously. Front fa�ade: small cornice, 
central door and flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps to 
street. Gate in wall with low gable top between the two dwellings.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 12-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure accommodating five small 
dwellings. Oblong  hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to the street. 
Front part is structurally similar to Curacaostraat 22, and apparently 
built simultaneously. Front fa�ade: small cornice, central door and 
flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps to street. Gate in wall 
with low gable top between the two dwellings.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Building blocks of 
different size  covered with a composite set of hipped roofs and a tent 
roof. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: windows of 
first floor laid out in four axes. Wooden balcony on stone columns 
facing Arubastraat.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Main block covered with a gable 
roof. Adjoining rear additions with a gable and a slant roof. Front 
block enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with flat moulding and 19th 
century top and star oculus. Front fa�ade: central door with flanking 
windows, weather mouldings above openings. Doorstep platform with steps 
to street.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area 
and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery enclosed by plain gables. 
Front fa�ade: plain cornice, central shutter door and flanking shutter 
windows. Doorstep to street.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 50, Otrobanda / 'Kranshi Bieuw'
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey structure set back from building 
line. H-shaped floor plan covered with three hipped roofs. Cement hips 
and ridges with finials. Continuing profiled cornice over fa�ades, 
dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade: central shutter door flanked 
with three shutter windows with weather mouldings on both sides. Two 
shutter windows on each wing. Large covered cistern with two arched 
aqueducts behind west wing.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Truncated gables with heavy 
profiled moulding and topped with a knob ornament. Front fa�ade: 
cornice, central door and flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps
 to street on both sides.

properties.name: Cura�aostraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Two parallel gable roofs. Gables
 of front section covered with a flat moulding and topped with remnants 
of an ornament. Front fa�ade: cornice and pilasters on corners, central 
door and flanking windows, profiled weather mouldings above openings. 
Wall with door entrance to backyard on west side.

properties.name: Da Costa Gomezplein 3, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure covered with three hipped 
roofs with finials. Fa�ades with continuing cornice and full frontage 
double horizontal bands. Windows positioned in axes.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached three-storey structure. Gable roof enclosed by two 
funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Fa�ades with
 tall shutter windows and full-frontage horizontal bands. Wing with 
arcade gallery perpendicular to the building not original, rebuilt after
 collapse during restoration in 1989.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 39-41, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two storey structure  with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Inward and outward curved gables and profiled mouldings. Ditto 
for dormers. Covered two-storey balcony structure over full frontage of 
front fa�ade.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 43, Otrobanda / Kura  Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure situated off the street. Two in 
line, joined gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Adjoining 
gallery covered with slant roof.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 5-13, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.description:
Complex of L-shaped and rectangular two-storey detached 
structures. L-shaped building covered with hipped roof and dormers with 
inward and outward curved top end, consoles and cheeks. Stairs to first 
floor with Ysselsteen masonry. Fa�ade facing Sint Annabaai with arched 
gallery.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 67-69, Otrobanda / Kas di Alma Blou
properties.description:
Detached two-story structure with ridge parallel to street. Two
 parallel gable roofs enclosed by 19th century funnel-shaped gables. 
Three dormers on  sides of roof. Adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Front fa�ade: windows and doors laid out in five axes. Central 
balcony supported by columns. Five rhombic ornaments below cornice.

properties.name: De Ruyterkade 21-23, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure accommodating two similar buildings in one
 block. Hipped roof with two dormers with broken arched fronton and ball
 ornament. Front fa�ade with ornamented cornice and six tall windows 
with profiled weather mouldings.

properties.name: De Ruyterkade z/n, Punda / Old Meat Market
properties.description:
Detached concrete-built one-storey structure with ridge 
parallel to street. Hipped roof covered with slates. Rectangular floor 
plan with seventeen arched openings with clamped doors opening to 
seventeen-arch arcade gallery. Heavy cornice with low parapet.

properties.name: Dominguito / Landhuis Zuurzak (Sorsaka)
properties.description:
Country estate with a U-shaped floor plan laid out on terraces 
and used as a country house in the 19th century. Main section with 
gallery and side wings enclosing a patio. Arcade between side wings as 
entrance and patio closure. Continuing gable roof over main section and 
side wings, slant roof over gallery. Additional structures include 
typical  tower structures with pyramidal roof.

properties.name: Draaiweg 10, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers
 with triangular fronton on each side of roof. Kitchen with chimney at 
gallery-end. Front fa�ade with high plain cornice, clamped door flanked 
with one opening on one side and two clamped shutters on the other.

properties.name: Dwergsteeg 5-11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Gable roofs with dormers 
over core area and rear gallery and slant roof over adjoining front 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with triangular fronton at top end and 
ellipse-shaped oculus. Front fa�ade ranging with the street, three doors
 on ground floor and four windows on first floor. Full-frontage 
horizontal bands.

properties.name: Eenhoornstraat 1-5, Domi
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey block accommodating three small 
row-houses. One continuous gable roof with flat concrete tile roofing 
over core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 20th century 
top end. Front fa�ade: central door and flanking windows for each unit. 
Door with steps to street. Rear additions with slant roofs over kitchen 
units. Walled backyard with gate.

properties.name: Eenhoornstraat 7, Domi
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure as part of a set of small 
row-houses. Roof is part of one continuous gable roof with flat concrete
 tile roofing over core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 
20th century top end. Front fa�ade: central door and flanking windows. 
Door with steps to street. Rear addition with slant roof over kitchen 
unit. Walled backyard with gate.

properties.name: Elleboogstraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with ridge 
perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Cornice
 and horizontal band over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with two tall windows on
 first floor and door on ground floor.

properties.name: Emmastraat  30-32 , Otrobanda / 'Keizershof'
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure accommodating two separate 
buildings with a narrow space in between. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street, covered central corridor. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade
 laid out in three axes with central panelled shutter door flanked by 
shutter windows, both on ground and first floor. Central wooden balcony 
with balusters made from wooden fretwork.

properties.name: Emmastraat 10-14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel
 to street. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in five
 axes with central door flanked by two windows on both sides, on ground 
and first floor. Wooden front balcony in centre. Short front terrace 
with pillared fence. Stone staircase to first floor on side fa�ade. 
Adjacent to main structure: detached two-storey structure with high end 
of slant roof on streetside.

properties.name: Emmastraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Long gable roof with a 
gable in the middle and at the roof's ends. No cornice. Heavy rainstorms
 destroyed the  corner section in 1999.

properties.name: Emmastraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by gables with shoulders, 
19th century top end with oculus in star-shaped plasterwork. Roof with 
two dormers on each side. Front fa�ade: tall window in gable, door and 
window on ground floor. Small walled fence on both sides of fa�ade.

properties.name: Emmastraat 26, Otrobanda / Luna Blou complex
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure built on half-storey basement. 
Hipped roof with heavy cornice over all fa�ades and topped with stone 
ornaments at roof corners. Front fa�ade with entrance door and windows 
laid out in three axes. Full frontage balcony with balustrade of stone 
openwork.

properties.name: Emmastraat 5-7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by funnel- shaped gables 
with ellipse-shaped oculus. Formerly equipped with lower gables. In 
backyard almost similar structure with ditto gables and 19th century top
 end with semicircular oculus. Door in front fa�ade. Front wall with 
pointed gable over gate.

properties.name: Emmastraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Front  fa�ade: five tall windows 
on first floor, central door and flanking windows in two pairs. On side 
of street a cistern with flat roof accessible by a stone staircase with 
balustrade.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 10-12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Cornice continuing round fa�ades, dentate quoins on corners. 
Front fa�ade laid out in three axes with central door and flanking 
windows, central wooden balcony with balusters of fretwork. Fa�ade 
flanked with two gates with triangular frontons. Walled-in garden and 
extra gate.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to 
street. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped  gable with plain 19th century top 
end and oculus, shutter door and  window. Building is part of a group of
 two similar structures (nr.9) separated by a gate giving access to the 
premises.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof parallel 
to street and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Two dormers on 
each side of roof. Pointed gable with shoulders, rhombic oculus and 
truncated top with knob ornament. Front fa�ade with cornice, central 
door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Side entrance with 
gate with triangular fronton.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 15-17, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Heavy cornice over all fa�ades, dentate quoins 
on corners. Front fa�ade with two doors and window on ground floor. 
Structure is flanked by two gates with triangular frontons.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and
 ridge with finials. Fa�ade with heavy cornice, fluted pilasters on 
corners. Front fa�ade with central door and windows with weather 
mouldings and typical ornaments. Front fence with stone pillars and 
bars.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 3, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof 
perpendicular to street. Dormers with inward and outward curved fronton 
on both sides of roof. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade with pointed shoulder gable and truncated top with
 knob ornament and rhombic oculus. Central door with flanking windows on
 ground floor.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area
 and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Front fa�ade: door in core 
and window in gallery fa�ade. Side fa�ade: plain  cornice, central door 
and two flanking windows on each side.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 33-39, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure containing four row-houses. One 
continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to 
street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two 
similar structures (nr. 43-47)

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 43-47, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure containing three row-houses. One 
continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to 
street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two 
similar structures (nr. 33-39)

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area
 and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 
flat moulding and plain 19th century top end. Front fa�ade with central 
door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one story structure with side entrance to 
premises. Gable roof parallel to street. Roof on one side closed by 
funnel-shaped gable with flat moulding and 19th century top end. Front 
fa�ade with door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 6A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof 
parallel to street. Dormers with triangular fronton on both sides of 
roof. Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders, oculus and truncated top and 
knob ornament. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure. Low gable roof 
parallel to street on one side closed by truncated funnel- shaped gable 
with semicircular top end. Front fa�ade with shutter door and window.
