Gate as a side entrance to premises.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to 
street. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped  gable with plain 19th century top 
end and oculus, shutter door and  window. Building is part of a group of
 two similar structures (nr.11) separated by a gate giving access to the
 premises.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat  22, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Hipped roof with slate roofing and eaves gutter on brackets. Wooden 
balcony on front fa�ade. Fa�ades: rustic work of piled concrete blocks 
and three plain horizontal belts, two above openings on ground and first
 floor and one at balcony level.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 17-19 , Otrobanda / 'Villa Legal'
properties.description:
Detached group of two structures with corridor in between and 
connected by continuing cornice only. Hipped roofs over core and rear 
gallery. Hipped roof perpendicular to street for smaller structure. 
Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: continuing cornice 
and corner pilasters, panelled shutter doors and windows and panel with 
inscription 'Villa Legal'. Cistern with slant roof in backyard.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block made up of two dwelling structures. 
Two parallel hipped roofs. Profiled cornice and horizontal belt over 
fa�ades, plain pilasters on corners. Fa�ade surface with appearance of 
rustic work of piled blocks. Staircase and balcony newly added elements.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped 
roof. Plain rectangular floor plan with kitchen addition. Cement hips 
and ridge with finials. Shutter doors with side lights and shutter 
windows. Openings with plastered frame.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to street. 
Cornice and horizontal band over fa�ades. Weather mouldings on pseudo 
consoles above all openings. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows.
 Front fa�ade: lay-out with five axes and divided in three sections by 
pilasters. Central section with concrete balcony and consoles. West 
fa�ade: staircase to first floor and concrete openwork balustrade.

properties.name: Florencestraat 10, Otrobanda / 'Villa Rosa'
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Two hipped roofs with 
ridges parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front 
fa�ade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows 
with profiled weather mouldings. Above front door: name of building and 
year 1911 applied in plasterwork.

properties.name: Florencestraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two hipped roofs with overhangs. Cement hips and finials. Front 
section is a wooden structure, rear section is stone-built. Front fa�ade
 with central door and flanking shutter windows, balcony with stone 
openwork balustrade and two stairs to street.

properties.name: Fort Amsterdam / Fort Amsterdam and Governor's Palace
properties.description:
Trapezium-shaped fortification dating back from 1635. Four 
bastions (Vlaggestok, Nieuwe Batterij, De Klok, De Kat) connected by 
curtain walls. The fort houses the Governor's palace, the Fort Church 
(1766) and the former General Secretary (1857). The Governor's Palace is
 built between the western bastions as a two storey structure made up of
 two adjoining elongated pavilions covered with hipped roofs. Ground 
floor of palace provides entrance gateway to fort.

properties.name: Fort Amsterdam 17 / Fort Amsterdam / Council of Ministers
properties.description:
Detached two-storey cube-shaped structure in inner court of the
 fort. Three parallel hipped roofs replaced (in the 1950's) by one 
hipped roof with a flat section in the middle. All fa�ades equipped with
 a heavy cornice with dentils. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with 
sash windows. Small balcony on first floor. Pilasters on both sides of 
central door section and on corners.

properties.name: Fort Nassauweg 2-8, Parera
properties.description:
Detached structure accommodating four one-storey row- houses 
under one continuous gable roof. Plain cornice and funnel-shaped gables 
with 19th century top end.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 101-103, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure 
accommodating two row-houses. Gable roof over core area and adjoining 
slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers on  both sides of 
roof. Funnel-shaped separation walls and gable with shoulders and 19th 
century top. Oven and chimney in backyard of dwelling.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 102, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Main structure of corral. Detached structure with gable roof 
and adjoining slant roof over two-storey core area and front gallery. 
One-storey rear gallery covered with slant roof. Funnel-shaped gables 
with oculus and 19th century top end. Front fa�ade laid out in three 
axes with windows on first  floor and central door and flanking windows 
on ground floor. Front terrace flanked with stone benches.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 108-112, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached structure. Three-storey core area with gable 
roof. Rear gallery roof separated by a two-storey balcony section. 
Two-storey front gallery with slant roof. Front gallery fa�ade laid out 
in five vertical axes with three doors opening to a front balcony on 
columns. Loggia with staircase access on side fa�ade.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. 
Front fa�ade with doors and windows positioned in three axes and topped 
with a triangular fronton. Profiled cornice along fa�ades.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109A -109B, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey behind Frederikstraat 109. Gable roof 
enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Roof with 
overhangs. Balcony removed.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 113, Otrobanda / 'Kas di Kanchi'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 over two adjoining rectangular blocks of different length. U -shaped 
verandah with gingerbread fretwork around smaller block. Fa�ades 
equipped with profiled cornice, weather mouldings and quoins on corners.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 114-124, Otrobanda / 'Kura di Shon Ki'
properties.description:
Corral compound with main building and open yard surrounded by 
secondary structures. Main structure with gable roof over core area. 
Four dormers with moulded triangular top end on each side of roof. Front
 gallery interrupted by a two-storey structure. Adjoining side wing. 
Front terrace with stone balustrade and stairs to yard. Servants 
quarters with one continuous lean-to roof leaning to front wall of 
premises. Two cisterns.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 117-119, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped 
roofs and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front fa�ade 
originally laid out with central door and flanking windows on ground and
 first floor. Concrete balcony probably replacement of wooden one.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 123, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs 
with ridges parallel to street. Cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with 
shutter windows and doors positioned in four axes. Front concrete 
balcony probably replacement of wooden one.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 127-133, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Typical oblong 
floor plan parallel to street. Gable roof over core area. Slant roofs 
over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gables with 
profiled mouldings. Five dormers with inward and outward curved gables 
on each side of gable roof. Front fa�ade laid out in nine vertical axes.
 Openings topped with arches in block pattern connected with moulded 
bands. Seriously damaged by fire in 1999.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 128-132, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roof over gallery enclosed by gables with oculus. Roof 
chimney on east side. Entrance gate at Frederikstraat with stone 
pillars.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 136-144, Otrobanda / 'Kura di Shon Toms'
properties.description:
Large walled-in corral compound. Two-storey main building with 
hipped roof and one-storey front, side and rear gallery. Cement hips and
 ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: core area with four tall windows and
 front gallery with alternating doors and windows. Walled-in front 
terrace with stairs to yard. Additional structures include a cistern and
 service quarters covered with a lean-to roof leaning to wall of corral.
 Similar small structure at the corral entrance. Access to main building
 lined with low stone walls.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 146-148, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Main building of a corral which also includes the structures 
Naniesteeg 6-22. Detached corner structure. One-and-a-half storey core 
area. Gable roof with three dormers on both sides and adjoining slant 
roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with flat 
moulding and small  triangular fronton. Front fa�ade with central door 
flanked with two and three windows on sides. Central balcony with stairs
 to street.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 16-18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled 
cornice over fa�ades. Front  fa�ade with three axes: three tall shutter 
doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on 
ground floor. Almost full-frontage balcony supported by two by two 
columns which form part of the fence.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 20-24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area 
and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 
19th century top end. Front fa�ade with three axes: three tall shutter 
doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on 
ground floor. Gate next to fa�ade with inward and outward curved wall 
and access to staircase to first floor.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Profiled cornice  over fa�ades, dentate coins on corners. Front 
fa�ade laid out in five vertical axes. Triangular frontons above windows
 and doors. Almost full- frontage balcony supported by columns which 
form part of the fence.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure set back from the street. 
Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery 
enclosed by two funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and 
oculus. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 36-38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs with 
ridges parallel to the street. Cornice along all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: 
four tall windows on first floor, two doors and three windows in 
alternating sequence. Gate with triangular fronton on west side.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front fa�ade: 
central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 75A/B/C, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey 
front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to 
street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to 
street. Cornice and fluted pilasters. Front terrace .

properties.name: Frederikstraat 86, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Hipped roof with 
ridge perpendicular to street. Profiled cantilevered cornice supported 
by brackets. Symmetrical fa�ade with central section with entrance door 
and two flanking bay windows forming two balconies on top.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 89, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey 
front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to 
street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to 
street. Cornice over fa�ades, fluted pilasters. Symmetrical front fa�ade
 with two central doors and one window on each side.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 91-93, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached corner structure with composite roof plan. 
Two-storey front section: two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement 
hips and ridges with finials. One-storey rear section: side wings with 
gable roofs enclosing a patio. Wings connected by an aqueduct. Front 
fa�ade laid out in three axes: central door with wooden balcony and 
flanking windows, three doors on ground floor, profiled cornice and 
dentate quoins.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 94, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey structure with composite roof plan of
 hipped roofs. Front section: three hipped roofs parallel to street. 
Rear section: side wing structure with parallel hipped roofs 
perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade laid out in  three axes, front 
terrace. (Fa�ade presently not revealed because of covered and enclosed 
terrace)

properties.name: Frederikstraat 96, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey corner structure. Steep hipped roof. 
Dormers with triangular fronton right above cornice on both sides of 
roof, one marked with star, the other with year 1857. Additional 
one-storey structures on premises with 19th century funnel-shaped 
gables. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with central doors and two 
flanking windows on each side, front balcony. Typical compound wall with
 gates.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 98-100, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey  main structure and ditto addition. Main 
structure: three parallel hipped roofs over core area, front and rear 
gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Fa�ades with cornice. 
Front fa�ade with central shutter door and shutter windows with weather 
mouldings. Additional structure: one continuous lean-to roof leaning 
against street wall. Typical garden wall.

properties.name: Fuikstraat 1-3, Punda
properties.description:
Two small one-storey concrete-built structures separated by a 
structure in the middle. Rectangular floor plans parallel to alleyway. 
Gable roofs with dormers on both sides. Fa�ades with cornice and shutter
 windows with profiled (nr.1) and flat (nr.3) weather mouldings.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached, oblong one-storey structure. Gable roof 
perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade: low gable with profiled moulding 
of gable rims, central panelled shutter doors and shutter windows with 
flat weather mouldings in block pattern

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large three-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes with windows on second floor
 and central door flanked with windows on first and ground floor. Wooden
 balcony on first floor. Neo-classicist rear fa�ade with centrally 
positioned three- tiered portico with balconies on first and second 
floor and triangular fronton supported by Tuscan columns. Adjoining 
two-storey rear structure with roof chimney.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure. Gable roof 
with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in star-shaped
 plasterwork. Front fa�ade laid out with window in gable top, two 
windows on first floor and two doors on ground floor. Marble tablet 
above left door with inscription '1857'and '361'.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 23-25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core  area and adjoining slant roof over front 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top-end. Front fa�ade 
laid out with three shutter windows on first floor and alternating 
shutter windows and shutter doors on  ground floor, all with weather 
mouldings.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Gable roof with slightly lifted overhangs. Front fa�ade with 
funnel-shaped  gable, panelled door flanked by two windows, fluted 
pilasters on corners. West fa�ade constructed in wood.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi detached one-storey row-houses covered with one continuous
 broken slant roof. Row structure perpendicular to the street. Front 
fa�ade with clamped door and window.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block 
which includes nr. 39. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable 
with flat 19th century top end. Profiled mouldings in front fa�ade 
broken at separation line, is indication that the structure originally 
consisted of two parts.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 39, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block 
which includes nr. 37. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable 
with flat 19th century top end and oculus as centre of moulded star. 
Profiled mouldings in front fa�ade is indication that the structure 
originally consisted of two parts.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable
 roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gables placed on cornice. Oculus in star-and-circle 
plasterwork in gable top ends. Front fa�ade with doors and windows 
positioned in five axes. Marble tablet with inscription '1836 308A'.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 7-15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small corral compound. Two-storey main building covered with 
two parallel gable roofs. Plain gables and funnel- shaped gables at rear
 and front side  respectively. Front fa�ade: two doors with front 
balcony and flanking windows, all with fanlights and weather mouldings. 
Compound includes two service quarters (nr. 11-13) covered with a 
lean-to roof leaning to western wall of corral. Seriously damaged by 
fire in 2000.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey composite structure. Main 
building and additional structures covered with gable roofs: main 
building with front gallery and ridge parallel to street, additions at 
the rear side positioned perpendicular to main building. Pointed gables 
with oculus. Front fa�ade laid out with four windows on first floor and 
two doors and window on ground floor. Separate gate with access to 
premises.

properties.name: Gouverneur van Slobbeweg z/n, Otrobanda / Riffort
properties.description:
Large fort at entrance of Sint Annabaai opposite Fort Amsterdam
 in Punda. Broken rectangle following the coastline accommodating one 
continuous shooting gallery. Mutually connected vaulted spaces for the 
greater part used as casemates and batteries under shooting gallery. 
Central open space. Guardhouse, stairs and two cisterns.

properties.name: Gravenstraat 10, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular 
to street. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with shutter door and 
window with profiled weather mouldings. Front wall of premises with four
 square pillars covered with pyramidal top.

properties.name: Gravenstraat 3-5, Otrobanda / Freemasons' Lodge Igualdad
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey and symmetrically set up structure. 
Parallel gable roofs with dormers over core area and front gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. South fa�ade with 
full-frontage terrace and stairs. Detached additional structure and 
cistern in yard. Two new side wings not included in Monuments Register.

properties.name: Gravenstraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Three parallel gable roofs over 
main structure. Cornice along all fa�ades. Stone wall around premises, 
entrance gate with two square pillars covered with pyramidal top.

properties.name: Gravenstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey kas di porchi, porch-house. Two hipped 
roofs perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Small built-in corner porch. Cornice along fa�ades and wooden shutter 
windows with weather mouldings. Profiled pilasters on fa�ade corners.

properties.name: Groot Kwartierweg 18, Groot Kwartier / Landhuis Groot Kwartier
properties.description:
Originally one-storey U-shaped floor plan originally with open 
patio lined with columns. Later additions and alterations: addition of 
one storey; filling up of patio with two storeys; addition of front 
gallery supported  by a row of columns. Entrance in axis position and 
facing Groot Kwartierweg. Cistern and graveyard on premises.

properties.name: Habaai / Landhuis Habaai
properties.description:
Two-storey complex with original 18th century structure and 
transverse19th century addition. Original structure: rectangular floor 
plan with full two-storey core and ditto flanking galleries. Gable roof 
over core area and adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Inward and 
outward curved gables. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Front 
fa�ade: seven-arched open arcade on ground floor and six sash windows on
 first floor. Front terrace with stairs. Rear fa�ade: open arcade on 
ground and first floor. Rear terrace surrounded by additions.

properties.name: Habaaiweg 6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. 
Three hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridge with 
finials. Additions at rear side, a.o. cistern covered with hipped roof. 
Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central shutter door and 
flanking windows, dentate quoins on corners. Short front terrace.

properties.name: Habaaiweg 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with 
rear kitchen additions and oven chimneys. One continuous gable roof 
parallel to street with concrete tile roofing. Funnel-shaped 
20th-century gables with shoulders and flat moulding. Front fa�ade laid 
out with one central door and flanking windows per dwelling.

properties.name: Hamelbergweg 1A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to 
street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade with built-in loggia on first floor and external staircase 
access. Loggia corner supported by double octagonal columns and ditto 
cantilevered capitals.

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 1-5, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Gable
 roof parallel to street. Funnel-shaped gables, top end with small 
triangular fronton on top of rectangular moulding. Later on added 
two-storey front gallery. Original wooden gallery replaced by a concrete
 one, dormers altered.

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 17, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof perpendicular to street. Gable of front fa�ade with sloping 
lower part and inward and outward curved upper part with arched top end.
 Later on added two- storey front gallery with  four arched openings.

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 29, Punda / Mikv� Isra�l Synagogue
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure enclosed by three streets. Three 
parallel gable roofs. Enclosing fa�ades consist of three inward and 
outward curved gables which jointly form one fa�ade. Fa�ades divided in 
three bays by moulded standpipes and pillars. All windows are tall 
windows with semicircular moulded fanlights. Interior: one nave and two 
aisles divided by heavy round columns.

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 9, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey corner building. Gable roof perpendicular to 
street. Funnel-shaped gables, top end with small triangular fronton on 
top of rectangular moulding.

properties.name: Hato / Landhuis Hato
properties.description:
Plantation complex with main building, graveyard and a hofi 
equipped with an irrigation system. Main building: rectangular floor 
plan with core area and flanking galleries. Steep hipped roof over core 
area and adjoining slant roofs with eaves over galleries. Two dormers on
 both sides of roof. Addition with a.o. kitchen. Current rear fa�ade 
with full-frontage walled-in terrace. Former hofi with irrigation system
 and graveyard on plantation grounds.

properties.name: Havenstraat 2-4, Otrobanda / Luna Blou complex
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Two gable roofs parallel to 
street. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end, the front one 
with small window and the rear one with oculus. Eastern side fa�ade with
 wooden balcony and staircase access.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 1, Punda / Penha Building
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure. Core and  side gallery 
topped with two corner balconies and three pavilions placed 
perpendicular to core. Gable roofs over core and three pavilions, all 
closed by inward and outward curved gables with profiled mouldings, 
volutes and semicircular top ends. Front and side fa�ade with arcades. 
All facades have  tall shutter  windows flanked by pilasters. Windows of
 gallery in addition equipped with moulded arches.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 18, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure stretched between Heerenstraat and 
Keukenstraat. Heerenstraat fa�ade: hipped roof, dormer with truncated 
triangular fronton and outward curved cheeks. Heavily profiled cornice, 
pilasters on corners. On first floor: three sash windows with glass 
bars, framed by mouldings and pilasters. Keukenstraat fa�ade: two 
parallel hipped roofs with dormers identical to dormer on Heerenstraat. 
Five sash windows on first floor.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 20-22, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof with ridge parallel 
to Heerenstraat, three dormers. Front fa�ade: sash windows with glass 
bars, windows placed in seven vertical axes. Side fa�ade: funnel-shaped 
gable with classical top end featuring a double arched fronton on a 
rectangular moulding. Tall windows placed in two vertical axes.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 23, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure stretched between Heerenstraat and 
Handelskade. One continuous hipped roof with dormers. Dormers on front 
and rear fa�ade: triangular fronton with profiled moulding, 19th century
 top end and curved cheeks. Four dormers on side fa�ade with plain 
gables.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 24-26, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure stretched between Heerenstraat and 
Keukenstraat covered with two parallel hipped roofs with dormers. Fa�ade
 on Keukenstraat: left and right dormer marked with 'Agosto' and '1917' 
 respectively. Fa�ade with diagonal cross-band decorations. Side fa�ade:
 ditto decorations, divided by pilasters and horizontal bands.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 25-27, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with 
dormers on side fa�ade. Front fa�ade: two identical funnel- shaped 
gables with mouldings and classical top end featuring a small triangular
 fronton on a rectangular moulding with the marks of year of 
construction. Later on added front gallery.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 29-31, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs 
perpendicular to Heerenstraat. Front fa�ade: two identical inward and 
outward curved gables with mouldings and arched top end of an usual 
design. Marks of year of construction on gable tops. Later on added 
front gallery.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 35, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof closed by a small 
funnel-shaped gable with mouldings and classical top end featuring an 
oval-shaped fronton on a rectangular moulding. Three-tiered later on 
added gallery with arcades on first and second floor, four arches 
supported by belly- shaped columns in front fa�ade and one arch around 
the corner. Gallery topped with a parapet of stone openwork.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 5, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey double structure stretched between Heerenstraat 
and Handelskade and covered with one continuous gable roof. Heerenstraat
 fa�ade: funnel-shaped gable with horizontal band. Sash windows with 
glass bars placed in three vertical axes, and between full- frontage 
horizontal bands. Handelskade fa�ade: plain funnel-shaped gable with 
square window. Shutter windows in two vertical axes.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 7, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey double structure stretched between Heerenstraat and 
Handelskade. One continuous roof with gable and hipped end. Heerenstraat
 fa�ade: main funnel-shaped gable with small shoulders and horizontal 
band above window, and ditto smaller gable. Sash windows placed between 
full-frontage horizontal bands.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 9, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with gable roof perpendicular to 
Heerenstraat.  Gable of front fa�ade with heavily profiled moulding, 
fantasy top and bottom decorations and infill. Gable sits on projecting 
moulding which is part of the cornice. Pilasters on corners.

properties.name: Hendrikplein z/n / De Tempel (former synagogue Tempel Emanu-El)
properties.description:
Large detached structure with three-storey square tower in 
front. Gable roof, heavy cornice and corner pilasters. Tower topped with
 an octagonal lantern and ditto cone. Tower base surrounded by stairs 
leading to entrance portico of tower and church hall. Interior with 
large main hall and balcony, upper storey and basement. Fa�ades laid out
 in axes featuring a rosette at upper storey, arched windows at main 
hall and doors at basement.

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 11-13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
alley. Hipped roof with stone ridge and hips, and slightly lifted 
overhangs on its four sides. Stone wall with gate to premises and 
staircase access to first floor.

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with a composite floor and roof 
plan. Front building equipped with central balcony with balustrade of 
fretwork bars. Second balcony at rear side with ditto balustrade 
supported by Tuscan columns. Arched aqueduct. Stone wall with gate to 
premises.

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached structure with ridge parallel to alley. 
Gable roof with stone ridge enclosed by plain gables. Dormers at both 
sides of roof. Flat plain cornice bending up at ends. Horizontal band 
above door and window over full-frontage of front fa�ade.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 10A -12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached corner structure with main hipped roofs perpendicular 
to the street. One-and-a-half storey structure with basement. Front 
fa�ade: three panelled shutter doors with moulded arched frames. Front 
terrace with balustrade and entrance stairs. Entrance gate flanked by 
square pillars topped with ornaments.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 11A, Otrobanda / 'Keizershof'
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Three hipped roofs 
parallel to Hoogstraat. Front fa�ade: windows with arched mouldings, 
portico supported by double columns and front terrace with balustrade of
 wooden fretwork. Projecting cornice with dentils over all fa�ades. 
Dentate quoins on corners. Wooden balcony over full frontage of rear 
fa�ade supported by plain columns.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 13-15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure  with ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjacent slant roof 
over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus, profiled moulding 
and 19th century top end. Front  fa�ade with doors and windows 
positioned in four axes. Rear balcony.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with T-shaped floor plan covered 
with hipped roofs. Cistern as a typical front addition. Front fa�ade: 
shutter door and window with arched fanlights on first floor which open 
to a terrace formed by the cistern's roof. Profiled cornice over all 
fa�ades. Stone garden wall with plain entrance flanked by square 
pillars.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-and-a-half storey oblong structure. Three 
parallel gable roofs with dormers over three adjacent blocks. Cornice 
and lower horizontal band over front and side fa�ades. Dentate quoins on
 corners. Front fa�ade: three adjoining funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top end and knob ornament. Central door and balcony. Front 
terrace with stairs.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade: door and windows placed in four axes. Front terrace.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure with two-storey core area and one- storey 
front gallery. Hipped roof with cement hips, ridges and finials over 
core area and lean-to  roof over front gallery. Cornice over fa�ades, 
pilasters on corners of front fa�ade. Front fa�ade: three tall shutter 
windows on core fa�ade; central shutter door and flanking shutter 
windows on gallery fa�ade, all with profiled mouldings. Cistern placed 
against rear fa�ade.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 21-25, Otrobanda / Villa Sixta
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof over main block. 
Central front addition with gable roof and U-shaped wooden front balcony
 supported by plain columns. Two winding stairs to balcony. Fa�ades with
 profiled heavy cornice. All windows equipped with moulded frames with 
arched fanlights. Dentate quoins on corners. Typical wooden bridge 
structure as a side addition on the first floor. Five arched lattice 
windows with herringbone pattern on front side.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area
 and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers with
 triangular fronton, tall window and cheeks. Truncated gables with 
horizontal band below  window ending in shoulders. Front fa�ade: central
 door and flanking windows. Garden wall with stone openwork infill and 
entrance flanked by square pillars.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel
 to street. Cornice over all fa�ades, mouldings above all windows. Front
 fa�ade: dentate quoins on corners, panelled shutter doors and windows 
placed in three axes. Almost full- frontage front balcony supported by 
columns ranging with the street. Staircase to first floor on side 
fa�ade.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 27-31, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey main structure (nr.27-29) and secondary 
one-storey structure (nr.31). Main structure: three hipped roofs 
parallel to street. Cornice with drapery ornamentation, dentate quoins 
on corners. Front fa�ade laid out  in five axes with central balcony 
supported by columns. Triangular ornaments below window sills. Secondary
 structure: roof terrace enclosed by a closed stone parapet marked with a
 profiled moulding and a horizontal band connected with pilasters.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 28-30, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over 
core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. 
Truncated gables with finials on top and horizontal band ending in 
shoulders. Front fa�ade: full- frontage triangular fronton framed with 
decorated mouldings, medallion in centre. Central arched door with ditto
 flanking windows.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 32-34, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure covered with three hipped roofs 
parallel to street. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades, dentate quoins on
 corners. Front fa�ade: shutter doors and tall shutter windows placed in
 three axes. Wooden balcony supported by four columns ranging with the 
street.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 33, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to the
 street. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all fa�ades. Moulding with 
bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar design
 as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 37, except from direction of hipped 
roof.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Hipped roof parallel to 
Hoogstraat. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all fa�ades. Moulding 
with bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar 
design as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 33, except from direction of 
hipped roof.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure in backyard of Hoogstraat 40. 
Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front fa�ade: 
centrally positioned door flanked by tall windows with heavy profiled 
moulding.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 39-41, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-store corner structure. Hipped roofs with cement 
hips and ridge with finials. Front fa�ade: decorated triangular fronton,
 balcony supported by four profiled columns with spaced bands. Terrace 
with Cura�ao tiles. Side fa�ade with stone staircase leading to balcony 
and door on first floor.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 40, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof with flat moulding. 
Front fa�ade: profiled cornice running straight above doors and windows 
on first floor. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows placed in 
three axes.  Front balcony.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 42, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Pyramidal roof with top 
ornament. Front fa�ade ranging with the street. Centrally placed shutter
 door flanked with tall shutter windows.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 43, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Flat
 roof with a balustrade / parapet with stone openwork sections set 
between double marble pillars. Front fa�ade: front terrace covered with 
projecting flat roof supported by four double columns with ball-shaped 
capitals. Cantilevered overhangs supported by consoles. Intricate 
detailed marble work.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof with two 
dormers with triangular fronton over core area and adjoining slant roof 
over rear gallery. Plain gables with oculus and tall window with 
moulding. Entrance on both ends of garden wall.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with front and rear additions. 
Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over main structure.
 Front  fa�ade: heavy profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. One-storey
 front addition with cornice and pilasters on corners. Flat roof forming
 a spacious balcony for the first floor.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 51, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped
 roofs over core area  and front gallery. Adjoining U- shaped hipped 
roof over rear gallery and flanking wings. Enclosed patio. All shutter 
windows on first floor equipped with arched fanlights. Heavy cornice 
over all fa�ades, dentate quoins on front and side corners. Front 
fa�ade: triangular fronton above cornice, decoration of medallion and 
flat triangles. Front terrace with stairs.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 52, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 of different size with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade: central door and flanking windows with mouldings,
 profiled pilasters on corners. Front terrace with side stairs. External
 oven and chimney.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 54, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 of different size with cement hips, ridges and finials. Cornice over 
all fa�ades, profiled pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade: central door 
and flanking windows with mouldings. Front terrace with stairs at sides.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 7A -9, Otrobanda / 'Keizershof'
properties.description:
Detached two storey double structure covered with two similar 
parallel hipped roofs. Projecting profiled cornice, pilasters on 
corners. Fa�ades divided by pilasters and a horizontal band,. During 
restoration a balcony was placed over the short front terrace to fit the
 four panelled shutter doors on the first floor.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 10-12, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Three parallel hipped roofs
 over core area and front and rear gallery. Front fa�ade: door and 
windows placed in four axes. Windows on first floor with inverted ogee 
arch below window sills, door and windows on ground floor with arched 
tympanum containing masonry mosaic. Profiled pilasters on corners. 
Two-storey structure at rear side covered with pyramidal roof.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 11-13, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structures. Lean-to roof leaning to 
front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Roof chimney at rear side. Front 
fa�ade: plain street wall with shutter door and shutter windows.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 14, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.description:
Detached mainly two-storey assembly of different building 
blocks. Main structure covered with two gable roofs enclosed by 
funnel-shaped gables  with19th century top ends; oculus in plastered 
star. Dormers on roof. Additional structures with gable and slant roofs.
 East fa�ade: sash windows with glass bars. South fa�ade: above door 
medallion with inscription '57 1861'.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 15, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure with basement. 
Gable roof with dormers and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top 
end. Oculus above tall shutter window with weather moulding. Two 
panelled doors with wooden shutters in front fa�ade.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 16-20, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Core area with gable roof
 and dormers, galleries with slant roofs on three sides of structure. 
Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Roof chimney on western 
gallery. Between structure and IJzerstraat nr.10-12 original stepped 
rubble stone street pavement.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 2-4, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
One-storey structures originally part of semi-detached set of 
four row-houses (nrs.2-8) One continuous lean-to roof leaning to front 
wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front fa�ades: plain street wall with two
 clamped wooden entrance doors. Small cistern and aqueduct on south 
fa�ade. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to make way for a connection 
between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)

properties.name: IJzerstraat 27, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
One-and-a half storey structure built against neighbouring 
properties and ranging with alleyway. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as 
main structure. Double slant roof. Front fa�ade: central door flanked by
 tall windows, profiled cornice and weather mouldings above openings, 
pilasters on corners. Small tower-shaped addition at rear side.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 29-33, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure containing three small one-storey 
row-houses. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as main structure. One 
continuous lean- to roof leaning to the wall ranging with IJzerstraat. 
Each dwelling equipped with chimney. Front fa�ade: plain street wall 
with clamped entrance door and ditto window for each dwelling.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 35, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with alley. Hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front fa�ade: centrally 
placed panelled shutter door flanked by two windows with weather 
mouldings, front cornice with moulding of small blocks. Side access to 
premises through gate with triangular fronton.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 48, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey structure with composite roof 
plan. Front fa�ade: panelled shutter doors and windows positioned in 
five axes, profiled  cornice and full-frontage horizontal band. Framed 
tablet  with inscription 'no.38-40 1915'. East fa�ade: six tall windows 
with weather mouldings on first floor and five windows on ground floor.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 49-51, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached  two-storey  structure. Gable roof and plain gables 
with oculus. Adjoining structure at rear side and cistern. Plain  
cornices. Front fa�ade: four windows with  weather mouldings on first 
floor, alternating doors and windows on ground floor.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 52, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, 
slant roofs over galleries on three sides. Eaves on slant roofs on front
 and west side. Dormer with triangular fronton on both sides of gable 
roof. Front fa�ade with panelled shutter door and two shutter windows.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 55, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel 
to the street. Plain cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: windows and
 central door on ground floor positioned in three axes. Gate with arched
 opening on west side giving access to staircase to balcony and entrance
 door on first floor.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 56-58, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Hipped roof with finials. Rear and side additions. Profiled cornice on 
front and side fa�ades, otherwise plain cornice. Fa�ades: shutter 
windows with mouldings above and below the window frames, panelled door 
with side lights. Front wall of garden with gate and clamped door.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 57, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey corner structure which also includes 
Emmastraat 1-3. Hipped roofs parallel to Emmastraat with fluted chimney.
 Heavy profiled cornice over all fa�ades and horizontal moulding. Quoins
 with block pattern on ground floor and dentate pattern on first floor. 
Fa�ades laid out in axes, one axis in front fa�ade and six axes in 
fa�ade facing Emmastraat. Side access to first floor through gate and 
staircase.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 59, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 and a gable roof perpendicular to street. Heavy profiled cornice. 
Fa�ades laid out in axes, three in front fa�ade and five in each side 
fa�ade. Front fa�ade: triangular fronton with oculus and windows above 
cornice. Fluted moulded frame around openings. Balcony on first floor. 
Walled-in premises with entrances on IJzerstraat and Emmastraat.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 60-62, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with 
IJzerstraat 62 slightly set back from street. Part of corral with 
IJzerstraat 64 as main building. One continuous lean-to roof which leans
 to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front  fa�ade: plain street 
wall with shutter doors and  windows and plain weather mouldings.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 61, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with finials. 
Cornice over fa�ades and weather mouldings above all openings. Dentate 
quoins on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes, side fa�ades in 
four and five axes respectively. Small one-storey addition at  rear 
side. Front garden wall with square  pillars.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 64, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure located in yard. Main building of
 corral including structures IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74. Hipped roof 
with finials over core area and lean- to roofs over one-storey side 
galleries. Panelled doors with shutters and shutter windows. High corral
 separation walls along north, east and south side of corral. Entrance 
gate between IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 70-74, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached structure accommodating three one-storey row- houses. 
Part of corral with IJzerstraat 64 as main building. Southern part with 
lean-to roof leaning on street wall, northern part with continuous gable
 roof and separation walls protruding above roofing. Front  fa�ade: 
plain street wall with shutter windows (nr.70) and fa�ade with plain 
cornice, shutter doors and windows with plain weather mouldings.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 71-73, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Composite roof structure 
of hipped roofs. Front and side fa�ades with small cornice, two 
full-frontage moulded bands below cornice and between ground and first 
floor. Front fa�ade: six windows on first floor and alternating windows 
and doors on ground floor. Dentate quoins on corners.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 8, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
One-storey structure originally part of a semi-detached set of 
four row-houses (nrs.2-8) Lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging 
with IJzerstraat. Front fa�ade: plain street wall with clamped wooden 
entrance door and ditto tall window. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to 
make way for a connection between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)

properties.name: IJzerstraat 80-86, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area
 and adjoining slant roofs over side galleries. Funnel- shaped gables 
with 19th century top end. Additions to  east and west fa�ades and 
additional structures on premises a.o. a cistern and aqueduct. Front 
fa�ade: cornice and full-frontage dentils, shutter windows and doors. 
Marble tablet with inscription: '1855, 1e wijk. 66'.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 88-94, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached double structure made up of two connected identical 
two-storey wooden structures. Two external staircases to first floor, 
one separating both structures. Two parallel hipped roofs with 
overhangs; corrugated iron roofing. Front fa�ade of each unit: 
cantilevered triangular fronton with profiled frame supported by five 
sawn and decorated consoles. Shutter doors on first floor opening to 
full-frontage wooden balconies supported by four cut consoles. Central 
door flanked by tall windows on ground floor.

properties.name: J.B.Gorsiraweg 4, Parera
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure overlooking Scharloo. 
Composite symmetrical floor and roof plan. Core area, front and rear 
galleries covered  by three parallel hipped roofs. Rear pavilions with 
wings and enclosed patio. Two symmetrically positioned cisterns built 
against the side walls of garden and connected by aqueducts to main 
building. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: triangular fronton 
with cornice and dentils, medallion and flat triangles. Fa�ade lay-out 
in five axes. Large full- frontage balcony.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 11, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey deep-set structure with rectangular floor 
plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Profiled 
cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: doors and windows laid out in 
five axes. Concrete front balcony with stone openwork balustrade and 
supported by columns. Pilasters on corners.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 12, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Three parallel hipped 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Smaller front section. 
Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows. Front terrace.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 18-19, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with a rectangular floor 
plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over
 front and side fa�ades. Front fa�ade: triangular fronton with profiled 
dentils, fronton infill with medallion and curved mouldings, front 
balcony with wooden fretwork balusters and supported by fluted columns. 
Corner pilasters.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 20, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers 
over core area and adjoining slant roof over front and rear galleries. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and shoulders. Cornice 
over fa�ades. Cistern covered with gable roof.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 24, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with oblong  floor plan. Hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: two doors 
on ground floor and two windows on first floor with full-frontage 
moulding. Profiled cornice and pilasters on corners. East fa�ade with 
four tall windows on both ground and first floor and full-frontage 
horizontal band.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 4, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on an elevated 
substructure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over
 front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.
 Typical cornice over all fa�ades. Front and rear terraces with 
balustrade and stairs. Cistern and aqueduct.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 6B-13, Punda
properties.description:
Large detached structure with a floor plan designed as a 
tapered and symmetrical trapezoid. Originally built as a library and 
office space. Two-storey structure at trapezoid base (office) and 
one-storey structure at top (library) connected by open galleries 
enclosing a patio with covered stage. Two identical side facades. 
Typical air wells in roof of entrances and library. Typical other Modern
 Movement details for ventilation and for protection against the 
tropical sun.

properties.name: Jongbloed / Landhuis Oost Jongbloed
properties.description:
Group of two small one-storey structures dating from late- 19th
 century and early-20th century. Oldest structure: remnant of former 
country estate complex. Rectangular block covered with gable roof 
enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Later 
structure: Transverse positioned block with hipped roof, cement hips and
 ridge with finials. Cornice over fa�ades, quoins on corners. Well- 
preserved original interior. Connecting corridor with slant roof between
 structures.

properties.name: Julianaplein 14, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey structure built on backyard subdivision. Access 
through a gate below aqueduct between Julianaplein 12 and 16. Gable roof
 over core and slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by 
funnel-shaped gables.

properties.name: Julianaplein 16, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular 
to street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Plain flat cornice over 
exposed fa�ades. Cornice on front fa�ade continues into arched aqueduct 
to nr.12 and forms the top of a gate to nr.14 located in backyard of 
compound.

properties.name: Julianaplein 18, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Front section with flat 
roof, rear section with two parallel gable roofs with dormers and 
funnel-shaped gables. Richly ornamented portico supported by columns 
over open terrace. Four fluted ionic columns, decorated architrave, 
frieze with dentils and parapet topped with balustrade, and decorated 
semicircular fronton. Neo-classicist ornamentation.

properties.name: Julianaplein 2-4, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure and additional building. Hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over fa�ades. Two 
wide double shutter doors with small shutter doors in between. Weather 
mouldings above deep-set door frames.

properties.name: Julianaplein 22, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with main block and rear 
additions forming a patio. Three parallel hipped roofs and gable roof 
over main block. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice 
with dentils over fa�ades, corner pilasters. All windows are tall, 
arched shutter windows with mouldings around window frames. Front fa�ade
 with decorated triangular fronton above cornice; doors and windows laid
 out in three axes. Front balcony.

properties.name: Julianaplein 26, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with rear additions. 
Composite floor plan and roof structure with two sets of three 
transversely positioned parallel hipped roofs, and two air-wells. Cement
 hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over facades, pilasters on 
corners. Shutter door and windows of front fa�ade laid out in three axes
 and framed with mouldings. Rear additions include cistern covered with 
hipped roof and typical small structure with square floor plan.

properties.name: Julianaplein 34, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built structure with composite 
floor plan. Diverse roof types, large overhangs at all sides. Diagonal 
front entrance with front porch. Five-sided rear porch.

properties.name: Julianaplein 36, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Ground floor level below level 
of square. Hipped roof parallel to square, adjoining slant roof over 
rear gallery. Cornice with flat and profiled section, corner pilasters. 
Front fa�ade: Central triangular fronton with window above cornice, 
doors and windows laid out in four axes. Two full- frontage horizontal 
bands over fa�ade. Front fence of premises with typical round columns.

properties.name: Julianaplein 38, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Three hipped roofs parallel to 
square. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cantilevered cornice over 
all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: arched openings with moulded framing. Three 
shutter doors on ground floor, shutter door and flanking windows with 
moulded draperies hanging from window sills on first floor. Central 
wooden balcony.  Pseudo-rustic dentate quoins on fa�ade corners.

properties.name: Julianaplein 5, Punda / The Cathedral of Cura�ao with Parish Hall
properties.description:
Large building complex made up of a cathedral with parish hall.
 Cathedral: basilica design with nave and aisles, two towers and choir 
closed at five sides. No transepts. Gable roof over nave and lean-to 
roofs over aisles. Towers  covered with pyramidal roofs. Parish hall: 
large detached oblong two-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
square. Gable roof. Gable top in axis of front fa�ade, arched door and 
windows laid out in thirteen axes.

properties.name: Julianaplein 8-12, Punda
properties.description:
Two adjoining one-storey structures with similar design. Hipped
 roofs, nr.12 with adjoining slant roof. Cornice and pilasters on 
corners and on separation line of structures. Triangular frontons with 
horizontal bands and shutter windows in centre of each fa�ade. Front 
fa�ade with two times a door and window  (nr. 8-10), and three clamped 
doors (nr.12), the centre one topped with a triangular moulding, the 
flanking doors with text 'Gran Agencia Funeraria' and 'Panaderia El Cojo
 feb 20 1884'.

properties.name: Kalksteeg 1-11, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey block of five adjoining structures. Part of
 a block of eight row-houses. One continuous gable roof with eight 
dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped end gables with 19th 
century top end. Each dwelling equipped with dormers with tall window 
and triangular fronton, front door and window, back door and external 
chimney / cooking place in walled-in backyard.

properties.name: Kalksteeg 22-24, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey block of two structures. Part of a compound
 of two blocks of three row-houses enclosing a small walled-in inner 
yard. One continuous gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. 
Plain end gable. Each dwelling equipped with two dormers with tall 
windows and triangular frontons.

properties.name: Keukenstraat 18, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with 
ridge perpendicular to the street. Front fa�ade with two adjacent 
funnel-shaped gables and later on added closed six- window gallery with 
lean-to roof. Typical casement doors to street.

properties.name: Keukenstraat 20A, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof perpendicular to street. Funnel- shaped gable with tall 
window and plain top end consisting of a triangular fronton above a 
rectangular moulding. Later on added front gallery covered with lean-to 
roof with eaves overhang.

properties.name: Keukenstraat 22A, Punda / Postal Museum
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Two gable roofs placed 
perpendicular to each other. Front fa�ade: funnel-shaped gable with 
small window and plain top end consisting of a triangular fronton above a
 rectangular moulding marked with year 1693. Wooden front gallery with 
open arcade and covered with lean-to roof with eaves.

properties.name: Keukenstraat 8 / Smallesteeg 6, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey structure. Flat roof. High cornice 
built up with  'Ysselsteentjes', small yellow brickwork, and several 
horizontal bands over full-frontage of all three fa�ades. Fa�ades laid 
out in vertical axes.

properties.name: Klein Cura�ao / Archaeological Monument Klein Cura�ao / Old
properties.description:
Remnants of old lighthouse on northeast coast of Klein Cura�ao 
dating from the 18th or 19th century. Scattered artefacts on ground 
surface like construction materials and European ceramics.

properties.name: Klein Cura�ao / Vuurtoren Klein Cura�ao (Lighthouse Klein Cura�ao)
properties.description:
Lighthouse complex situated in the centre of the island of 
Klein Cura�ao.    Symmetrical lay-out with lighthouse positioned on 
semicircular structure flanked with two identical dwellings. 
Semicircular structure: cistern on ground floor, corridor with flat roof
 on first floor. Dwellings: dwellings on first floor with gable roofs, 
storehouse in basements with arched openings. Oven with chimney (one 
left) for dwellings. East-west axis with staircase on west side to first
 floor terrace giving access to dwellings and lighthouse, and staircase 
on east side to corridor of semicircular structure. Low circular 
platform holding former flag post south of complex.

properties.name: Klein Curacaostraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey partly concrete-built structure. Hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridge and eaves. Front fa�ade with wooden 
boarding. Panelled shutter door in centre flanked by shutter windows. 
All  openings with rectangular fanlights and arched weather profile. 
Side fa�ade with plastered wooden boarding

properties.name: Klipstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over 
core area and slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped 
gables with 19th century top end. Symmetrical fa�ade lay-out. Gate to 
backyard. Front fence with low walls and two entrances.

properties.name: Klipstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with 
cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades. Front 
addition without monumental value.

properties.name: Koningin Wilhelminastraat 13-19
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure accommodating  four row- 
houses. One continuous slant roof. Flat cornice. Originally clamped 
doors and windows with clamped shutters. Oven and chimney on exposed 
short fa�ade.

properties.name: Koningstraat 13, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to
 the street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge. Profiled  cornice. 
Front fa�ade ranging with the street and laid out with door and tall 
window.

properties.name: Koningstraat 15, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to
 the street.  Three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips. Profiled 
cornice. Front fa�ade ranging with the street and laid out with central 
door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Koningstraat 37, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Flat 
concrete roof tiles used for roofing. Profiled cornice with pilasters on
 corners. Symmetrical fa�ade lay-out. Kitchen addition with oven and 
chimney at rear side.

properties.name: Kortijn K 36, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roofs with cement 
hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over front fa�ade only. 
Symmetrical front fa�ade ranging with alley. Panelled shutter door and 
shutter windows without weather mouldings.

properties.name: Kortijn K18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached concrete-built one-storey structure. Hipped roof
 with cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Symmetrical
 front fa�ade. Door and flanking windows with weather mouldings and 
pseudo consoles.

properties.name: Kortijn K22, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped 
roof with stone hips and ridge. Projecting cornice, profiled on street 
fa�ades. Windows with weather mouldings and pseudo consoles. Entrance 
through built-in porch. Concrete cistern against rear fa�ade.

properties.name: Kortijn K3-K4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-and-a-half-storey structure with the prominence of
 a country estate. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof 
over front and rear galleries. Cross wing with gable roof intersecting 
main block. 18th century funnel-shaped  gables with shoulders and 
semicircular fronton as top end. Cornice over facades of cross wing. 
Cistern with aqueduct. Structure was restored  in 1986, a.o. dentate 
coins added.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached, slightly deep-set one-storey structure. Part of
 the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two parallel hipped roofs 
with corrugated iron roofing and finials. Cornice over front fa�ade 
only. Stone-built front fa�ade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and 
flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. Side fa�ade: wooden 
boarding.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 21, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure ranging with thee street. 
Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs 
parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice 
over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking 
windows without weather mouldings.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. 
Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel
 to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: flat 
cornice with rhombic decorations. Door and three windows with 
tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Side fa�ade: wooden boarding with 
closed, plastered joints.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the 
street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof 
parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials, and 
overhangs at eaves. Front fa�ade with three windows. Side entrance.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 29, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. 
Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs 
parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical
 front fa�ade with cornice continuing over side-gate to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 33, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of 
the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to
 street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front 
fa�ade with cornice, lacking on other fa�ades. Side-entrance with access
 to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front
 fa�ade. Two gable roofs parallel to street, gables finished with 
boarding. Side-gate with access to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front fa�ade with 
cornice, lacking on other fa�ades. Side- gate with access to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 43, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front fa�ade with 
corner pilasters and cornice, the latter lacking on the other fa�ades. 
Short fence walls on sides with entrance to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 45, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of 
the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with 
stone-built front fa�ade and small plain moulding. Gable roof parallel 
to street with cement ridge and finials, gables finished with boarding. 
Short wall fences on sides and side-gate with pointed gable.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 47-49, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two small detached one-storey structures. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs, parallel and 
perpendicular to street, with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front
 fa�ades with cornice, door and step (nr.47), and door and three windows
 (nr.49). Wooden side fa�ade (nr.47)

properties.name: Kortijnweg 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. 
One of the oldest buildings of the ribbon development along 
Kortijnstraat. Gable roof over core and adjoining slant roof over rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables. Front fa�ade with symmetrical lay-out. 
Door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. External oven 
with chimney.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 53, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Gable roof parallel to street, gables 
with flat top ends. Front fa�ade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. 
Door and windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Short wall fences
 at sides with entrance to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 57, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front
 fa�ade. Two gable roofs parallel to street covered with corrugated iron
 roofing. No cornice. Short wall fences with side-gate to backyard.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 58, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached concrete-built one-storey structure with adjoining 
front and rear additions. Pyramidal roof with finial over square floor 
plan. Front fa�ade: porch with balustrade of cast cement elements and 
Cura�ao tile flooring. Three sided bay window.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 63, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon 
development along Kortijnstraat. Partly stone-built and partly wooden 
facades. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with
 finials. Slightly lifted eaves. Symmetrical front fa�ade with door and 
flanking windows. Short wall fences on sides with entrance to backyard.

properties.name: Kuiperstraat 26, Punda / Jewish Cultural Historical Museum
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable 
roof with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end, that is a small 
triangular fronton placed  on a rectangular moulding. Front fa�ade with 
windows and door laid out in two axes. Rear fa�ade with addition covered
 with lean-to roof. Kitchen sites on ground and first floor, the latter 
with baking oven.

properties.name: Kuiperstraat 28, Punda / Jewish Cultural Historical Museum
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable 
roof with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end, that is a small 
triangular fronton placed  on a rectangular moulding. Front fa�ade laid 
out in two axes. Open two tiered gallery added in 1728 with arcades 
featuring four arched front openings and one on each side of gallery. 
Short belly-shaped columns on first floor. Rear fa�ade laid out in two 
axes.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent 
structure L.B. Smithplein 14. Gable roof over core area and adjoining 
slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th 
century top end. Front fa�ade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof
 chimney.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent 
structure L.B. Smithplein 12. Gable roof over core area and adjoining 
slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th 
century top end. Front fa�ade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof
 chimney.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 3, Otrobanda / Belv�d�re
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey cube-shaped structure. Two hipped 
roofs with ridges parallel  to square. Profiled, heavy cornice topped 
with low parapet on front and side fa�ades. Front fa�ade symmetrically 
laid out. Central balcony supported by two double columns forming a 
portico. Full-frontage terrace and U-shaped block of stairs. Dentate 
quoins on corners. First floor: door to balcony with two windows on both
 sides. Ground floor: door with two pairs of coupled windows on both 
sides, topped with triangular fronton and flanked with columns.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached deep-set two-storey structure with rectangular 
floor plan. Hipped roof with ridge parallel to square. Heavy profiled 
projecting cornice with consoles. Front fa�ade laid  out in three axes. 
Front entrance with portico with fluted Doric columns supporting an 
entablature and tympanum.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two detached structures forming one building complex. One- 
storey front  structure and two-storey rear structure separated by an 
open two-storey gallery with staircases at both ends. Structures covered
 with three hipped roofs, parallel and perpendicular to square 
respectively. Central path to front entrance in axis of complex paved 
with red bricks and lined with low guiding walls of stone openwork set 
between pillars.

properties.name: Lagun / Archaeological Monument Knip
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of 
archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 1500 to 325 
years. Site of approximately two hectares located on steep rocks north 
of Knipbaai and the beach. Deposits include archaeological materials of 
pottery, shells, stone, charcoal, crabs, remnants of animal bones as 
well as tools made of shells, stone and bone, cut ornaments and human 
graves.

properties.name: Langestraat 14-16, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure, servants' quarters of former 
corral of demolished structure Langestraat 10-12. Gable roof and 
funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.

properties.name: Langestraat 2-4, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with square floor plan. Pyramidal 
roof with cement hips and finial. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Front  
fa�ade: first floor with two tall shutter windows and weather mouldings,
 ground floor with clamped door. Side fa�ade: oven and chimney, 
staircase to balcony and entrance door on first floor.

properties.name: Langestraat 34, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with H-shaped floor plan. Gable 
roof over main section, separate gable roofs over four adjoining 
structures. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Cistern with slant roof in
 backyard.

properties.name: Langestraat 36-38, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure, part of building complex 
Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards yard. Clamped door 
and shutter in long and short fa�ades.

properties.name: Langestraat 40-46, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure consisting of four row-houses. Part of 
building complex Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards 
yard. Two dwellings with door, other two with door and window.
