properties.name: Langestraat 48-50, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Part of building complex 
Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining 
slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century 
top end and oculus. Mark with year 1861. Front fa�ade laid out in three 
axes. Full- frontage plain cornice and horizontal band above first floor
 windows. Cistern in backyard.

properties.name: Langestraat 52-54, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Part of building complex 
Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof
 over adjoining rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top
 end and oculus. Front fa�ade with full-frontage plain cornice and 
horizontal band above first floor windows. Wooden board with inscription
 'N30 A 1855'. Rear gallery with chimney and oven.

properties.name: Langestraat 56-58, Otrobanda / Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area,
 adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables
 with 19th century top ends marked with year 1857. Profiled cornice over
 front and west fa�ade. Front fa�ade with doors and windows laid out in 
three axes, two full-frontage horizontal bands between rows of windows. 
Sash windows in interior wall separating core and galleries. Cistern 
with aqueduct and additional two-storey structure in backyard.

properties.name: Langestraat 6-8, Otrobanda / Bellevue (Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound)
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Main building of a walled- in 
corral compound. Composite floor and roof plan with mainly hipped roofs 
with dormers. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: first 
floor with symmetrical lay-out, centrally placed dormer with triangular 
fronton and cheeks, central balcony and door flanked by two,  paired, 
tall windows with semicircular fanlights and mouldings, dentate quoins 
on corners. Ground floor, marble  tablet  with inscription  'Ao 1875  
N51'. Typical wooden balconies on main and additional structures. 
Additional two-storey structure with pyramidal roof and former cistern 
on ground floor.

properties.name: Langestraat 76-78, Otrobanda / Hotel Pelikaan
properties.description:
Large detached complex. Two adjoining two-storey structures. 
Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all fa�ades. Two 
plain horizontal bands running above openings on ground and first floor.
 All fa�ades laid out with doors and windows in vertical axes.

properties.name: Lombokstraat 4-6, Berg  Altena
properties.description:
Small block containing two modest one-storey row-houses, part 
of a larger housing complex. Gable roof over main room, adjoining slant 
roof over back  room. Exposed gable: funnel-shaped gable with 19th 
century top end and semicircular oculus. Front fa�ade with central door 
and flanking windows for  each unit.

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs 
with hips and  ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front 
fa�ade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with 
weather mouldings. Side entrance with elegant door to backyard.

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular 
to street with hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with 
weather mouldings. Detached oven with chimney at rear side of dwelling.

properties.name: Madurostraat 10-18, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof with dormers. Front fa�ade with two plain funnel-shaped 
gables above cornice. Gables with weather mouldings only, matching 
windows removed. Full- frontage horizontal  band below windows; similar 
band above windows missing.

properties.name: Madurostraat 21, Punda
properties.description:
One-and-a-half storey structure built against neighbouring 
properties. Oblong structure with roof stretched between Madurostraat  
and Sha Caprileskade. Gable roof with eaves and four dormers on each 
roof side. Both fa�ades with plain funnel-shaped gables and 19th century
 top ends, semicircular oculus  and tall windows.

properties.name: Madurostraat 24, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Twin structure of Madurostraat 26. Gable roof. Pointed gable with 
heavily profiled moulding with dentils and window. Profiled moulding and
 various horizontal bands over full-frontage of both structures. Windows
 in asymmetric position.

properties.name: Madurostraat 26, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Twin structure of Madurostraat 24. Gable roof. Pointed gable with 
heavily profiled moulding with dentils and window. Profiled moulding and
 various horizontal bands over full-frontage of both structures. Windows
 in symmetric position.

properties.name: Madurostraat 28A/B, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey double-structure on corner. Two parallel gable roofs
 with ridges perpendicular to street. Front fa�ade: two adjacent 
identical funnel-shaped gables with profiled mouldings,19th century top 
end and small window. Two by two French windows on first floor  with 
semicircular pseudo fanlights. Later on designed six-bay open arcade 
supported by belly-shaped columns.

properties.name: Madurostraat 46A-48, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey double-structure on corner. Two parallel gable roofs
 with ridges perpendicular to street. Gables with plain thin moulding 
and tall windows, two and one respectively.  First floor: seven 
cross-bar framed windows with arched pseudo fanlights set between 
horizontal bands on front fa�ade, ditto on side and rear fa�ades.

properties.name: Madurostraat 8, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Gable roof with dormer. Front fa�ade with cornice and decorated parapet 
friezes over full-frontage of first and second floor. Windows laid out 
in three vertical axes.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis Bloemhof
properties.description:
Symmetrically laid out main structure with two-storey core area
 and flanking one-storey open galleries and side wings. Gable roof over 
core area enclosed with pointed arched gables. Three dormers on both 
roof sides. Lean-to roofs over side galleries, slant roofs over side 
wings. Additional buildings and infrastructure include a.o. an oblong 
structure with magasina connected by an  aqueduct, also a bathhouse, 
water wells, reservoirs and a water dam.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis Bona Vista
properties.description:
Relatively small complex with a composite lay-out consisting of
 a core area, two rear wings enclosing a gallery and a front addition 
with side sections. Gable roofs over core area, rear wings and front 
addition. Semicircular front and side terrace with detached kitchen. 
Front fa�ade: central section marked  with pilasters with central 
shutter door and tall attic window in gable with undulating rim, side 
sections with shutter windows and corner pilasters. Detached coach 
house.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis Cas Cora
properties.description:
One-storey structure with front yard and rear terrace 
surrounded by various  additional structures. Rectangular core area with
 front  and rear gallery. Gable roof over core area enclosed by gables 
with shoulders, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Interior: typical 
openings between core area and adjacent  rooms, and side galleries.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis Rust en Vrede
properties.description:
One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan with adjoining
 cistern. Core area surrounded by galleries. Hipped roof with cement 
hips and ridge with finials, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Small
 front terrace and full-frontage rear terrace. Interior: exceptionally 
high ceiling.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis Urdal
properties.description:
One of the smaller country houses around Schottegat situated in
 a hofi. Rectangular floor plan with two one- storey adjoining 
rectangular blocks covered with hipped roofs and finials. Dormers on 
three outer hipped ends of front block, on rear hipped end of rear block
 and as connection between roofs. Small front terrace and rear balcony 
with stairs. Adjoining cistern, and well with water reservoir.

properties.name: Mahaai / Landhuis van Engelen
properties.description:
Country estate with rectangular floor plan laid out on a low 
platform. One-storey structure with core area surrounded by galleries. 
Typical steep hipped roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
galleries. Three dormers on long hipped ends, one dormer on short ends. 
Cistern built against northern short fa�ade. Full-frontage front and 
rear terrace.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 11-13, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Design identical to
 adjacent structure Mgr. Niewindtstraat 7-9A. Two hipped roofs parallel 
to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice with dentils 
over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front and rear fa�ade laid out 
in three vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows 
with moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase
 to first floor entrance.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 16-18, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs 
parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over 
all fa�ades, fluted  pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in 
three vertical axes. Full- frontage front balcony on first floor, doors 
and windows with moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. 
Side staircase to first floor entrance.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 17-19, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Exposed concrete 
frame construction. Hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cement hips and
 ridges. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in two pairs of
 two vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with
 weather mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase 
to first floor entrance

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 20, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Composite pattern of hipped 
roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades, 
fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out with central door and
 windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Full  frontage low 
triangular fronton and decorated infill with medallion. Short front 
terrace with balustrade. Oven addition with chimney.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 23, Seru Domi / Santa Famia Church
properties.description:
Large structure positioned in axis of, and with its front to 
Mgr.Niewindtstraat. Gable roof over a six-bay nave with three-sided 
choir, two lean-to roofs over adjoining four- bay aisles. Front fa�ade 
with central gable between two square towers topped with octagonal 
lanterns. Heavy profiled ornamented cornice around nave section; cornice
 with dentils and buttresses for aisle sections. Entrance platform with 
U-shaped block of stairs. Interior: nave and aisles divided by Doric 
columns with supporting arcades.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 24, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Composite pattern of hipped 
roofs. Cornice with dentils over front fa�ade, plain cornice over other 
fa�ades. Pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade: three panelled shutter 
doors with weather mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade. Oven 
addition with chimney and cistern.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 26, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Three parallel hipped roofs 
(front one shorter) with cement hips and ridges wit finials. Cornice 
with dentils over front fa�ade, plain cornice over other fa�ades. Double
 pilasters on corners. Fa�ade surfaces plastered with rustic-work 
pattern. Front fa�ade: three panelled shutter doors with weather 
mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 30-32, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to 
street with cement hips and ridges wit finials. Profiled cornice over 
all fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with doors and
 flanking windows with weather mouldings. Front balcony with staircase. 
Balcony on rear fa�ade.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 35, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 of unequal length. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled 
cornice over fa�ades, pilasters on corners, one pilaster dividing the 
front fa�ade in two unequal sections. Concrete built fa�ades with 
plastered block pattern. Short front terrace with concrete balustrade 
and stairs to street.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 36, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with full-frontage short front 
porch. Hipped roof with corrugated cement roofing. Concrete-built 
fa�ades with natural stone block pattern. Front fa�ade with door and 
flanking windows. Front porch with  low arches supported by fluted and 
bossed Corinthian columns on high base.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 37, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs
 with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over three 
fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows. Short front terrace with balustrade and stairs to 
street at both short ends. Cistern covered wit hipped roof.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 50-52, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs 
parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade 
laid out in three vertical axes, cornice with dentils, pilasters on 
corners. Full-frontage wide horizontal band and front balcony on first 
floor. Side staircase to first floor entrance.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 6-8, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built block-shaped structure. 
Core, front and rear gallery with hipped roofs parallel to street. 
Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. Front and
 rear fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes, all doors and windows 
equipped with weather mouldings.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 7-9A, Seru Domi
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Design identical to
 adjacent structure Mgr. Niewindtstraat 11-13. Two hipped roofs parallel
 to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all 
fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front and rear fa�ade laid out in three 
vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with 
moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase to 
first floor entrance.

properties.name: Middenstraat 8, Punda
properties.description:
Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof with funnel- shaped 
gable with classical top end, small triangular fronton above rectangular
 moulding. Later  on added front gallery.

properties.name: Molenplein 12-19, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with rectangular
 floor plan. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over
 surrounding galleries. Inward and outward curved gables with 
semicircular top end and heavy curls at lower ends. Central transverse 
section with gable roofs. Front fa�ade: entrance on first floor with two
 symmetrically placed L-shaped stairs to front door and balcony. All 
four galleries have sash windows on first floor and arch decorations on 
ground floor.

properties.name: Molenplein z/n, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached mainly two-and-a-half storey structure with 
U-shaped floor plan. Gable roof over core area enclosed with inward and 
outward curved gables and slant  roof over front gallery. Two transverse
 wings with gable roof closed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top ends. Small two storey addition built against front fa�ade.

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 19-27, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached set of five one-storey row-houses. One continuous 
gable roof over all units enclosed with plain funnel-shaped gables. 
Identical fa�ade lay-out for each dwelling which consists of a clamped 
door flanked by ditto windows.

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure ranging 
with street. Gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th 
century top end. Plain cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with dormer 
above cornice. Central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built structure. Two parallel 
hipped roofs over small front and larger rear section. Roofs with cement
 hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all fa�ades. Symmetrical 
front fa�ade with pilasters on corners. Concrete cistern in backyard.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 19-21, Otrobanda / 'San Antonio'
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Part of corral compound of 
Breedestraat 192A. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges
 with finials. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners. 
All fa�ades laid out in vertical axes. Panelled shutter doors and 
shutter windows. Wooden balcony with staircase access on side fa�ade. 
Roof chimney at rear side.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound of 
Breedestraat 192A. Two parallel hipped roofs in shifted position. Roofs 
with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all 
fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front facade with two doors and flanking 
windows and front terrace with typical balustrade.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 25-27, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound with the
 structures Naniesteeg  33-37 and 39-45.Gable roof over core area, slant
 roof over rear gallery with roof chimney. Funnel-shaped gables with 
19th century top ends and oculus. Mark with year 1857. Two dormers on 
both sides of roof.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 28, Otrobanda / Kura di Shon Fil main building
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey structure, main building of corral 
Kura di Shon Fil. Structure includes a portico with stairs, a small 
front section with two, and an adjoining wider section with three 
parallel hipped roofs. The sets of roofs are placed perpendicular to 
each other and are equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Rear side: terrace with cistern and two structures with service 
quarters.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 30-38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure made up of five one-storey row-houses with 
chimneys.   . Part of corral compound Kura di Shon Fil. One continuous 
gable roof over units enclosed with plain gables. No cornice. Identical 
fa�ade lay-out with central door and flanking  windows for each 
dwelling.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 33, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound with the
 structures Naniesteeg  25-27, 33-37 and 39-45. Gable roof with 
funnel-shaped gables and 19th century top ends. Chimney built against 
side fa�ade.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 35-37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure made up of two one-storey dwellings. 
Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg  25-27, 33 and 
39-45. Staggered gable roofs and slant roofs over core area and rear 
gallery. Double roof chimney at rear side. Funnel-shaped gables with 
19th century op end. Two symmetrically laid out fa�ades with central 
door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 39-45, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure made up of four one-storey row- houses 
with chimneys. Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg  
25-27, 33 and 35-37. One continuing gable roof with separation wall in 
middle projecting above roof surface. Cornice over fa�ades. Identical 
symmetrical fa�ade lay-out with central door and flanking windows for 
each dwelling.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 40-50, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Row-house structure with two sets of three adjoining 
structures. Part of  corral compound Kura di Shon Fil. Gable roofs. No 
cornices. Rear addition with two storeys (nrs. 46-50). Identical 
symmetrical fa�ade lay-out with central  door and flanking windows for 
each dwelling unit.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers 
over core area, slant roof over front gallery. Gable with plain 
moulding, oculus and clamped window. Front fa�ade with door and flanking
 windows.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 52, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound 
Kura di Shon Fil. Gable roof enclosed with plain gables. No cornice. 
Symmetrical fa�ade lay-out with central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 8-24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Set of nine one-storey row-houses. Part of corral compound of 
Frederikstraat 148. Row-houses are covered with both gable roofs and 
slant roofs with high end facing the street. Front fa�ade ranging with 
the alley. Symmetrical fa�ade lay-out with central door and flanking 
windows for each dwelling unit.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 16-22, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built double structure with 
rectangular floor plan. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and 
ridges with finials. Cornice  over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners. 
Front fa�ade with balconies, doors and windows in mirror-image lay-out.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 2, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built corner structure with oblong
 floor plan. Flat roof. Cornice over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners. 
Front fa�ade with door with fanlight and balcony on first floor and door
 with side lights on ground floor. Short windows on side fa�ades.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 28, Punda
properties.description:
One-and-a-half storey structure. End unit of a block of 
row-houses facing Kalksteeg. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of 
roof and funnel-shaped gable with19th century top end. Front fa�ade with
 door on ground floor and tall window in gable.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 30, Punda
properties.description:
End unit of a block of three one-storey structures facing 
Kalksteeg. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row- houses 
enclosing a small walled-in rear  yard. Gable roof with dormers on both 
sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front 
fa�ade with panelled door and flanking shutter windows on ground floor 
and tall shutter window in gable.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 32, Punda
properties.description:
End unit of a block of three one-storey structures facing 
Schoonesteeg. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row- houses 
enclosing a small walled-in rear yard. Gable roof with dormers on both 
sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front 
fa�ade with panelled door and flanking shutter windows on ground floor 
and tall shutter window in gable.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 38-40, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Pyramidal roof with cement hips 
and finial. Brick chimney at rear side. Openings on ground and first 
floor not matching. Central balcony on first floor removed.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 4-6, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built structure with rectangular 
floor plan. Basically identical to Nieuwestraat 6-8. Hipped roof with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice  over all fa�ades, 
pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with full-frontage balcony, door  and
 windows laid out in three vertical axes.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 42-44, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped corner structure. Probably 
flat roof. Cornice over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners of first 
floor. Front fa�ade: full-frontage horizontal and meander band and three
 windows with weather mouldings, ground floor with irregular lay-out of 
openings.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 50-60, Punda
properties.description:
Large detached block of three adjoining two-storey structures 
with fronts to street. Front section with three parallel hipped roofs 
perpendicular to street, rear section with transverse  hipped roof. All 
roofs equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over 
all fa�ades, full pilasters on corners and at dividing line of 
structures over first floor only. Regular window lay-out on first floor.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 8-10, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built corner structure with 
rectangular floor plan. Basically identical to Nieuwestraat 4-6. Hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice  over all 
fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with full-frontage balcony, 
door and windows laid out in three vertical axes.

properties.name: Oostpunt / Landhuis Choloma
properties.description:
Country estate complex with main structure and additional 
buildings. Main  building: three parallel one-storey structures with 
gable roofs enclosed with plain gables. Adjoining kitchen with oven and 
cistern. Front fa�ade with short terrace and central door flanked with 
two tall shutter windows on each side. Semicircular weather mouldings 
above windows and plastered image of  a  dove above door. Circular water
 well, water reservoir and magasina with stable.

properties.name: Oostpunt / Landhuis Groot Sint Joris
properties.description:
Large complex with main structure and additional buildings. 
Main  building:  one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan 
divided in three equal sections. Three parallel hipped roofs over 
sections, core section with hipped and gable end. Front fa�ade: core 
section closed with almost semicircular gable with a palmet in top end, 
flanking sections with slightly curved rim with volute ornamentations. 
Cistern with aqueduct on rear side. Large closed front terrace 
surrounded by additional buildings. Rear terrace with semicircular 
middle section. Cow stable and large well on premises.

properties.name: Pannekoek / Landhuis Cas Abou
properties.description:
Large one-storey structure laid out on an elevated platform. 
Rectangular core area with front, rear and side gallery. Gable roof over
 core area enclosed by gables with shoulders, adjoining slant roof over 
galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. On one corner gallery 
interrupted by one-storey structure with hipped roof. Large terrace 
around property. Additional structures: magasina, coach house with 
threshing floor, cistern and typical toilet building.

properties.name: Pannekoek / Landhuis San Juan
properties.description:
One of the oldest plantations of the island. Main building with
 rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. One-storey 
structure with core area surrounded by galleries. Hipped roof with 
dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. 
Full-frontage front and rear terrace. Additional structures include a 
kitchen, a  fornu di pan and salt grinders on the rear terrace, a group 
of magasina's with cistern connected with an aqueduct to the main 
building. Also a magasina, corrals and a graveyard enclosing a large 
walled-in rectangular open area with gate in front of the main building.

properties.name: Parera / Landhuis Parera
properties.description:
Country estate, later on used as country house, situated on a 
hilltop. Rectangular, oblong floor plan laid out on an elevated 
platform. Two-storey core covered with gable roof, adjoining one- storey
 flanking galleries with lean-to roofs leaning to core fa�ades. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Profiled cornice over 
first floor core fa�ades. Profiled cornice with dentils and drapery 
ornamentation over ground floor fa�ades. Full-frontage terraces over 
long side of structure with stairs  .

properties.name: Pater Euwensweg z/n, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large two-storey structure set back from the street on deep 
lot. Rectangular floor plan with core surrounded by galleries. Gable 
roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries. Funnel-shaped gables 
with 19th century top ends. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Front 
fa�ade laid out in axes with stairs leading to door on first floor. 
Front terrace with stairs to yard. Rear fa�ade with L-shaped balcony 
supported by columns. Additional buildings lining the edges of front and
 rear yard.

properties.name: Penstraat 15-19, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with a wide street frontage
 and slightly set back  position. Low gable roof with a full-frontage 
span and triangular fronton with plasterwork star. Front fa�ade: two 
sections separated by a pilaster in the middle and pilasters on corners.
 Left section laid out in four vertical axes with two doors in the 
centre,  right section with three vertical axes with one door in centre.
 Balconies not original or replacements.

properties.name: Penstraat 22-24, Berg Altena / 'Kas di  Pueblo'
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with a large setback from 
the street. Steep hipped roof with dormers with triangular frontons on 
all hipped ends. Stone  front addition with flat roof and cornice and 
wooden rear addition with slant roof on first floor, both supported by 
columns. Short front terrace with stairs with curved stone balustrade. 
Two covered cisterns positioned as transverse wings at rear side.

properties.name: Penstraat 3, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan. Main 
roof with ridge parallel to street. Main section with typical steep 
gable roof over rectangular area and adjoining slant roof over rear 
gallery. Central transverse front addition with lower gable roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Cistern against rear 
gallery.

properties.name: Penstraat 36, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Large detached structure on narrow, deep lot. Two-storey front 
section covered with two parallel gable roofs and gallery with slant 
roof. One-storey rear section with two transverse wings enclosing a 
patio. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter
 doors and flanking shutter windows on both floors. Triangular fronton 
above cornice. Central balcony.

properties.name: Penstraat 41-45, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Two identical small one-storey structures with ridges parallel 
to street and separated by a narrow entrance to back yard. Rectangular 
floor plans covered with gable roofs enclosed by  funnel-shaped gables 
with  19th century top ends. Front fa�ades with two alternating doors 
and windows for each structure.

properties.name: Penstraat 5, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Small detached one-and-a-half storey structure with roof 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan and 
funnel-shaped gable with classical top end and volute curl mouldings at 
side ends; wooden wall cramp visible in gable top. Front gallery with 
lean-to roof parallel to street. Gallery fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows.

properties.name: Penstraat 55, Berg Altena / 'Kas di Hubentud'
properties.description:
Large symmetrically set-up monumental complex with main 
structure and additional buildings. Two-storey cube-shaped main building
 with hipped roof and adjoining one-storey rear gallery with lean-to 
roof. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with central doors and flanking
 shutter windows. Central balcony on first floor. Additional buildings 
include two one-storey side wings, a cistern and six one- storey 
structures in backyard, a.o. a kitchen building and two structures in 
corner of backyard. Gate in backyard wall positioned in central axis of 
complex. Two vase ornaments on flanking gate pillars.

properties.name: Penstraat 57, Berg Altena
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Main structure: two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and 
ridges with finials over two rectangular blocks of different size; 
adjoining transverse wing. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice, pilasters
 and central door with flanking windows. Small front terrace with stone 
balustrade. Cistern at rear side.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 100A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure quite similar to adjoining 
structure 102A. Rectangular floor plan with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 
19th century top end. Front fa�ade with windows and doors laid out in 
five axes. Front balcony (present fretwork balcony is not original) with
 stairs to first floor supported by four Tuscan columns. Front terrace 
with pillared fence. Decorated frieze continuing to nr.102A.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 102A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure quite similar to but smaller
 than adjoining structure nr.100A. Rectangular floor plan with ridge 
parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs 
over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. 
Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front fa�ade with windows
 and doors laid out in three vertical axes. Front balcony with stairs to
 first floor. Front terrace with pillared fence. Decorated frieze 
continuing to nr.102A.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 104, Punda / Hotel Buona-Sera Inn
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow deep lot. 
Rectangular floor plan with gable roof enclosed with pointed gables with
 transverse band and semicircular oculus. Cornice and horizontal bands 
over exposed fa�ades. Three windows on first floor, central door and 
flanking windows on ground floor. Front terrace with pillared fence and 
gate with semicircular steps to street level.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 137, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Main building of corral with 
additional structures nrs.139-141. Gable roof over core area, adjoining 
slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 
shoulders and19th century top ends and oculus. Three dormers on both 
sides of roof. Walled-in yard.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 139-141, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure made up of two small adjoining 
dwellings. Rectangular floor plan with core area and rear gallery. One  
continuous gable roof and adjoining slant roof with funnel-shaped gables
 and 19th century top end, interrupted by ditto gable of separation wall
 projecting over roof surface. Three dormers on both sides of main roof.
 Front fa�ade with modest cornice, three doors and ditto windows.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 154, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on a basement above 
ground. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over 
core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. 
Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and top ends with triangular fronton
 above rectangular mouldings. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. 
Rear section with transverse hipped roofs and three tent roofs 
surrounding a patio. Front fa�ade: corner pilasters hide standpipes 
connected to cistern under front terrace. Front stairs with landing.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 16, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow deep lot. Front 
and rear section with gable roofs. Gable with typical truncated pointed 
arch and profiled mouldings. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical 
axes. First floor with three shutter doors topped with frontons with 
identical truncated pointed arches, ground floor with central door and 
flanking windows. Full-frontage front balcony supported by columns. 
Front staircase to balcony.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 160, Punda / 'Cerro Bonito'
properties.description:
Large two-storey mansion in setback position and ridge parallel
 to street. Hipped roof with finials.  Dormers on all hipped ends. 
Cornice / entablature and heavy horizontal band halfway fa�ade height 
continuing over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in seven axes with 
windows on first floor and central door and windows on  ground floor. 
Front terrace with balustrade and central stairs to front yard. Rear 
additions: two cisterns laid out as side wings connected with aqueducts 
to main structure.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 168-170, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Main structure with gable roof and front-side dormers over core area and
 adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Transverse rear 
wings with gable roofs enclosing a patio. Gable roofs with funnel-shaped
 gables and 19th century top ends. Typical inward curved patio gable of 
rear gallery. Two servants' quarters at front side under one gable roof 
interrupted by a gabled separation wall.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 18, Punda
properties.description:
Semi detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front  
and rear galleries. Three dormers on front side and two on rear side of 
roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top ends. 
Widde cornice. Front fa�ade with central door and two flanking windows 
on each side.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 19, Punda
properties.description:
Detached symmetrically set up one-storey structure laid out on a
 basement. Rectangular floor plan and gable roof with ridge parallel to 
street. Truncated gables with knob ornaments. Portico with classically 
detailed elements supported by two double columns. Full-frontage front 
terrace with open stonework balustrade and widening stairs with straight
 balustrades.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 20A, Punda
properties.description:
Detached symmetrically set up two-storey structure with ridges 
parallel to street. Four parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor 
plan. Cornice over fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows. Short full-frontage front terrace 
flanked with two symmetrical staircases with landings on terrace ends.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 23, Punda
properties.description:
Detached symmetrically laid out one-storey structure laid out 
on elevated substructure. Gable roof with ridge parallel to street over 
core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Rear wings with 
gable roofs and slant roofs over galleries enclosing a patio. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Three dormers on both 
sides of main roof. Full-frontage front terrace with stone openwork 
balustrade and central stairs.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 25B/C, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Small front 
section with U-shaped front balcony on first floor and ditto terrace on 
ground floor, and larger adjoining main section. Broken hipped roof with
 ridge parallel to street. Windows with typical fanlights and weather 
mouldings.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 33, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped corner structure with similar 
design as nrs. 35 and 37-37A. Rectangular floor plan with flat roof. 
Cornice with parapet topping fa�ades of main section, fluted pilasters 
on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with central 
shutter door and flanking shutter windows on first floor and shutter 
doors on ground floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with 
pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 35, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with similar 
design as nrs. 33 and 37-37A. Rectangular floor plan with flat roof. 
Cornice over fa�ades of main section, fluted pilasters on corners. Front
 fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door and 
flanking shutter windows on first floor and shutter doors on ground 
floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 36, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan and 
ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge 
with finials. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice and central door and 
flanking windows. Short front terrace with stone balustrade and central 
entrance.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 37-37A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with similar 
design as nrs. 33 and 35, yet with a larger frontage. Rectangular floor 
plan with flat roof. Cornice over fa�ades of main section, fluted 
pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with 
central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on first floor and 
shutter doors on ground floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace 
with pillared fence. External side staircase to nr.37A.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 39, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan 
and ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant
 roof over front gallery. Two adjoining rear structures, both with 
hipped roofs with ridges in different directions. Main roof closed with 
gable with typical shoulders and arched fronton above a rectangular 
moulding. Front fa�ade with projecting cornice and central door with two
 windows on both sides. Short front terrace with pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 4, Punda
properties.description:
Large detached symmetrically set up one-storey structure laid 
out on a basement. U-shaped floor plan covered with hipped roof. 
Splendidly detailed cornice, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front
 fa�ade with three doors and four windows in alternating sequence. 
Portico with triangular fronton supported by columns. Front terrace with
 symmetrically laid out winding stairs.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 42, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure positioned between two
 alleys. Composite floor plan with ridge parallel to street. Main front 
section with gable roof enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top ends. Three front dormers. Adjoining rear section with 
transverse hipped roofs and gable roof in middle. Front fa�ade with 
cornice and five-bay lay-out marked by flat pilasters on fa�ade. Central
 entrance and two windows on both sides with moulded triangular frontons
 above frames.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 50, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Forms one structure with nr. 52. Gable roof over core area, 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by plain 
gable. Three dormers on front side of roof. Front fa�ade with central 
shutter door and two flanking windows on each side. Short front terrace 
with pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 52, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Forms one structure with nr. 50. Gable roof over core area, 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by plain 
gable. One dormer on both sides of roof. Front fa�ade with central 
shutter door and flanking shutter windows. Short front terrace with 
stone walls and central entrance.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 53-57, Punda
properties.description:
Block of three dwellings positioned between two alleys. Hipped 
roofs perpendicular to street. One two-storey section (nr. 53) with 
plain hipped roof and two one-storey sections (nrs. 55-57) with U-shaped
 hipped roof. Two dormers on front side and three dormers on alley-side.
 Front fa�ade: three windows on first floor of two-storey section; 
ground floor with central shutter door flanked with shutter windows for 
each dwelling, connected with a horizontal band. Full-frontage short 
terrace with pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 54, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Rectangular floor plan with
 gable roof perpendicular to street. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top ends and oculus. Front fa�ade with central door on first 
floor and central door and window on one side on ground floor. 
Full-frontage front balcony supported by two square columns on corners. 
Short terrace on ground floor covered by balcony.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 56, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey concrete-built structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with cement
 hips and ridge with finials. Heavy cornice over exposed fa�ades, small 
pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows on ground and first floor. Concrete balcony with consoles and 
solid balustrades. Short front terrace with full-frontage fence with 
stonework infill between pillars.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 58, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure on narrow, deep lot, built against 
adjacent structures. Ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor 
plan covered with broken gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders
 and 19th century top ends.  Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical 
axes; two full-frontage horizontal bands. Sort front terrace with solid 
stone balustrade and central entrance.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 60, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure on narrow deep lot, built against adjacent
  properties. Ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with 
gable roof. Front-side dormer above cornice exposed as triangular 
fronton. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Front fa�ade laid out in three 
vertical axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on 
ground and first floor. Full-frontage front balcony. Short front 
terrace.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 61, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with rear addition. Gable roof with 
dormers over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage front terrace.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 63, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with rear addition. Gable roof with  
dormer over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Rear addition with 
pyramidal roof. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. 
Full-frontage front terrace with pillared fence.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 65, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped 
gable with 19th century top end with moulded rim and semicircular 
oculus. Cornice and frieze above openings set between horizontal bands 
over exposed fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows. Front terrace with low stone balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 67, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with large frontage and 
ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant 
roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of main 
roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front  fa�ade: 
first floor with central door flanked by two windows on each side. Full-
 frontage wooden front balcony supported by six columns. Short front 
terrace covered by balcony. (Front balcony and part of fa�ade destroyed 
by heavy rainstorms in December 1999)

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 68, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan. 
Main structure  with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core 
area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormers on both sides of 
roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Projecting cornice 
with dentils. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows with 
rhombic ornaments above openings. Front terrace. Adjoining rear 
structure with gable roofs.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 69, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with additional structures. 
Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area,
 adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers on both sides of 
main roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Cornice 
with typical brick dentils. Front  fa�ade: first floor with central door
 flanked by windows. Full-frontage wooden front balcony supported by 
four columns. Short front terrace covered by balcony (Front balcony 
destroyed by heavy rainstorms in December 1999)

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 70, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure. Rectangular 
floor plan with slant roof at front and flat roof further behind. 
Cornice with full-frontage band of curled mouldings; fluted pilasters in
 two sections on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes 
with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Almost
 full-frontage balcony over ground floor terrace with concrete terrace 
walls.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 71, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Flat 
roof. Front section with small setback sections at corners accommodating
 two staircases (right one belongs to adjacent property). Projecting 
cornice with dentils over exposed fa�ades and fluted pilasters on 
corners. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows on ground 
and first floor. Weather mouldings above openings continued as 
horizontal bands. Almost full-frontage front balcony.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 72, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure with rear 
additions. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over exposed fa�ades, 
fluted two-tiered pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door 
and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Small front balcony. 
Short front terrace with concrete balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 73A-75A, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Flat 
roof. Projecting cornice over exposed fa�ades. Fluted pilasters on 
corners and in central axis of fa�ade dividing the front fa�ade in two 
sections. Front fa�ade with two doors on ground and first floor. 
Full-frontage front balcony with balustrade of wooden fretwork. Front 
terrace with pillared fence. (The two staircases are later additions)

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 74, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Broken hipped roof over floor plan with 
rectangular sections. Front fa�ade topped with cantilevered roof with 
brackets. Front balcony on roof of bay flanked with a typical set of  
windows on ground floor. Full-frontage horizontal band with brackets on 
bay- roof level. Short front terrace with stone balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 76, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Main structure with rectangular floor plan and rear additions. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Roof
 enclosed with plain gable. Dormers with triangular fronton and 19th 
century top ends on both sides of main roof. Front fa�ade with cornice 
and full- frontage double horizontal bands. Central door with flanking 
windows. Front terrace with stone terrace walls.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 77 / Vissteeg 1, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with rear addition. Oldest 
known structure on Pietermaai Smal. Main structure with ridge parallel 
to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front 
and rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gable with shoulders; top end with 
triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Dormer on both sides of 
roof. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace
 with pillared fence and stone bench against footing. Rear addition with
 slant roof and high end ranging with alley.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 8, Punda
properties.description:
Large detached symmetrically set up two-storey structure with 
additional buildings. Main section with ridge perpendicular to street. 
Hipped roof with dormers over main section, adjoining slant roofs over 
flanking side galleries. Pyramidal roofs over two tower-shaped pavilions
 at rear corners. Front fa�ade: central section with cornice, horizontal
 band and central door with two flanking windows on each side; windows 
on short ends of galleries. Front balcony.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 80, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof, cement hips and ridge 
with finials. Dormer on front side. Cornice over  fa�ades, quoins with 
block pattern on corners. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows on ground and first floor. Front  balcony with consoles and 
stone openwork balustrade with circles. Short front terrace with ditto 
balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 81, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with rear addition. Main 
structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gable 
with shoulders and 19th century top end. Dormer on both sides of roof. 
Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace with 
pillared fence and central entrance.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 82, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure and rear additions. Main 
structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan 
with hipped roof, cement hips and ridge with finials. Dormer on front 
side. Cornice over  fa�ades, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front
  balcony with consoles and stone openwork balustrade with circles. 
Short front terrace with ditto balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 83, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with side and rear 
additions. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over
 core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. 
Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders and top end with triangular fronton 
above rectangular moulding . Dormer on both sides of roof. Front fa�ade 
with door and three windows. Front gallery continued to the east with 
gable roof. Front terrace with pillared fence and central entrance.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 85, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow lot with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends, oculus with star 
ornament on front gable. Small full- frontage horizontal band above 
openings of first floor. Concrete balcony (possibly replacement) and 
side staircase. Short front terrace.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 86A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs 
wit cement  hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade with ornamented 
triangular fronton and profiled cornice with dentils,  two-tiered 
pilasters on corners. Central door and flanking windows on ground and 
first floor. All openings with decorated fanlights and classical moulded
 frames with weather mouldings. Full-frontage balcony, front  terrace 
with stone openwork balustrade between pillars.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 89, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof with cement hips and 
finials. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over fa�ade openings, 
pilasters on corners. Three doors on first floor and door and flanking 
windows on ground floor. Side staircase to first  floor. Full-frontage 
balcony over short front terrace.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 91A, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with large frontage. Ridges 
parallel to street. Almost rectangular floor plan with two parallel 
hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Projected cornice
 with dentils and dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade with shutter 
doors and windows in five axes on first floor with projecting horizontal
 band above openings. Almost full-frontage wooden balcony supported by 
columns with (new) square lower section.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 92, Punda
properties.description:
Detached  two-storey block-shaped structure. Front section with
 wider rear section. (Almost) flat roof with parapet. Front fa�ade: 
cornice with dentils with a pointed and block pattern, three-tiered 
fluted pilasters on corners. Doors and windows with projecting weather 
mouldings in three axes. Side staircase on west fa�ade. Pillared fence. 
Front balcony removed.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 93, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with two steep hipped roofs over double 
core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormers on
 all hipped ends. Adjoining rear addition with hipped roof. Front fa�ade
 with central shutter door and flanking windows. Front terrace with 
stone openwork balustrade.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 96, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof. Fa�ades with decorated 
frieze between cornice and horizontal band; two parallel horizontal 
bands in zone between openings of ground and first floor. Front balcony 
supported by two columns. Front terrace with side stairs to first floor.
 Decoration with rhombic ornaments on frieze, balcony balustrade and 
terrace walls.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 98A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with a deep setback. Front 
section with two hipped roofs parallel to street and adjoining rear 
section with hipped roofs in transverse position. Front fa�ade: 
triangular fronton above cornice with medallion with mark '1897'. Three 
shutter doors with semicircular weather mouldings and pseudo fanlights 
on ground and first floor. Full-frontage wooden balcony supported by two
 columns with base. Pillared fence around front yard.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 25-27, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and 
adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 
oculus. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes, central door on ground 
floor. Plain cornice and continuous horizontal band around structure 
below sills of first-floor windows. Wooden balcony on west  fa�ade.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 26-28, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with two units located in corral 
of Breedestraat 192. Rectangular floor plan covered with slant roof. 
Front fa�ade on high end of roof. Chimney on side fa�ade.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 32, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with main section and transverse 
wing located in corral of Pieterszsteeg 34-38. Main section with hipped 
roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Wing section with slant 
roof. Fa�ades with shutter doors and windows. Heavy L-shaped profiled 
cornice. Corral wall on rear side.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 34-38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure, main building of large corral 
with structures nrs. 32, 42 and 54. Rectangular floor plan with gable 
roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
galleries. Three dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel-shaped 
gables with 19th century top end. Adjoining spaces with slant roofs 
built against side fa�ades. Two meters high corral wall along 
Pieterszsteeg with gate.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 42, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure located in corral of 
Pieterszsteeg 34-38  and quite similar to nr. 54. Gable roof over core 
area and slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top ends with oculus in star ornament. Front fa�ade ranging with
 alley with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 54, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure located in corral of 
Pieterszsteeg 34-38  and quite similar to nr. 42. Gable roof over core 
area and slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top ends. Front fa�ade ranging with alley with central clamped 
door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 60-62, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, 
adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Adjoining gable roof over rear 
section. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and square 
oculus. Front fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes, central door on 
ground floor. Plain cornice. Two-storey structure with loggia and 
pyramidal roof built against eastern fa�ade.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 8-18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey structure accommodating six row-houses located in 
corral of Breedestraat 192. One continuous gable roof enclosed with 
funnel-shaped gables. Each unit: front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows. Roof chimney on rear side.

properties.name: Piscaderabaai / Fort on Piscaderabaai
properties.description:
Battery facing the entrance of Piscaderabaai. Plain arrow- 
shaped design open at rear side. Platform with shooting gallery and a 
powder house. Barracks at unprotected rear flank. Plastered stone walls 
with sloping top end.

properties.name: Piscaderabaai / Landhuis Veeris
properties.description:
Country estate complex with main building and additional 
structures. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor 
plan. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries. Two dormers
 on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with triangular fronton and
 inward and outward curved gables at gallery level. Full-frontage front 
terrace and ditto short rear terrace. Additional structures include a 
two-storey cistern and a magasina connected  with three arches to the 
main building.

properties.name: Plaza Horacio Hoyer 15-17, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey main structure with one-storey addition. 
Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over 
main structure and lean-to roof over rear addition. Front fa�ade with 
pilasters on corners and in the middle dividing the fa�ade in two 
sections with a similar lay out of shutter doors and shutter windows 
with weather mouldings.

properties.name: Plaza Horacio Hoyer 19, Punda / Former 'Club Cura�ao '
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Main section with sala, front 
and rear gallery and two rear wings on both sides of a patio. Three 
parallel hipped roofs over main section and two transverse hipped roofs 
placed in line over each wing. All roofs with cement hips and ridges 
with finials. Front fa�ade with triangular decorated fronton above 
cornice and pilasters on corners. Central door and flanking windows with
 fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs.

properties.name: Plaza Horacio Hoyer 21, Punda / Radio Hoyer
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Rectangular roof plan with gable
 roof and dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th 
century top ends and semicircular oculus. Flat cornice around fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade with central shutter door with two shutter windows on both 
sides. Strip weather mouldings above openings.

properties.name: Plaza Jojo Correa 2-4, Punda / Maduro and Curiel's Bank
properties.description:
Large semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with 
attic under mansard roof. Profiled cornice under attic. Front fa�ade 
with two balconies on consoles. Windows with leaded fanlights. Small 
towers with pointed roofs on corners supported by consoles.

properties.name: President  R. Betancourt  Blvd 4, Parera / Kadaster (Land Registry)
properties.description:
Large detached complex on Berg Arrarat built in neo- classicist
 style. Two distinct building sections. Western section: T-shaped floor 
plan with hipped roof over core and gable roof over front addition with 
decorated triangular fronton. Eastern section: rectangular floor plan on
 platform with hipped roofs over two-storey core area and rear gallery 
and flat roof over one-storey front addition. Covered cistern on east 
fa�ade.

properties.name: Prinsenstraat 74, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure. Rectangular floor plan with gable 
roof. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 
19th century top  ends and oculus. Profiled cornice and horizontal band 
over exposed fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in seven axes with shutter 
windows with weather mouldings on first floor.

properties.name: Prinsenstraat 80, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure  with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof
 over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries.
  Pointed gables with rounded top ends and oculus in star. Three dormers
 on both sides of main roof. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice, three 
clamped doors and window. Front terrace with stone staircase access.

properties.name: Quintastraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two blocks of different size covered with hipped roofs with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades, 
fluted  pilasters  on corners. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows topped with moulded triangular frontons. Front part of 
fence has pillars with stone openwork.

properties.name: Quintastraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge parallel to
 street. Rectangular floor plan covered with gable roof with two dormers
 on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends
 and oculus. Front fa�ade: small plain cornice and window flanked with 
two doors.

properties.name: Quintastraat 21, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof with cement hips and 
ridge with finials. Cornice around fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central 
panelled shutter door flanked with shutter windows. Weather mouldings 
above openings. Fence with sawn small wooden boards.

properties.name: Quintastraat 29-35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey double structure of unequal width. Ridge 
perpendicular to street. Two rectangular sections covered with hipped 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice and horizontal 
band over fa�ades. Font fa�ade of sections laid out in three axes with 
windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground 
floor.

properties.name: Quintastraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Two 
dormers on both sides of roof. Truncated gables with top ornament. Front
 fa�ade with small window in gable and central door and flanking 
windows. No weather mouldings. Stonewall front fence with central 
entrance.

properties.name: Quintastraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan covered with three parallel hipped roofs 
with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades,
 pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with decorated triangular fronton 
with dentils topped with knob ornament. Central door and flanking 
windows with profiled weather mouldings with vase ornament. Kitchen with
 chimney built against rear fa�ade. Front and side fence with pillars 
and stone openwork, and solid stone walls respectively.

properties.name: Rancho / Landhuis Noordkant
properties.description:
Plantation complex with main building and additional structures
 laid out on terraces. Main building: rectangular floor plan with core 
area and galleries. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs 
over galleries. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Two dormers on both sides of
 roof. Plantation facilities include: adjoining transverse structures, 
magasina, coach house and corrals, stable, well and tanki .

properties.name: Rembrandstraat 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan with cut-away rear corner. Three hipped 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over 
facades, tapered pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door 
and flanking windows. Small addition with two ovens. Short front terrace
 with stone openwork fence. Gates in side wall ranging with 
Koningstraat.

properties.name: Rembrandstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Rectangular floor plan covered with two hipped roofs. Profiled 
cornice over facades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central 
door and flanking windows with flat tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. 
Short front terrace with stone openwork fence.

properties.name: Reuzensteeg 13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
alley. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement
 hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades. Front 
fa�ade: central door with oval ornament above door frame and flanking 
windows. Profiled weather mouldings. Pillared front fence with wooden 
bars, stonewall fences at sides.

properties.name: Reuzensteeg 2, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey corner structure ranging with alley. 
Part of corral of Roodeweg 44 (Casablanca). Hipped roofs with cement 
hips and ridges with finials over two rectangular blocks of different 
size. Plain cornice over facades. Front fa�ade with central door and 
three windows with fanlights and profiled weather mouldings. High corral
 walls in line with front and side fa�ade

properties.name: Rialtostraat z/n, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large semi-detached structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over three-storey core area and lean-to roofs over flanking 
two-storey galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. 
Profiled cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade: core laid out with 
windows in three axes; gallery laidout in seven axes with central door 
and flanking windows on both floors. Central balcony supported by 
columns. Ditto balcony on side fa�ade.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 10A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure ranging  with both streets. Ridge 
perpendicular to Rifwaterstraat. Gable roof with eaves over core area 
and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Dormer on both sides of main
 roof. Truncated gable with window and knob ornament on gable end. Gable
 and gallery fa�ade with single doors.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Dormer on both sides of main roof. Front fa�ade with profiled 
cornice, shutter window and two panelled shutter doors.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 16-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front 
and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Truncated 
gables with shoulders, rhombic oculus, and knob ornaments on gable ends.
 Plain cornice on front and side fa�ades continuing into aqueduct 
connected with detached cistern. Front fa�ade ranging with street; two 
alternating windows and doors.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 19-21, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Twin 
structure of nr. 23-25. Rectangular floor plan covered with hipped roof.
 Two-band cornice over fa�ades with typical corner ornaments. Front 
fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with shutter windows on first 
floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Gate access
 to rear yard on both sides of structure.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey (nr.2) and one-storey (nr.4) joint structures built 
against adjacent properties. Gable roofs, nr 2 with funnel-shaped gable,
 nr.4 with dormers on both sides of roof. Front fa�ades ranging with 
alley with door and window with plain weather mouldings for each 
structure.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 23-25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Twin 
structure of nr. 19-21. Rectangular floor plan covered with hipped roof.
 Two-band cornice over fa�ades with typical corner ornaments. Front 
fa�ade laid out in three vertical axes with shutter windows on first 
floor and door and two windows on ground floor. Gate access to rear yard
 on both sides of structure.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 27, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure  with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and 
rear gallery. Dormers on both sides of main roof. Front fa�ade with 
profiled cornice; central shutter window flanked with two panelled 
shutter doors. Side gate with access to  rear yard.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 29-31, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two storey structure ranging with alley. Two sections 
forming an L-shaped floor plan. Hipped roofs over both sections placed 
parallel and perpendicular to alley. Cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Cornice over all fa�ades, weather mouldings above openings. 
Front fa�ade laid out in four vertical axes with windows on first floor 
and three doors and window on ground floor. Gate with triangular fronton
 with access to rear yard.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 3-5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties with 
ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant 
roof over front gallery. Front fa�ade ranging with street; windows and 
doors laid out in three axes. First floor windows set between two 
full-frontage horizontal bands. Ditto band above openings on ground 
floor.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties with 
ridge parallel to alley. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Front 
fa�ade ranging with street; windows and doors laid out in four vertical 
axes with two doors in centre on ground floor. Plain cornice and weather
 mouldings.

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties and 
ranging with street. Ridge perpendicular to alley. Rectangular main 
section and addition covered with broken hipped roof. Plain cornice and 
full-frontage horizontal band. Front fa�ade laid out in two vertical 
axes: plain door and door with side windows on ground floor. Tunnel- 
shaped weather mouldings above openings and low horizontal band 
interrupted by openings.

properties.name: Ronde Klip / Archaeological Monument Rock paintings Ronde Klip
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and rock paintings from 
the Ceramic Age dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site of approximately 
1000 square meters located on the second terrace facing the sea at Ronde
 Klip. Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone and a 
little pottery debris as well as tools of shells and stone. Large number
 of prehistoric rock paintings in the system of caves and passages.

properties.name: Ronde Klip / Archaeological Monument Rock paintings Ronde Klip
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and rock paintings from 
the Ceramic Age dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site of approximately 
1000 square meters located on the second terrace facing the sea at Ronde
 Klip. Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone and a 
little pottery debris as well as tools of shells and stone. Large number
 of prehistoric rock paintings in the system of caves and passages.

properties.name: Roodesteeg 2A, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. 
Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with arched 
top end above rectangular moulding and square ventilation opening. Front
 (gable) fa�ade with central window and flanking doors. Gate to rear 
yard.

properties.name: Roodeweg 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure located in the corral of 
Roodeweg 44. Gable roofs over core area and front gallery, adjoining 
slant roof over rear gallery. Three dormers on front and rear sides of 
main roofs, roof chimney at rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th
 century top ends and semicircular oculus in radiating moulding. 
Profiled cornice over front and side fa�ades. Fa�ades laid out in 
vertical axes. Front balcony supported by columns placed over 
full-frontage short terrace with steps.

properties.name: Roodeweg 35A-37A, Otrobanda / Renata building
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure set back from street. 
U-shaped floor plan enclosing a patio. Parallel hipped roofs over front 
section and rear wings, pyramidal roof at inner end of patio. Roofs 
finished  with cement hips and ridges with finials. Heavy cornice  over 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade with symmetrical set-up and laid out in five axes.
 Loggia's with wooden balustrade on fa�ade ends. Doors and windows set 
in a system of horizontal and vertical bands.

properties.name: Roodeweg 38-40 / Reuzenstraat 2A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey elongated structure. One continuous hipped 
roof with  wider base at front section and short parallel hipped roof at
