 rear section. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front 
fa�ade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor.
 Front balcony over loggia with columns, balustrades with stone 
balusters set between pillars.

properties.name: Roodeweg 41A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to 
Roodeweg. Rectangular floor plan covered with three parallel hipped 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade with 
central shutter door and flanking shutter windows. Full-frontage front 
balcony.

properties.name: Roodeweg 42A-44, Otrobanda / 'Casablanca'
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey monumental structure set back from 
street. Main building of corral originally fully surrounded by 
additional buildings at edges of corral. U- shaped floor plan enclosing a
 patio. Two parallel hipped roofs over front section, gable roofs over 
rear wings. Heavy profiled and fully decorated projecting cornice on 
consoles over fa�ades, dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade laid out 
in seven axes. Central section with triangular fronton above cornice; 
front balcony above portico with double columns on front platform with 
steps. Front fence with footing wall and bars set between pillars. 
Central front gate between fluted pillars, two additional gates on both 
sides. Fully restored as Civil Registry (restoration awarded with 
Carfibbean prize for best restoration architecture).

properties.name: Roodeweg 48, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over fa�ades, quoins with block
 pattern on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes with small 
windows with semicircular fanlights on second floor, three doors with 
fanlights and profiled weather mouldings on console on first floor. 
Full- frontage front balcony. Side staircase to first floor. Eastern 
two-storey front addition and balcony (probably) later additions.

properties.name: Roodeweg 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery and also over part of side gallery. Two dormers on both sides of
 main roof. Funnel- shaped gables with plain top ends. Kitchen with 
chimney in corner of side gallery.

properties.name: Roodeweg 64-66A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached spaciously set-up two-storey structure set back from 
street. Elongated floor plan covered with five parallel hipped roofs in a
 row, all provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice 
with dentils and fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out with
 doors on both floors in three axes. Two-tiered front portico with 
richly decorated  fronton supported by fluted bossed columns with 
Corinthian capital. Winding stairs on both sides of front balcony.

properties.name: Roodeweg 68-72A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi detached group of three separate buildings. Two two- 
storey structures facing Roodeweg with ridges parallel and perpendicular
 to street, one-storey structure with gable roof set back behind infill 
addition. Plain funnel-shaped gables.

properties.name: Roodeweg 74A, Otrobanda / Pietersz Guesthouse
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to 
Roodeweg. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front
 and rear galleries.  Two dormers on both sides of main roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, oculus and 19th century top end 
with date mark '1861'. Front fa�ade laid out in four axes with two doors
 in centre and two windows on both sides. Front balcony supported by 
columns. Short front terrace with fence of stone openwork.

properties.name: Roodeweg 76A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
Roodeweg. Rectangular floor plan with three parallel hipped roofs in a 
row provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Additional rear 
structures with pyramidal and slant roofs. Front fa�ade laid out in 
three axes with shutter windows on first floor and two clamped doors and
 ditto window on ground floor. Side wall with entrance to yard and 
stairs to balcony (new) on first  floor.

properties.name: Roodeweg 80-84, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block with large frontage and ridge 
parallel to street. Elongated floor plan with two long parallel hipped 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over exposed 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade with lay-out of three identical patterns: central 
door flanked with windows on ground floor and three windows on first 
floor. Rear balcony.

properties.name: Roodeweg 86, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Forms one 
building block together with nr. 88A. Rectangular floor plan with two 
parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled
 cornice, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out 
in three vertical axes with central shutter door with flanking shutter 
windows on ground and first floor. All openings provided with softly 
curved weather mouldings. Central front balcony. Staircase on side 
fa�ade to balcony with entrance on first floor.

properties.name: Roodeweg 88A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Forms one 
building block together with nr. 86. Rectangular floor plan with two 
parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled
 cornice, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out 
in three axes with central shutter door with flanking shutter windows on
 first floor. All openings on first floor provided with softly curved 
weather mouldings. Central front balcony. Staircase on side fa�ade to 
balcony (not  original) with entrance on first floor.

properties.name: Roodeweg 9-9A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Tapered floor plan 
covered with front  hipped roof and adjoining ditto roof in transverse 
position. Tasselled cornice over front and side fa�ades, fluted 
pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door with flanking 
windows on first floor. Inverted ogee arch with tassel decoration below 
windows. Front balcony on consoles.

properties.name: Roodeweg 92A, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Rectangular floor plan with three parallel hipped roofs in a row 
provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. (Original lay-out of 
front fa�ade covered with full-frontage advertisement)

properties.name: Rooi Santu / Archaeological Monument Midden Seinpost
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of 
archaeological artefacts and soil structures in various concentrations. 
Site area  approximately 1000 square meters, located on the north slope 
of hilltop Midden Seinpost. Site includes ruins of military barracks and
 a foundation for an optical telegraph device dating back to the early 
19th century.

properties.name: Sabelstraat 28-30, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two structures with different set-up. Lay-out and structure 
built and keyed to one another on the same premises. Nr.28: small 
two-storey wooden structure covered with a slightly slant roof with 
eaves and adjoining stone-built section with flat roof. Nr.30: 
one-storey structure covered with three parallel hipped roofs in a row 
with cement hips and ridges with finials and traditionally detailed 
elements. Pillared front fence with stone openwork infill.

properties.name: Sali�a / Landhuis Vredenberg
properties.description:
Two-storey structure with a rectangular floor plan and situated
 in a hofi. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
flanking galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped 
gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Kitchen with oven and 
chimney adjacent  to rear gallery. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes 
with sash windows on the first floor and a central door flanked with two
 windows on both sides. Magasina and cistern close to main building, 
hofi with dams, wells and water reservoir.

properties.name: Salinja / Landhuis Chobolobo
properties.description:
Country estate complex with main structure and additional 
buildings. Main  building: two-storey core area and ditto transverse 
front addition covered with gable roofs and closed with funnel-shaped  
gables with 19th century top end. Lean- to roofs over adjoining 
one-storey rear gallery and front kitchen. Cistern with aqueduct. 
Additional structure and (possibly) stable.

properties.name: Scharloo / Fort Nassau
properties.description:
Fortification located 60 meters above Schottegat controlling 
the town and port within its field of fire. Consists of a rectangular 
main battery with powder storehouse and cistern, a small battery, 
barracks and kitchen and a latrine, within a ring wall. Close to the 
fort is a typical well with staircase access.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 100, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Main section with rear wings on 
both sides of patio (now covered). Hipped roof over sala, front and rear
 gallery of main section, hipped roofs over eastern rear wing. All 
hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice 
over fa�ades, pilasters with block pattern on corners. Front fa�ade laid
 out in three axes with central door and flanking windows on ground and 
first floor. Openings with weather mouldings on pseudo consoles. Front  
balcony. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 102, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure. Front section and rear section 
with side wings enclosing a patio. Front section: three hipped roofs 
over core area, front and rear gallery. Rear section: transverse hipped 
roofs over rear wings and gable roof over cistern behind eastern wing. 
Wing section of patio closed with aqueduct, rear end of patio with 
wooden balustrade. Front fa�ade with curved fronton with leaded glass 
panels above cornice, and English liberty- style tile finishing on 
ground floor. Curved balcony supported by columns.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 104, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure with symmetrical set-up of floor plan and 
fa�ades. Two-storey main section and one-storey rear section with side 
wings enclosing a patio. Patio closed with wall with arched opening, 
fan-shaped stairs to backyard. Projecting cornice over fa�ades, 
two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in five 
axes with central door and two  windows on both sides on ground and 
first floor. Front balcony on iron consoles. Full frontage front terrace
 with grey and  white marble tiles and fan-shaped stairs to yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 106, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Front section with two rear wings on both sides of patio. Cornice with 
dentils, pilasters with  block pattern on corners. Front fa�ade with 
central door and two windows on both sides. Semicircular portico 
supported by columns and pseudo terrace on roof. Decorated curved 
fronton behind terrace. Full-frontage front terrace with grey and white 
marble tiles, fan-shaped stairs to front yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 11, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala and front 
gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings. All roofs provided 
with cement hips and ridges with finials. Projecting profiled cornice 
over fa�ades and fluted pilasters with fantasy capital on corners. Front
 fa�ade with three doors. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Stone
 wall fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 13, Scharloo / Petit Trianon
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala, front and 
rear gallery. Ditto roofs over rear side wings. All roofs with ridge 
parallel to street and provided with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Triangular dormers in centre of roofs. Profiled cornice over 
fa�ades and paired pilasters on corners. Arched openings with clamped 
doors in platform. Cistern with flat roof. Front fa�ade with three 
doors. Full-frontage front terrace with central stairs. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 130, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Main section with front 
addition, central and back room, and two rear wings on both sides of 
patio. Patio closed with arched opening in wall. Cornice over  fa�ades. 
Fa�ade of front addition with triangular fronton with window above 
cornice. Central door and flanking windows. All openings topped with a 
moulded triangular fronton. Full-frontage short front terrace with 
fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 162, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure with symmetrical 
floor plan and additional structures. Main section with two rear wings 
on both sides of patio. Patio closed with arched opening in wall and 
stairs to backyard. Heavy profiled cornice with dentils over fa�ades, 
fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with 
central door and two windows on both sides on ground and first floor. 
Profiled weather mouldings with dentils above  openings. Full-frontage 
front  terrace with fan- shaped stairs to front yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 164, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with symmetrical floor plan laid 
out on  elevated platform. Main section with two rear wings on both 
sides of patio. Patio closed with back room. Hipped roofs with dormers 
a.o. on hipped ends on sides of building. Heavy profiled cornice over 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade with triangular fronton with cut ornament  in 
tympanum. Central door and flanking windows with so-called 'kupials', 
arched corner loggia's, on corners. Full- frontage short front terrace 
with wooden balustrade and fan- shaped stairs.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 17, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure with ridges parallel to street. Two- storey 
front section and one-storey rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over 
sala, front and rear galleries. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings 
enclosing a patio. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Projecting profiled cornice over fa�ades and fluted pilasters 
on corners. Closing wall of patio with arched opening, aqueduct to large
 cistern. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes with central shutter door 
and flanking shutter windows on ground and first floor. Full- frontage 
front terrace with stairs. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 172-174, Scharloo / 'La Maravilla'
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with large street front. Front 
section with hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Dormers on all 
hipped ends. Rear section with hipped roof over central unit and 
pyramidal roofs over flanking units. Adjoining west wing with flat roof.
 Heavy cornice over fa�ades, dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade 
laid out in five axes with central triangular fronton above cornice. 
Original lay-out of first floor: three doors opening to front balcony 
with window on both sides.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 19, Scharloo / 'Hogar Santa Luisa'
properties.description:
Detached structure with front and rear section with patio. 
Two-storey front section with sala, front and rear galleries. One-storey
 rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Flat roofs surrounded 
by a parapet with stone openwork between pillars. Profiled cornice over 
fa�ades and double pilasters on corners. Patio with columns and closing 
wall with arched opening. Front fa�ade laid out with central door and 
flanking paired windows on first floor and three doors on ground floor, 
all with arched weather mouldings. Full-frontage front terrace with 
steps. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 20, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Hipped roof with  finials over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
front and rear gallery. Heavy  cornice over all core fa�ades and gallery
 fa�ade. Front fa�ade with three windows on core section and central 
door and two flanking windows on both sides. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 21, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with irregular floor plan. Hipped
 roof over main rectangular section. Asymmetrical front addition with 
small hipped roof and cantilevered pyramidal roof supported by fretwork 
consoles built over projecting tower structure. Front balcony with 
quarter- circle floor plan over ditto terrace in inner corner of 
structure. Two-tiered corner loggia. (Original balustrade of stone 
balusters of front balcony, loggia and terrace replaced by solid stone 
balustrade. Closed fanlight on ground floor window changed into glass 
one).

properties.name: Scharlooweg 25, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure with front and rear section with patio. 
Two-storey front section with sala and front gallery. One- storey rear 
section with transverse  hipped roofs over rear rooms. All roofs with 
ridge parallel to street and provided with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Profiled cornice over all facades of front section, quoins with
  block pattern on corners. Front fa�ade laid out with central door and 
flanking windows on both floors. Front  balcony on consoles. 
Full-frontage terrace with fan-shaped stairs to yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 27, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Front and rear section with patio. Parallel hipped roofs over sala, 
front and double rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings 
and rear addition. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Profiled cornice over  fa�ades, block-shaped quoins on corners.
 Front fa�ade: fronton with decorated tympanum and lace decoration, 
three shutter doors with pseudo fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped
 stairs to front yard. Pillared fence with infill of wooden bars in 
between.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 29, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio and rear garden. Hipped roofs over 
sala and front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped 
floor plan. Two- storey rear addition with flat roof and arched 
corridor. Patio with columns. Profiled cornice  over  fa�ades, pilasters
 on corners. Front fa�ade: fronton with decorated tympanum and medallion
 set in plastered eagle; lace decoration on top edges. Three shutter 
doors with pseudo fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to 
front yard. Gate pillars marked with date 'ANNO 1893'.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 2A, Scharloo
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with three fa�ades exposed 
to surrounding streets. Hipped roof with ridge parallel to Scharlooweg. 
Three dormers on both sides of roof, one on short hipped end. Rear 
dormers with slant roofs. Front fa�ade with cornice and horizontal band 
above two of four large openings. One and two openings on side fa�ades. 
Former dwellings.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 31, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof over sala, adjoining 
slant roof over front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider 
U-shaped floor plan around patio with columns. Front section with 
parapet and fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade: three shutter 
doors with pseudo fanlights; frieze above openings with three medallions
 connected with garlands and ribbons. Full-frontage front terrace with 
fan- shaped stairs to front yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 33, Scharloo / 'Villa San  Ramon'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front section and rear section with two patio's. Hipped roofs over sala 
and front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor
 plan around patio with columns. Adjoining ditto structure around second
 patio. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs on east and west side. Profiled 
cornice over fa�ades, fluted  pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with 
decorated portico supported by double columns, three shutter doors 
opening to full- frontage front terrace with fan-shaped stairs. Date and
 text '1889' and 'Villa San Ramon' on gate pillars.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 35, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala and front 
gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor plan 
around patio. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs, a.o. on east and west 
side. Profiled cornice over fa�ades, fluted  pilasters on corners. Front
 fa�ade with decorated fronton above cornice, three shutter doors 
opening to full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Date '1889' on gate 
pillar.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 37, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front section  with sala and front gallery covered with hipped roof with
 dormers on both sides. Rear section with three back rooms, middle one 
with second storey. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Rear fa�ade: three 
gables with oculus and sun image in top ends. Front fa�ade: central door
 flanked with two windows with semicircular fanlights and mouldings. 
Full-frontage front terrace with balustrade and stairs to yard. Pillared
 fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 39, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Rectangular floor plan with parallel gable roofs over front and middle 
room and adjoining slant roof over back room. Three dormers on both 
sides of front roof and rear side of middle roof. Front dormers with 
cheeks. Cornice over fa�ades, pilasters  with block pattern on corners. 
Pointed gables on side fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and two 
windows with weather mouldings on both sides. Plain front terrace with 
stairs. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 4-10, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure accommodating four row- houses. 
One continuous hipped roof with ridge parallel to Scharlooweg on 
elongated floor plan. Five dormers on both sides of roof, two on short 
hipped ends. Rear dormers with slant roofs. Front fa�ade with cornice 
and horizontal band above doors and windows.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 41, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Front and rear section with patio. Gable roof over sala and front 
gallery. Gable roof over back room and transverse hipped roofs over side
 wings. Three dormers on both sides of front roof. Front dormers with 
triangular frontons with full-frontage span. Font fa�ade with cornice 
and  dentate quoins on corners, door and two windows on both sides. 
Full-frontage front terrace without  balustrade and stairs to front 
yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 43-49, Scharloo / 'Swaen'
properties.description:
Large yard with main structure in back area and additional 
structures along west and east boundaries. Main structure accommodating 
three (originally) identical one-storey row- dwellings. Two parallel 
gable roofs over rectangular floor plan with three transverse gable 
roofs over front and rear additions. Left dwelling: second storey added 
and front addition replaced by balcony. Additional structures: cistern 
connected with two aqueducts to main structure; on west and east 
boundaries servants' quarters in elongated blocks, the  latter with 
lean-to roof and roof chimneys.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 5, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with ridges parallel 
to street. Front  section with parallel hipped roofs over front gallery 
and sala. Rear section with transverse hipped roofs over side wings and 
small central corridor. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Roof chimney. Front  fa�ade laid out in five axes; central door
 flanked with paired windows with arched weather mouldings on both 
floors. Central front balcony.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 51, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof over front section, gable
 roof over back room and transverse hipped roofs over side wings. 
Dormers on outer sides of roof complex, front dormers with triangular 
frontons. Three additional structures at rear side including a cistern 
with aqueduct and stairs. Font fa�ade: central door and two windows on 
both sides. Full-frontage front terrace with wooden balustrade between 
pillars, stairs to front yard. Front fence with pillars.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 52-54, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey main structure with additional buildings in
 front yard. Gable roof over core, adjoining slant roof over rear 
gallery. Truncated gables with knob ornaments. Front  fa�ade with 
shutter doors and windows and wooden front balcony supported by columns.
 Additional buildings include a cistern and structure with chimney. 
Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 53, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof with dormers on front and
 side hipped ends over sala, adjoining slant roof over open front 
gallery. Hipped roof over rear gallery and ditto transverse roof over 
side wings. Patio with corridors and columns closed with two-storey rear
 structure. Font section with open gallery  and semicircular portico 
with parapet supported by double columns. Stairs to front yard. Pillared
 fence. Interior with decorated tiles and glass panels, and wall  
paintings on textile.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 55, Scharloo / 'Beau  S�jour'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section form U-shaped floor plan around patio with 
corridors and columns. Rear gallery with gable roof. Patio closed with 
arched opening and infill with bars. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs on 
east and west side. Profiled cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with 
portico with fronton and decorated tympanum supported by double columns.
 Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to yard. Gate with text 'Beau' and
 'S�jour' on gate pillars.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 61, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Front section
 and rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Front section with 
hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over two-storey 
core area and lean-to roofs over one-storey front and rear galleries. 
Patio closed with arches. Front fa�ade with three windows on core wall 
and central door flanked with windows on gallery fa�ade. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 64-66, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over front and 
rear section. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over fa�ades. Front 
fa�ade laid out in three axes with windows on first  floor (central 
window is replacement of door with balcony) and central door and 
flanking windows on ground floor. Stone benches between front fa�ade  
and fence. Pillared fence with central gate.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 68, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure set back from street behind Scharloo 64 and 
70. Symmetrical two-storey main structure with front addition covered 
with gable roofs. Main building: cornice and horizontal band over 
fa�ades. Front addition with central door and window and flanked with 
windows on ground and first floor. Triangular fronton with oculus above 
cornice of front fa�ade. Stone benches perpendicular to front fa�ade on 
corners. Flanking cisterns in backyard with aqueducts to main building. 
Gate between nrs. 64 and 70.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 7, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Parallel hipped roofs over sala, 
front and rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings and rear
 addition. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Front fa�ade with projecting profiled cornice with dentils, pseudo brick
 plasterwork finishing and block-shaped quoins on corners. Three shutter
 doors opening to front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard. 
Pillared fence with infill of iron bars in between.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 70, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice with 
dentils and horizontal band over fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in three
 axes with windows on first floor (central window is replacement of door
 with balcony) and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. 
Above door marble tablet with old house number and date ' 11.1862.B'. 
Stone benches between front fa�ade and fence. Pillared fence with 
central gate.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 72-76, Scharloo / 'La Maria'
properties.description:
Large detached structure with 18th century origin. Drastically 
renovated in the 1930's. Three-storey main structure with two two-storey
 rear wings enclosing a half- covered inner court. Additional one-storey
 structure on western boundary of premises. Main structure with core and
 surrounding gallery, and projecting  tower with pyramidal roof on 
northwest corner. Terrace over front gallery topped with parapet of cast
 balusters. Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with wooden front balcony
 supported by columns and two staircases to front garden. Gate pillars 
marked with text 'La Maria' and 'n.58'.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 75, Scharloo
properties.description:
Former 'Club De Gezelligheid'. Large detached structure with 
ridge parallel to street. Main two-storey section with one-storey east 
and west additions and ditto rear wings on both sides of a patio. Patio 
closed with three arches supported by columns. Main section: gable roof 
over core area, slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. 
Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top ends. Cornice 
and horizontal bands over fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Portico added 
during restoration of 1970.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 77, Scharloo / 'Kas di Bolo'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. U-shaped front section with hipped 
roofs. Rear wings on both sides of patio closed by backroom. Open front 
gallery with seven arches on front side and three arches on short sides 
supported by columns with fantasy Corinthian capitals. Gallery roof 
built as pseudo terrace with parapet of balusters. U-shaped front 
section with pseudo fa�ade behind terrace. Fan-shaped stairs to front 
yard. Pillared fence.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 79, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Front section with  three parallel hipped roofs over core area, front 
and rear gallery. Rear section with transverse hipped roofs over side 
backrooms and ditto gable roof over  middle one. Hipped roofs with 
cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled  cornice over fa�ades, 
fluted pilasters on corners. Two-storey portico with decorated 
triangular fronton supported by double columns. Balcony  on first floor.
 Pillared fence and gate with old house number ' 39a' on right pillar. 
Left pillar with marble tablet and date '1873 ' removed.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 81, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Main building and rear section with patio. Main section with gable roof 
over sala and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two 
dormers  on  both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and
 19th century top end. Hipped roofs over transverse side wings on both 
sides of a patio. Cistern parallel to western wing. Cornice over 
fa�ades,  pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with three doors opening to
 full frontage front terrace and steps to front yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 86-88, Scharloo
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with main structure and 
additional buildings. Main structure with symmetrical set-up and 
rectangular floor plan covered with  four parallel hipped roofs. Dormers
 on short hipped ends of roofs. Front and rear portico in central axis. 
Profiled cornice over fa�ades, dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade 
with two sets of three coupled  windows with arched weather mouldings on
 both sides of portico. Symmetrical winding stairs to portico balcony. 
Two so-called azoteas - one-storey square blocks with terrace and open 
stonework balustrade on flat roof - on corners of front yard.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 9, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. 
Front and rear section with patio. Pyramidal roof over sala and front 
gallery, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs
 over side wings and rear addition (One-storey added later on over rear 
addition). Hipped roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Front fa�ade with projecting profiled cornice and dentate 
quoins on corners. Three shutter doors with triangular frontons above 
openings. Full-frontage front terrace with steps to front yard. Pillared
 fence with infill of iron bars in between.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 96, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Main building and rear section with patio. Main building: gable 
roof over rectangular floor plan, flat roof over front section and 
hipped roof over two-storey back room. Rear section: wing and additional
 structure on both sides of patio. Patio closed with arches. Front 
fa�ade with three doors with fanlights and weather mouldings. Frieze 
above doors divided in three sections with decorated infill. Balustrade 
above frieze around roof terrace of front section. Triangular fronton 
with oculus behind terrace with central door to terrace.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 98, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure. Main section with front addition
 and rear wing. Hipped roofs over sala and back rooms of main section, 
gable roof over front section. All hipped roofs with cement hips and 
ridges with finials. Front fa�ade: windows with moulded tympanums on 
fa�ades of main section and front addition. Front addition with 
triangular  fronton with medallion and infill with date '1878' above 
single door. Dentate quoins on corners. Pillared  fence.

properties.name: Schoenmakerstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-and-a-half storey corner structure. Part of row-house 
structure with Frederikstraat 101-103. Gable roof over core area, 
adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer on both sides 
of roof. Funnel-shaped separation wall and end gable with flat top end. 
Gable fa�ade with window in gable top and door in core section, two 
windows in front and clamped door in rear gallery.

properties.name: Schoonesteeg 5-7, Punda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey block of two structures. Part of a compound
 of two blocks of three row-houses enclosing a small walled-in yard. One
 continuous gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Plain end 
gable. Each dwelling equipped with two dormers with tall windows and 
triangular  frontons.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 12-14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Front 
and rear sections with gable roofs perpendicular to one another. 
Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Dormer on both sides of 
front-section roof. Profiled cornice on front fa�ade only. Fa�ade laid 
out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and 
flanking windows on ground floor. Plain triangular moulded frontons 
above openings.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 15-17, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. Roof 
with gable and hipped end. Doors and windows of front fa�ade altered 
during renovation.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey structure ranging with alley. Gable roof over core 
area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Transverse gable roof 
over back room.. Funnel-shaped gables. Front fa�ade with central door 
and flanking windows. Dormers altered and cornice lowered during 
renovation to match cornice of adjacent property nr. 18.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey structure built against adjacent properties and 
ranging with street. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front 
and rear gallery. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice, door and window. 
Dormers, front door and window altered during renovation.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Part of a
 block of five row-houses with nrs. 2-10. Gable roof over core  area and
 slant roof over front gallery. Front dormer with inward and outward 
curved gable top. Front fa�ade with modestly profiled cornice and full- 
frontage horizontal band halfway the fa�ade. Two clamped doors and 
window in the middle.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof 
over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped 
gables with shoulders. Front fa�ade with small cornice, door and window.
 Dormers, front door and window altered during renovation.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 5-9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the alley. 
Gable roof over core area and slant roofs over front and rear gallery. 
Roof with eaves. Funnel-shaped gables with top end made up of a small 
triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Two dormers with slant 
roofs on both sides of roof. Alley fa�ade altered during renovation in 
1994.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 6-10, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Part of a
 block of five row-houses with nrs. 2-10. Gable roof over core area and 
slant roof over front and rear gallery. Gable with shoulders and curved 
end, knob ornament on top and date mark '1747'. Front fa�ade with 
modestly profiled cornice and full-frontage horizontal band halfway the 
fa�ade. Front fa�ade and dormers altered during renovation in 1998.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular 
floor plan. Front fa�ade ranging with alley. Fa�ade laid out  with three
 shutter windows on first floor and two clamped doors on both sides of 
window with shutter.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 10A,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Front  fa�ade ranging with street. Gable roof over core and slant roof 
over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends. Font fa�ade
 with profiled cornice. Three windows on first floor. Two doors on both 
sides of central window on ground floor. Plain strips for weather 
mouldings above openings.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 12,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof 
over core and lean-to roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with
 plain top ends. Font fa�ade with profiled cornice. Two shutter windows 
on first floor with plain strips for weather mouldings. Full-frontage 
horizontal band above doors and window on ground floor.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 2,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped  gables with 19th century top end and oculus in 
moulded star. Two dormers on both sides of roof, the eastern ones with 
slant roofs. Front fa�ade with  profiled cornice and  full- frontage 
horizontal band. Fa�ade laid-out in four vertical axes with shutter 
windows on first  floor and three shutter doors and one ditto window on 
ground floor.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 26-28,  Otrobanda / 'Sebastopol'
properties.description:
Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with main 
building and additional structures in walled-in premises. Main building 
with two parallel gable roofs with dormers over core area, on three 
sides surrounded with adjoining slant roofs with roof with eaves over 
two-storey galleries. Funnel-shaped gables on front side with moulded 
curls at lower ends and inward curved top end with semicircular fronton 
with pinnacles and date mark '1742'. Ditto gables on rear side with 
small semicircular fronton and pinnacle above rectangular moulding. 
Front fa�ade with horizontal band below shutter  windows and ditto band 
above partly blind arcade with wooden fretwork infill.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 31-33,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half corner structure. Gable roof over core 
area,  adjoining slant roofs over font and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped 
gables with  shoulders and 19th century top end and oculus. Two  dormers
 on both sides  of roof. Front fa�ade lay-out not original.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 5-7,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey block-shaped structure with ridge parallel 
to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades. Front fa�ade 
laid out in five vertical axes with shutter windows on first floor and 
four doors and one window on ground floor. Fanlights above windows and 
doors with two-piece yellow and green glass panels and three-piece 
yellow, white and green glass panels respectively.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roofs 
over core and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends. 
Front fa�ade with profiled cornice. Two- tiered pilaster on left corner 
with remnants of profiled top of pilaster on cornice on right corner. 
Plain strips for weather mouldings above doors on ground floor.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 8,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Front  fa�ade ranging with street. Gable roof over core and lean-to roof
 over one-storey rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends.
 Font fa�ade with profiled cornice. Two windows on first floor. Two 
doors on both sides of central window on ground floor with plain strips 
for weather mouldings.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 9,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with rectangular floor
 plan. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Truncated gable with shoulders and knob ornament on top end. 
Three dormers on front side and two on rear side of roof. Typical 
profiled rounded cornice and ditto white painted corners with capital on
 front fa�ade. Full-frontage short front terrace  with pillared fence.

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat z/n, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached structure with ridge perpendicular  to street. 
Gable roof over three-storey core, lean-to roofs against core over 
two-storey side galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top 
end and oculus. Rear balcony on columns with staircase to backyard. 
Two-storey square addition placed against southern gallery and covered 
with pyramidal roof, adjoining cistern in inner corner.

properties.name: Seranostraat 11-13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof with eaves over rectangular floor 
plan. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end.  Front 
fa�ade with central clamped door and flanking windows with shutters.

properties.name: Seranostraat 15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to
 street. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Roofs 
equipped  with  cement hips and ridges with finials. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows. Short front yard, fence with stone 
balustrade with central entrance. Rear addition.

properties.name: Seranostraat 17, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge 
perpendicular to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan, 
adjoining slant roof over gallery on west side, built over half length 
of structure. Roof chimney. Funnel-shaped gables with flat top end. 
Front gable fa�ade with central door.

properties.name: Seranostraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey wooden structure with ridge parallel 
to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over rectangular front
 section,  adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Seranostraat 31, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with main section and front 
addition. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over main 
section, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Later on built front 
addition with roof with hipped and gable end. Front door in gable fa�ade
 and side windows. Flat cornice continuing on sides and gable of front 
addition.

properties.name: Seranostraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure with T-shaped floor plan. Main rear section 
and front addition. Gable roof over one-and-a-half storey main section, 
gables with shoulders. Later on built one-storey front addition with 
lower gable roof. Flat cornice on sides, pilasters on corners. Front 
gable fa�ade with central door  and flanking windows.

properties.name: Seranostraat 39, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over 
rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. 
Projecting cornice over front fa�ade, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade
 with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Cistern 
next  to gallery.

properties.name: Seranostraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. 
Gable roof over core,  adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end and knob  
ornament. Modestly profiled cornice. Front fa�ade with central  door and
 flanking windows. Semicircular step at front door.

properties.name: Seranostraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with off-street location 
behind Seranostraat 7. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. 
Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end. Front fa�ade with 
door and window.

properties.name: Seroe Lora / Landhuis De Goede Hoop (Popo)
properties.description:
One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Core area 
surrounded by  galleries. Hipped roof with finials over core area, slant
 roof over adjoining  galleries. Dentate coins on corners. Terrace with 
kitchen and fogon built onto north gallery. Curved stairs leading to 
terrace. Partly subterranean cistern on east side.

properties.name: Seru Lora / Landhuis Janwe
properties.description:
Former water plantation complex and country house. Relative 
small one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over 
core area, adjoining slant  roofs over galleries. Funnel-shaped gables 
with shoulders and 19th century top end. Three and two dormers on roof 
sides. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Plantation facilities 
include: an additional building, cistern, coach house and well.

properties.name: Sevillaanstraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey block accommodating three small row- 
houses. One  continuous gable roof with flat concrete tile roofing over 
core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 20th century top 
end. Rear additions with transverse slant roofs over kitchen units with 
roof chimney. Front fa�ade: central door with steps to street and 
flanking windows for  each unit. Walled backyard with gate.

properties.name: Sevillaanstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated 
platform. Gable  roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped gables
 with flat top ends. Front fa�ade with plain cornice and central door 
and flanking windows. Small window with shutter for access to sub-floor 
space. Short front terrace with stairs to street.

properties.name: Sint Martinsteeg 1, Otrobanda / 'Halman House'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure, main building of a corral with 
secondary structures. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front 
and rear gallery. Four dormers on  both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped 
gables with 19th century top end and oculus in moulded star. Front 
fa�ade with central door and three windows on both sides. Rear additions
 include kitchen with adjoining double cistern, and east wing. Former 
servants' quarters covered with one continuous slant roof along 
Zaantjessteeg. Surrounding walls with several gates in west and south 
wall.

properties.name: Sint Michiel / Archaeological Monument Sint Michielsberg
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of 
archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 4500 to 1500 
years. Site area approximately one hectare stretched from the top to the
 western slope of Sint Michielsberg. Limestone refuges in the rocks. .  
   Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone, charcoal,
 crabs and remnants of animal bones as well as tools made of shells and 
stone, and human graves.

properties.name: Sint Michiel / Landhuis Weitje (Wechi)
properties.description:
Small country estate. One-storey structure with rectangular 
floor plan. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
flanking galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Pointed gables 
with shoulders and 19th century top end. Wooden wall-cramps on gables. 
Kitchen with fogon in rear gallery. Facilities  include a magasina, 
corral, well and water reservoir.

properties.name: Sint Willibrordus / Landhuis Hermanus
properties.description:
Plantation complex with neo-classicist front part and 
traditional style rear part. Front part: two-storey core area and 
one-storey front gallery. Hipped roof with finials over core and lean-to
 roof over gallery. Rear part: one-storey core  area surrounded by 
galleries on three sides and fogon. Gable roof over core  and slant roof
 over galleries. Elevated terrace with stairs on three sides. Covered 
cistern next to front terrace.

properties.name: Sint Willibrordus / Landhuis Jan Kok
properties.description:
Former salt plantation with main structures laid out on an 
elevated platform. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular 
floor plan. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end.
 Two dormers on both sides of roof. Front terrace with slave bell and 
cistern below terrace floor. Plantation facilities include: a magasina, 
remnants of corrals, wells, pos di pia and remnants of saltpans.

properties.name: Sint Willibrordus / Landhuis San Sebastian
properties.description:
Main 18th century structure with 19th century additions on 
elevated platform. Main structure: one-storey building with core area 
and flanking galleries. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over 
adjoining galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with classical top ends. 
Additions include a transverse two-storey block structure with gable 
roof positioned over southern gallery, two one-storey wings enclosing a 
patio laid out against the eastern short end of the main building, and a
 kitchen. Complex is surrounded by terraces.

properties.name: Sommelsdijkstraat 4, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties and 
ridge perpendicular to alley. Gable roof with rounded top end. Gable 
section of  fa�ade with heavy profiled mouldings and window above heavy 
cornice. Fa�ade with one central window on first floor and pilasters on 
corners.

properties.name: Soto / Landhuis Groot Santa Martha
properties.description:
One of the oldest country estates on Cura�ao. Main structure 
and additional buildings and infrastructure. Main building positioned on
 elevated platform: one-storey U- shaped structure with core area, 
gallery with kitchen and storeroom, and transverse side wings enclosing a
 patio. Typical steep gable roofs closed with funnel-shaped gables with 
classical top end. Patio closed with wall with arched openings, middle 
opening  topped with fronton. Terraces with stairs on three sides. 
Stables, large magasina, drinking reservoirs for animals, typical 
cisterns with steps for human access, and hofi.

properties.name: Soto / Landhuis Klein Santa Martha
properties.description:
Former plantation with a mixed exploitation of salt, cattle and
 agriculture. Compact complex on a hilltop laid out on an elevated 
terrace. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor 
plan. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over 
galleries. Funnel- shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top 
end. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Detached kitchen and two 
additional structures on terrace, cistern below terrace floor. Magasina 
east of complex.

properties.name: Soto / Landhuis San Nicolas
properties.description:
Country estate complex situated on a hilltop west of Santa 
Marthabaai. Main building with rectangular floor plan laid out on 
elevated platform. One-storey structure with core area surrounded by 
galleries. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over 
galleries. Typical truncated gables on short ends. Three dormers on both
 sides of roof. Terraces around main building with kitchen, cistern and 
bathhouse. Terrace stairs on four sides.

properties.name: Souax / Landhuis Papaya
properties.description:
One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan placed on an 
elevated platform. Three adjoining parallel sections, each covered with a
 hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice 
over fa�ades, fluted pilasters on front corners. Front fa�ade: dormer 
above central shutter door, flanking shutter  windows. Front and rear 
terrace with stairs. Cistern at rear side.

properties.name: Souax / Mahuma / Archaeological Monument Roi Rincon alias Bon Pais
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of 
archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 4500 to 1500 
years. Site is approximately 1500 square meters and is part of a valley 
system adjacent to a limestone rock formation north of Souax which 
includes a settlement, a water catchment area and rock painting sites of
 the first human beings on the island. Oldest archaeological site on the
 island.

properties.name: Spaanse Water / Archaeological Monument Santa Barbara
properties.description:
Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of 
archaeological artefacts and soil structures in various concentrations 
dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site area approximately three hectares 
located on the plains northeast of country estate Santa Barbara. 
Deposits include archaeological materials of pottery, shells, stone, 
charcoal, crabs, remnants of animal bones as well as tools made of 
shells, stone and bone, cut ornaments and a human grave.

properties.name: Spaanse Water / Landhuis Brakkeput Abou
properties.description:
One-storey structure constructed in three phases. Lay-out with 
three distinct sections. Western section: gable roof over core area, 
slant roofs over flanking galleries. Middle section: gable roof 
perpendicular to roof of first phase, enclosed by typical inward curved 
gables. Eastern section: gable roof parallel to middle section. Terraces
 on three sides. Water reservoir, water wells and  dams on premises.

properties.name: Spaanse Water / Landhuis Brakkeput Mei-Mei
properties.description:
Symmetrically laid out one-storey complex on elevated platform.
 Situated on hilltop. Main structure with core area and transverse side 
wings covered with gable roofs. Front and rear gallery covered with 
slant roofs. Ditto roofs for adjoining gallery additions Large front and
 rear terraces with stairs. Cistern and two additional structures with 
rectangular floor plan on premises.

properties.name: Spaanse Water / Landhuis Jan Thiel
properties.description:
Plantation complex with main building and additional 
structures. Main building: rectangular floor plan with core area and 
slightly longer galleries  than core. Typical steep hipped roof over 
core area, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Three dormers on both 
sides of roof. Short terraces surrounding  the property. Plantation 
facilities include cisterns, a small dwelling, a stable with feeding and
 drinking trays, two clustered magasina's, two corrals and a water 
reservoir.

properties.name: Spaansesteeg 22, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
alley. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled 
cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade laid out in three axes with windows 
on first floor and central door and flanking windows with plain 
full-frontage horizontal weather moulding on ground floor. East fa�ade 
with external staircase to central door and flanking windows on first 
floor.

properties.name: Spaansesteeg 3, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to 
alley. Gable roof over core area, adjacent slant roof over rear gallery.
 Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and truncated top end and knob 
ornament. Horizontal band connecting the shoulders. Dormer on both sides
 of roof. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. High 
stone wall around backyard with gate between pillars in middle of rear 
wall.

properties.name: Surinamesteeg 10-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One structure accommodating three one-storey dwellings. 
Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. One 
continuous gable roof with three front and two rear dormers with slant 
roofs. Fa�ade with six doors and three windows.

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 1, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey unit, part of one structure originally accommodating
 three row-houses with nrs. 1-3-5, left are nrs. 1-3. Compactly built 
against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. Almost flat slant 
roof with higher end facing alley. Central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 2-6, Punda
properties.description:
Almost alley-long, elongated structure accommodating three 
row-houses. Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with
 alley. One continuous gable roof. Three dormers with triangular fronton
 on both sides of roof. Fa�ade with four windows and doors, three doors 
with separate upper and lower part.

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 3, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey unit, part of one structure originally accommodating
 three row-houses with nrs. 1-3-5, left are nrs. 1-3. Compactly built 
against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. Almost flat slant 
roof with higher end facing alley. Central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Tera Cora / Landhuis Daniel
properties.description:
One of the oldest country estates on Cura�ao. Main structure 
and additional buildings. Main building: one- storey structure with core
 area, front, rear and side galleries. Transverse front addition in 
middle of core section. Typical  steep gable roofs closed with funnel- 
shaped gables with classical top end. Kitchen addition and cistern with 
aqueduct on both sides. Newly built row-houses on old site, corral and 
remnants of magasina.

properties.name: Tera Cora / Landhuis Grote Berg (Seru Grandi)
properties.description:
Two-storey structure situated on a hilltop. Steep hipped roof 
with dormers with typical triangular gables / frontons on hipped ends of
 roof. Cornice  over all fa�ades. Small terrace with  stairs on west 
side. Servant's dwelling (kunuku-dwelling), remnants of baking oven and 
additional buildings on premises.

properties.name: Tera Cora / Landhuis Siberie
properties.description:
Country estate complex with main building and a comprehensive 
set of facilities. Main building with rectangular floor plan laid out on
 elevated platform. One- storey structure with core area surrounded by 
galleries. 19th Century hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with 
finials over core area, original slant roofs over galleries. Internal 
kitchen with fogon and fornu. Terrace with stairs on all four sides. 
Facilities include a.o. magasina's, corrals, plantation manager's 
dwelling, toilet house, indigo reservoirs, and remnants of the former 
slave settlement and plantation walls.

properties.name: Van  Dijksteeg 1-3, Otrobanda / Four Alley complex
properties.description:
Compact complex of five small dwellings enclosed by four 
alleys: Van Dijksteeg, Zaantjessteeg,  Martinsteeg and 
Schrijnwerkerstraat. One and two-storey structures with inner yards. 
Complex dominated by central two-storey core structure with hipped roof 
and one-storey side galleries with lean-to roofs. Other structures 
include a.o. dwellings with core area and galleries covered with gable 
roofs and slant roofs enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with classical 
top end. Complex enclosed with high stone wall with gates to small inner
 yards.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 12, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan with front and rear 
gallery laid out on a basement. Small hipped roof over rear wing with 
cistern. Front fa�ade with cornice. Two doors and window opening to 
full-frontage balcony on first floor. Central door with flanking  
windows on ground floor. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs to 
garden.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 6, Scharloo / 'Villa Maria'
properties.description:
Detached block-shaped structure laid out on an elevated 
platform. Main section with portico and rear section with side wings 
enclosing a patio. Cistern under rear section. Two parallel hipped roofs
 over main section, transverse hipped roofs over side wings. Patio exit 
with U-shaped staircase to backyard. Side facades: eight shutter windows
 with triangular fronton and pilasters with  block pattern on main floor
 and six doors to former servants' quarters in substructure. Front  
fa�ade: portico with triangular fronton on Doric frieze with triglyphs, 
supported by fluted Doric columns. Quoins with block pattern on corners.
 Steep fan-shaped staircase to front yard.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 8, Scharloo
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Typical  steep gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof 
over front and rear gallery. Front dormer with triangular fronton and 
19th century top end. Front fa�ade with small cornice and central door 
and windows on both sides. Stairs  to front  garden.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 9-10, Scharloo
properties.description:
Semi-detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with ridges 
parallel to street. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with 
finials over core area, front and rear gallery. Front  fa�ade with 
profiled cornice with dentils and fluted pilasters on corners. Four 
windows on first floor. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front 
yard with stone wall side fences and pillared front fence. Full-frontage
 front balcony with staircase and ditto rear balcony added during 
restoration in 1929.

properties.name: Van Lennepstraat 1-5,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached corner structure with main and secondary structure 
with north- and eastward facing front facades. Two-storey main structure
 with hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over facades. Front fa�ade: 
windows with weather moulding and plastered flat frame above a plastered
 triangle with tassel ornament. One-storey secondary structure with 
hipped roof over rectangular floor plan.

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 2A-4, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached structure with elongated main building and additions. 
Main building: gable roof over structure with one-and-a-half storey and 
basement. Five dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 
19th century top end. Cornice and horizontal band over fa�ades. Large 
door in basement opening to Waaigat. Additions include a cistern and two
 one-storey additions with hipped roofs on east fa�ade, and a one-storey
 elongated addition with gable roof on north side closed with small 
structure with transverse hipped roof.

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 6-18, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached elongated structure with ridge parallel to alley 
accommodating six row-houses in two sections. Northern section: four 
units with gable roof and four dormers on both sides of roof. Southern 
section: two units with identical  features and higher ridge. One 
full-frontage plain cornice over facades of both sections. Front fa�ade 
ranging with alley with six doors and three windows, and two doors with 
steps and two windows respectively.

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 9-23, Scharloo
properties.description:
Concrete-built structure with large street frontage. Two 
storeys with low attic. Type of original roof unknown. Front fa�ade with
 symmetrical lay-out in eleven axes with shutter doors and windows. 
Large arched gate to back yard below window in central axis. Three 
windows and two doors with wooden balconies on both sides of central 
axis on first floor. Three doors and two windows on both sides of 
central gate on ground floor. Full-frontage horizontal bands above 
openings of ground and first floor. Band elevated above gate interrupted
 by rectangular moulding.

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure. Three parallel gable 
roofs over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th 
century top end and oculus in star decoration. Front fa�ade with 
profiled cornice and central door with flanking windows. Structure is 
seriously disturbed because west fa�ade is covered by a full-frontage 
wall built over two storeys.

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over 
rectangular floor plan.  Back room with lean-to roof leaning to wall of 
 premises. No cornice. Front fa�ade with door and window, gable fa�ades 
with window.

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 2, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with fa�ades ranging with alley. 
Flat roof over rectangular floor plan. Two-storey rear addition with 
slant roof. Plain cornice over front fa�ade. Door and two clamped 
windows on ground floor, three shutter windows on first floor.

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 4-6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Front fa�ade ranging with alley. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan.
 Plain gables, funnel-shaped gable on west side. Plain cornice with 
roof-tile gargoyle over front fa�ade. Two doors on both sides of window 
on ground floor, two windows on first floor.

properties.name: Vissteeg 2-8, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey elongated corner structure accommodating four 
row-houses. One continuous roof with hipped end on corner. Four roof 
chimneys on front side. Plain cornice over exposed fa�ades. Front fa�ade
 with clamped door with doorstep and clamped window for each unit. Short
 strip of stone pavement over full frontage of front fa�ade.

properties.name: Vissteeg 3-9, Punda
properties.description:
One-storey elongated structure of four row-houses and built 
against neighbouring properties. One continuous gable roof interrupted 
by funnel-shaped gables projecting over roof. Plain cornice over 
fa�ades. Front fa�ade with four clamped doors and clamped windows on 
either left or right side.

properties.name: Wacao / Archaeological Monument Ser'i Kloof
properties.description:
Scattered archaeological artefacts on ground surface and ruins 
of fortifications which include a.o. a set of three battery walls and a 
powder  house dating from early 19th century. Site area approximately 
1800 square meters with inland location on the road to Westpunt where  
the plantations Fontein and Ascension meet. .     Deposits include 
construction and archaeological materials and European pottery.

properties.name: Waterfortstraat, Punda / Waterfort
properties.description:
Large fortification at entrance of Sint Annabaai opposite 
Riffort in Otrobanda. Irregular fortification strip following the 
coastline from Sint Annabaai to Marichi. Structure accommodates one 
continuous shooting gallery laid out above mutually connected vaulted 
spaces used as casemates and batteries. Staircase, two chimneys and  
baking oven.

properties.name: Weg naar Welgelegen, Mundo Nobo / Plantersrust
properties.description:
Large symmetrically set-up complex laid out on an elevated 
platform on walled-in premises. Former Military Hospital. Separate units
 connected with galleries. Inner court surrounded by main front  
building (former doctor's residence), six pavilions (infirmaries) and 
rear structure. Additional structures on west side such as a.o. 
operating room, kitchen and cistern. Pavilions with heavy profiled 
cornice and hipped roofs over core area and lean-to roofs over 
surrounding, originally open galleries with plain balustrades with 
wooden bars. (Present dwelling function of complex has introduced severe
 alterations)

properties.name: Werfstraat 6, Scharloo
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with main section and two rear 
wings on both sides of an inner court closed with a cistern. Gable roof 
with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries on 
three sides of core. Inward and outward curved gables  with arched top 
ends and pinnacles. High cornice with dentils and drapery with tassels, 
continuing on fa�ade of exposed south wing. Front fa�ade laid out in 
four axes with windows on first floor and two doors and flanking windows
 on ground floor. Gate to south wing. Full-frontage front terrace.

properties.name: Werfstraat 8, Scharloo
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Typical steep hipped roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant 
roofs over galleries on three sides of core. Additions: one-storey 
structure and tower with gable roofs on northern, and ditto structure 
with hipped roof on eastern boundary of  premises. Gable roofs with 
eaves on dormers and on additional structure. Full-frontage front 
terrace.

properties.name: Westpunt / Landhuis Savonet
properties.description:
One of the oldest and largest plantations on the island with a 
comprehensive well-preserved set of facilities. Main building rebuilt in
 18th century style.  One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan 
laid out on elevated platform. Core area and flanking galleries. Gable 
roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. 
Terrace on all four sides. Plantation facilities include a.o. 
magasina's, stables, corrals, dairy and milling house, forge, threshing 
floor, cistern and remnants of the former slave settlement. Also a hofi 
with wells, pos di pia, water reservoirs, water dams and canals.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 1, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached three-storey symmetrical double structure with 
ridges perpendicular to square. Two parallel gable roofs with eaves on 
exposed side. Funnel-shaped gables with classical top end. Later on 
added front gallery. Profiled cornice over front and side fa�ade of 
gallery. Front fa�ade laid out in five vertical axes with glass windows 
on first and shutter windows on second floor.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 14-16, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge of front section 
parallel to square. Hipped roofs over T-shaped floor plan; flat roofs 
over additions in inner  corners of T. Cornice over fa�ades, dentate 
quoins on corners. Front fa�ade with full-frontage decorated triangular 
fronton above projecting cornice. Fa�ade laid out in five axes. Windows 
and central portico with triangular frontons. Plinth on both sides of 
portico.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 19-23, Punda
properties.description:
Two structures on lot stretched between Wilhelminaplein and 
Windstraat. Wilhelminaplein: three-storey structure with gable roof. 
Asymmetrical funnel-shaped gable laid out in three axes with windows on 
first and second floor. Windstraat: two- storey structure with gable 
roof over core area and adjoining  slant roof over gallery. Dormer with 
triangular fronton and date '1760'. Typical frieze divided in four 
panels below first-floor windows.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 2, Punda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with U-shaped floor plan. Main 
building and two side wings at front side; gallery built against inner 
fa�ades of U-shape. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges over main 
section and wings, lean-to roofs over gallery. Profiled cornice over 
fa�ades of main section and wings. Original structure with one-storey 
set-up; second floor added on main section  and wings in 1934 and 1940 
respectively.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 25, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof over almost 
square floor plan. Dormers on front and rear side of roof. Front fa�ade 
with cornice and  three tall windows divided by pentice in upper and 
lower section.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 2A, Punda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
square. Steep gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped 
gables with rustic work finishing of gable fa�ade. Windows on ground and
 first floor separated by  two horizontal bands on exposed  fa�ades. 
Front fa�ade laid out in five axes with Art Deco style central section 
flanked with two windows on both floors. Pentice above entrance.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 4, Punda / Stadhuis
properties.description:
Detached three-storey structure with elongated floor plan and 
symmetrical set-up. Front section with hipped roofs over five pavilions 
with projecting central and corner pavilions. Rear section with one 
continuous hipped roof parallel to front section row of hipped roofs. 
Front fa�ade laid out in two distinct layers: ground floor and first and
 second floor with columns over two-storeys in fa�ade. Central portico 
on first floor with double stairs to square.

properties.name: Willemstraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over front fa�ade, plain 
cornice over side and rear fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows.

properties.name: Willemstraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped  gables 
with 19th century top end. Front fa�ade with plain cornice and central 
clamped door with two ditto windows on both sides. Rear addition with 
slant roof and chimney.

properties.name: Willemstraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges over rectangular floor 
plan. Profiled cornice over front fa�ade, plain cornice over side and 
rear fa�ades; pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows. Full-frontage horizontal band above openings 
continuing beyond front fa�ade over side gates, one gate with triangular
 floor plan.

properties.name: Willemstraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped  gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. 
Dormer on both sides of roof. Front fa�ade with two doors and three 
windows. Rear addition with chimney.

properties.name: Willemstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped  gables 
with 19th century top end. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice and 
central door opening with two window openings on both sides.

properties.name: Willemstraat11-13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to roof.
 Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over 
fa�ades, fluted tiered pilasters with base on corners. Front fa�ade laid
 out in three vertical axes with windows on first floor and doors on 
ground floor. Horizontal moulded bands above openings of ground and 
first floor.

properties.name: Windstraat 11, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Fa�ade ranging with alley. Gable roof with eaves and dormers with inward
 and outward curved gables. Wooden full-frontage gallery on first floor 
covered with slant roof with overhang. Gallery provided with eight 
segmental arches supported by wooden pillars and closed with 
cantilevered wall.

properties.name: Windstraat 13, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Fa�ade ranging with alley. Gable roof with eaves over main section. 
Wooden full-frontage gallery on first floor covered with lean-to roof 
with overhang. Gallery was provided with three flat arches supported by 
wooden pillars.

properties.name: Windstraat 15A/B, Punda
properties.description:
