Three-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Fa�ade ranging with alley. Gable roof over main section. Dormer with 
slant roof with overhang. Funnel- shaped gables, eastern one with 
triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Wooden full-frontage 
two-tiered gallery on first and second floor covered with lean-to roof 
with overhang. Gallery provided with six flat arches supported by wooden
 pillars.

properties.name: Windstraat 19-23, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. 
Fa�ade ranging with alley. Gable roof with dormers over main section. 
Plain funnel-shaped gables. Full-frontage modernized gallery on ground 
and first floor covered with slant roof. Gallery provided with five bays
 on first floor and six openings on ground floor.

properties.name: Windstraat 2, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Fa�ades ranging with alley. Gable roof with pointed gable on one side. 
Dormer with slant roof on  front side. Front fa�ade  with cornice and 
two full-frontage horizontal bands. Four tall windows on first floor.

properties.name: Windstraat 25A, Punda
properties.description:
Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Typical steep gable roof with eaves parallel to alley. Two front dormers
 covered with gable roofs with eaves ranging with front fa�ade. Later on
 added adjoining structures on rear side. Front fa�ade with four clamped
 windows on first floor.

properties.name: Winkelsteeg 10-22,  Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached complex with composite floor plan built on 
sloping terrain. 18th Century main building with three rear additions. 
Main building laid out on elevated platform. Gable roof over two-storey 
core area, adjoining slant roofs over surrounding galleries. Three 
dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and outward curved gables with 
semicircular top end and classical moulding. Front fa�ade with central 
stairs with landing and stairs to balconies on both sides. Three 
adjoining rear additions with hipped roofs along Langestraat, the corner
 additions connected with main building with corridor on attic level.

properties.name: Wishi / Landhuis Morgenster
properties.description:
Relatively small one-storey structure with rectangular floor 
plan laid out on elevated platform. Core area flanked with galleries. 
Gable roof over core area and slant roofs over galleries. Gables with 
shoulders. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Part of rear roof is 
lifted to allow for a stairway. Terraces on three sides, front and side 
stairs.

properties.name: Witteweg  9-13, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure accommodating three 
dwelling units. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials 
over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with 
door and window for each unit. Plain addition with pyramidal roof and 
cistern with slant roof in backyard

properties.name: Witteweg 15, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to 
street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over rectangular floor 
plan. No cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows. Full- frontage short terrace. Front fence with 
concrete panels of circular ornaments between  pillars.

properties.name: Witteweg 16, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridges 
parallel to street. Three hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front fa�ade with 
profiled cornice. Central door and flanking windows with weather 
mouldings. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs and spread  
balustrade. Stone wall fence on three sides of premises, gate in rear 
wall.

properties.name: Witteweg 18, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridges 
parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and 
ridges over rectangular front and larger rear section. Roofs with eaves 
on all sides. Front fa�ade with central door with doorstep and flanking 
windows.

properties.name: Witteweg 20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridge 
parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over 
rectangular floor plan. No cornice over fa�ades, slightly lifted eaves 
with fascia board instead. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows. Full- frontage short terrace. Front fence with concrete 
openwork panel infill between pillars.

properties.name: Witteweg 21, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to
 street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Front fa�ade with profiled cornice and central 
door with doorstep and flanking windows.

properties.name: Witteweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips over rectangular floor plan. 
Cornice over front and side fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and 
flanking windows with  weather mouldings.

properties.name: Witteweg 24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over  core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped  gables with truncated top end and knob ornament.
 Cornice over front fa�ade, dentate quoins on corners. Front fa�ade with
 central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full-frontage
 short front terrace with stairs on ends.

properties.name: Witteweg 26, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over  core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped  gables with oculus and truncated top end and 
knob ornament. Cornice over all fa�ades, decorated pilasters on corners.
 Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows with weather 
mouldings. Full-frontage short front terrace with stairs on one end.

properties.name: Witteweg 30, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips over rectangular floor plan. 
Small cornice over front and wider cornice over side fa�ades. Front 
fa�ade with two doors and one windows. Full-frontage short front terrace
 with stairs on one end.

properties.name: Witteweg 37, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey corner structure with ridge parallel 
to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over 
rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over later on added rear 
gallery. Cornice over front and side fa�ades. Front fa�ade with door and
 small flanking windows.

properties.name: Witteweg 42, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Five parallel hipped roofs of different size and adjoining flat 
roof over rectangular floor plan. Roofs equipped with cement hips and  
ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades, on front fa�ade 
with dentils, and pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with full- frontage
 triangular fronton with dentils in top mouldings. Three panelled 
shutter doors opening to full-frontage short terrace. External oven on 
rear corner. Stone wall fence on three sides.

properties.name: Witteweg 44, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel
 to street. Three parallel hipped roofs, the rear one slightly larger, 
and side wings. Roofs equipped with cement hips and  ridges with 
finials. Profiled cornice over all fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front 
 fa�ade with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage short 
terrace. External oven on rear corner. Stone wall fence on three sides.

properties.name: Witteweg 45, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure made up of front and rear section. Ridges 
parallel to street. Front section: two parallel hipped roofs with cement
 hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled 
cornice over front and side fa�ades, continuing on fa�ades of  rear 
section. Fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with three doors. 
Pillared front fence with gates on ends. Rear section: Gable roof over 
one-and-a-half storey structure. Three  dormers on both sides of roof. 
Pointed gables.

properties.name: Witteweg 46, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with a symmetrical set-up.
 Rectangular  front section covered with two parallel hipped roofs and 
adjoining square rear section with pyramidal roof. Profiled cornice  
over fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with portico. Plain 
triangular fronton supported by caryatides on base. Full frontage short 
front terrace. Pillared fencing continues as stone walls to sides. Forms
 twin structure with Witteweg 48, however with caryatides of a different
 design.

properties.name: Witteweg 47-51, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Symmetrically set up small complex with main building with deep
 setback  and flanking front pavilions on both sides of patio. Main 
building: three hipped roofs parallel to street over rectangular floor 
plan. Front fa�ade with cornice with dentils and drapery ornamentation. 
Central door and flanking windows with triangular frontons. Front 
pavilions: basically identical structures with hipped roofs 
perpendicular to street. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with 
finials. Central gate between pillars connecting the front pavilions.

properties.name: Witteweg 48, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. 
Rectangular  front section covered with two parallel hipped roofs and 
adjoining square rear section with pyramidal roof. Profiled cornice over
 fa�ades, pilasters on corners, block pattern in plaster finishing of 
side fa�ades of front section. Front fa�ade with portico. Plain 
triangular fronton with oval medallion, supported by caryatides on base.
 Full frontage short front terrace. Pillared fencing continues as stone 
walls to sides. Forms twin structure with Witteweg 46, however with 
caryatides of a different design.

properties.name: Witteweg 50, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan and 
adjoining wider rear section. Rear addition with chimney. Cornice over 
fa�ades, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with 
central door and flanking windows on first floor and three doors on 
ground floor (balcony and staircase not original). Full-frontage terrace
 with stairs on ends. Pillared  fence with gates on ends. Two small 
one-storey additional structures with gable roofs in backyard. Fa�ades 
ranging with back street Rembrandstraat.

properties.name: Witteweg 52, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Large detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan 
(adjoining wider rear section collapsed). Cornice over fa�ades, 
two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with three tall 
windows on first floor and three doors on ground floor. Full-frontage 
terrace with stairs on ends. Pillared fence with gates on ends. Two 
small one-storey additional structures with gable roofs in backyard. 
Fa�ades ranging with back street Rembrandstraat.

properties.name: Witteweg 54, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two 
parallel  hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof
 over rear  gallery. Profiled cornice over fa�ades, pilasters on 
corners. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows and 
portico. Plain triangular fronton with decorated oval medallion, 
supported by two Tuscan columns resting on pillars of front fence. Short
 front terrace with stairs on ends.

properties.name: Witteweg 56, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two 
parallel hipped roofs over front section and ditto roofs over adjoining 
wider rear section. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. 
Profiled cornice over fa�ades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade
 with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full 
frontage short front terrace with quarter circle stairs on ends. 
Pillared fencing with central gate.

properties.name: Witteweg 58, Otrobanda / 'Villa Margarita'
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two 
parallel  hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan, transverse hipped 
roofs over rear wings and hipped roof over closing rear addition. All 
roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over 
fa�ades, pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with three panelled shutter 
doors and portico. Triangular fronton with decorated oval medallion, 
supported by two caryatides resting on pillars of front fence. Short 
front terrace with stairs on ends.

properties.name: Witteweg 60, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached structure with front and rear section with hipped 
roofs perpendicular to each other. Roofs with cement hips and ridges 
with finials. Two storey concrete-built rear addition with slant roof 
flanked with a covered open wooden balcony and a closed wooden addition 
supported  by columns. Profiled cornice over fa�ades, pilasters on front
 corners. Front fa�ade with three doors opening to full-frontage short 
front terrace with quarter circle stairs on ends. Front fence with two 
gates on ends. Gate with clamped door and pointed lintel in rear fence.

properties.name: Witteweg 63, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Two parallel hipped roofs of different length with cement hips and 
ridges with finials. Cornice over fa�ades, small pilasters on corners. 
Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows with weather 
mouldings. Front terrace.

properties.name: Witteweg 65, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two parallel hipped roofs of different length with cement hips 
and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice with console moulding over 
fa�ades and fluted, tiered pilasters on corners. Front fa�ade with 
shutter window and two shutter doors  opening to (new) front balcony on 
first floor, central shutter door and ditto flanking windows on ground 
floor. Profiled weather mouldings above openings. Front terrace.

properties.name: Witteweg 66-68, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached assembly of structures on pointed street corner. Main 
structure: two storeys covered  with two hipped roofs, the rear one 
longer and cut following the street angle. Rear addition with slant 
roof. Cornice with lambrequin frieze over facades. Front facade with 
shutter doors and windows laid out in three axes. Front balcony over 
full- frontage terrace with stairs on ends. Corner structure: one- 
and-a-half storey covered with flat roof used as terrace with wooden 
balustrade of diagonal boards. Front fa�ade with clamped central door 
and ditto flanking windows.

properties.name: Witteweg 67, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
street. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Plain 
cornice over fa�ades. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking 
windows with weather  mouldings. (Original roofing replaced by 
corrugated cement sheets)

properties.name: Witteweg 69A/B, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Hipped roof  with cement hips and ridges with finials over 
rectangular floor plan. Two small rear additions. Cornice over fa�ades, 
pilasters with block pattern on corners. Front fa�ade laid out in three 
axes with central panelled shutter door with flanking shutter windows on
 first floor and three ditto doors with weather mouldings on ground 
floor. Wooden cantilevered balcony. Short front terrace.

properties.name: Witteweg 77, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Small detached one-storey structure with a deep setback from 
the street. Gable roof over main section, adjoining slant roof over rear
 addition. Truncated gable with knob ornaments. Small addition with on 
front corner.

properties.name: Witteweg 79, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. 
Three parallel hipped roofs. Shorter rear roof. All roofs with cement 
hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over fa�ades, fluted pilasters on 
corners. Front fa�ade with central door and flanking windows with 
weather mouldings. Short front terrace. Rear terrace with cistern.

properties.name: Witteweg 81, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure with ridge 
perpendicular to the street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan, 
adjoining lower hipped roof over front addition. Basement with storage 
and cistern. Rain gutter around roofs. Front porch covered with slant 
roof and supported by two fluted columns. Almost original interior.

properties.name: Wolkstraat 7, Punda
properties.description:
Four-storey structure with large frontage built against 
neighbouring properties. Structure consists of two properties; open 
space in between later on covered. Recessed fourth storey. Three 
full-frontage wooden balconies. Second and third floor originally with 
three and two doors, fourth floor with four and two doors in western and
 eastern section respectively.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey corner structure ranging with the 
alley. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and 
rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables 
with shoulders, 19th century top end and oculus in star moulding. Front 
fa�ade with cornice laid out in three axes with three shutter windows on
 first floor and two doors and window on ground floor. Tablet with 
inscription '1835 332' on fa�ade.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 14, Otrobanda
properties.description:
One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. 
Ridge  parallelto  street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant 
roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 18th century top end and pineapple 
top ornament. Front fa�ade central panelled door and flanking shutter 
windows. (During restoration small plain     cornice replaced by firm, 
profiled one to match altered design of nr.16).

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to 
alley. Three parallel gable roofs over core area and smaller front and 
rear gallery. Pointed gables with oculus, core section with oculus in 
moulded star. Front fa�ade with plain cornice laid out in three axes 
with windows  on first floor and central door and flanking windows on 
ground floor. Stone tablet above front door with text '1852 no 347'

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with composite floor plan, on 
three sides surrounded with alleys. Rectangular floor plan successively 
covered with two  parallel hipped roofs, gable roof with dormers and 
rear gallery, and two transverse gable  roofs. Gable roof with 
funnel-shaped gables and triangular top end. Full-frontage wooden 
balcony over front fa�ade covered with lean-to roof. Balustrade of 
wooden fretwork and splendidly decorated upper section. Rear fence with 
two firm gates with clamped doors.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 22-24, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached corner structure with addition forming one 
complex with Gasthuisstraat 5. Main section: one storey; gable roof over
 core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Gables 
with shoulders and top end of triangular fronton. Two dormers on both 
sides of roof. Gate to backyard. Two-storey corner addition with slant 
roof over square floor plan and adjacent one-storey addition with slant 
roof and chimney. Gasthuisstraat 5: gable roof with dormers over small 
one- storey structure.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 26-28, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to alley. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. 
Two dormers on both sides of roof. front fa�ade laid out in three axes 
with windows on first floor and two  doors and window on ground floor. 
Full-frontage horizontal bands above openings.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 30-38, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to 
street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over three 
galleries. Two dormers with slant roofs on both sides of gable roof. 
Funnel-shaped gables with semicircular fronton as top end. Front fa�ade 
ranging with street; door flanked with one and two windows.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 42, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front, and part of
  the rear gallery. Two dormers on front side and one on rear side of 
roof. Funnel-shaped gables with semicircular fronton as top end. Front 
fa�ade laid out in four axes with windows on first floor and door and 
three windows on ground floor with full-frontage horizontal band. 
Rainwater transport from front roof gutter along gable to rear gutter 
and vertical gutter to (removed) cistern.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 43, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to roof.
 Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear 
gallery. Dormer with slant roof on both sides of gable roof. 
Funnel-shaped gable with triangular fronton as top end. Front fa�ade 
with central door and flanking windows.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 44 and 56-74, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Assembly of structures forming a corral. Two main buildings 
(nr.44) and elongated block of secondary units (56-74). Main buildings: 
gable roofs over two-storey structures with ridges perpendicular to each
 other and separated by a small corridor. Open gallery in corridor space
 with block of stairs to front court. Adjacent wooden balcony supported 
by columns. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and 
triangular fronton above rectangular moulding respectively. Monumental 
entrance with two pillars topped  with ball ornaments. Secondary 
structure ranging with Zaantjessteeg accommodating ten small one-storey 
row-houses. One continuous lean-to roof and ditto gable roof, each 
covering five units, now turned into small housing units.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 45, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure with main ridge parallel to street. 
Gable roof over two-storey core area, lean-to roofs over one-storey 
front and rear gallery. Transverse roof with hipped end over two-storey 
structure adjoining the main core area. Cornice over fa�ades of core 
area sections.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 5, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two-storey corner structure built against neighbouring 
properties. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front 
and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders,19th century top 
end and rhombic oculus. Front fa�ade with cornice laid out in three axes
 with three shutter windows on first floor and two doors and window on 
ground floor.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 6, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached structure covered with lean-to roof. Front fa�ade
 with plain horizontal end. Central shutter window flanked with two 
panelled shutter doors with  weather mouldings. Full-frontage profiled 
horizontal band  over fa�ade.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 63-69 and 73-77, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Two detached elongated structures accommodating small one- 
storey row-houses with front facades ranging with alley. Monumental gate
 to back yard. Zaantjessteeg 63-69: structure of two dwelling units 
covered with gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.
 Adjoining two units with lean-to roof and roof chimneys on rear side. 
Zaantjessteeg 73-77: structure of three dwelling units covered with one 
 continuous gable roof. Gables with plain top end. One chimney left of 
original three chimneys.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 8-12, Otrobanda
properties.description:
Semi-detached two-storey main structure with side addition. Two
 hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular 
floor plan. Adjoining slant roof with eaves over two-storey addition, 
its side ranging with front fa�ade of main structure. Front fa�ade with 
cornice and two  doors on first floor and door and window on ground 
floor. Smaller windows on fa�ades of additional structure.

properties.name: Zeelandia / Landhuis Bever
properties.description:
One-storey complex situated on a hilltop at Pos Cabai. 
Rectangular core area surrounded by galleries on three sides. Front 
addition. Gable roof over core area enclosed by funnel-shaped gables, 
slant roofs over surrounding galleries, low gable roof over front  
addition. Two dormers on both sides of  roof. Full-frontage front and 
rear terrace with stairs. Cylindrical water wells in front part and on 
rear corners of premises. Two graves and wooden servant's quarter.

properties.name: Zeelandia / Landhuis Groot Davelaar
properties.description:
Three-storey structure following a centralised building 
concept. Octagonal three-storey core area covered with a tent roof and 
surrounded by two concentric galleries, the first gallery topped with a 
flat roof serving as a roof terrace and the second one covered with 
hipped ends. Profiled mouldings around core section and exterior 
gallery. Gallery fa�ades laid out with arched openings separated by 
pilasters. Rectangular transverse section with kitchen and detached 
cistern. Small terrace with double stairs on east side, ditto with 
single staircase on west side.

properties.name: Zeelandia / Landhuis Zeelandia
properties.description:
Typical structure with a cruciform floor plan built in phases. 
18th Century section: one-storey core area with gable roof surrounded by
 galleries with adjoining slant roofs enclosed with inward curved 
gables. 19th Century section: two-storey transverse section with gable 
roof. Gables drastically altered during restoration. Large detached 
oblong pseudo 18th century wing built in 1945 (not  protected).
